src: Itsaspekoak ur azpitik bidaiatzeko eta urpean luzaroan egoteko diseinatutako ontziak dira. I. eta II. Mundu Gerran erabili ziren itsaspekoak. Garai hartan, oso mantsoak ziren eta tiro-irismen oso mugatua zuten. Gerraren hasieran itsaso gainean bidaiatzen zuten batez ere, baina radarra garatzen eta zehatzagoa bihurtzen joan zen heinean, itsaspekoak urpera sartzera behartu zituzten, arerioek ikus ez zitzaten. Alemaniako itsaspekoen izena U-Boot zen. Alemaniarrak oso onak ziren beren itsaspekoak gidatzen eta erabiltzen. Itsaspekoekin zuten arrakasta dela-eta, gerraren ostean alemanei ez zitzaien utzi halako askorik izaten.
mt: Submarines are designed to operate underwater and to stay submerged for extended periods. They were used extensively in World War I and World War II. In the early days of the war, they were used primarily on the surface, but as radar became more sophisticated and more accurate, they were forced to submerge to avoid being detected by the enemy. The German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at operating and using their submarines. Because of their success, the Germans were not allowed to have as many after the war.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: 1939ko irailaren 17rako, Poloniako defentsa apurtuta zegoen jada, eta itxaropen bakarra erretiratzea eta Errumaniako zubi-buruan zehar berrantolatzea zen. Hala ere, ia gauetik egunera plan horiek zaharkituta geratu ziren, Sobietar Batasuneko Armada Gorriko 800.000 soldadu sartu eta Bielorrusiako eta Ukrainako fronteak sortu zituztenean, Poloniako ekialdeko eskualdeak inbaditu ondoren, eta, hala, Rigako Bake Hitzarmena, Eraso ez egiteko Sobietarren eta Poloniarren arteko hitzarmena eta nazioarteko beste hitzarmen batzuk urratu ziren, bi aldetakoak nahiz alde ugaritakoak.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganize across the bridgehead in Romania. However, this plan was soon outdated, when 800,000 Red Army soldiers entered Poland, after the invasion of the eastern regions of Poland, and thus, the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and other international agreements were violated, by both sides and by many others.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Hasiera-hasieratik okertu zitzaien egoera italiarrei Afrika iparraldean. 1940ko ekainaren 10ean gerra deklaratu eta astebetera, britainiarren XI. husarrak Libiako Capuzzo Gotorlekua bereganatuta zuen. Bardiatik ekialdera egindako segada batean, italiarren hamargarren armadako ingeniari burua, Lastucci jenerala, harrapatu zuten britainiarrek. Ekainaren 28an, aldeko bandoak egindako eraso batean hil zuten Italo Balbo mariskala, Libiako Gobernadore nagusia eta Mussoliniren ustezko ondorengoa, Tobruk hirian lur hartzen ari zenean.
mt: 1940 June 10, the war was declared by Italy in North Africa. Eleven days later, British XI Hussars took Capuzzo Fortress in Libya. In a sweep east of Bardia, the commander of the ninth army engineers, General Lastucci, was captured by the British. On June 28, the retreating side killed Italo Balbo, Governor General of Libya and Mussolini's supposed heir, when he was landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibetar budismoa Buda-ren irakaskuntzetan oinarrituta dago, baina maitasunaren mahayana bidearekin eta Indiako yoga-ko teknika ugarirekin hedatu zen. Printzipioz, Tibetar budismoa oso sinplea da. Kundalini yoga, meditazioa eta guztia barnean hartzen duen maitasunaren bidea ditu osagai. Kundalini yogan, yogako gorputz-jarrerekin, arnasketa-ariketekin, mantrekin eta bistaratzeekin pizten da Kundalini energia (argialdiaren energia). Tibetar meditazioaren gunea Jainkoaren yoga da. Hainbat jainko bistaratuta energia-kanalak garbitu egiten dira, txakrak aktibatu egiten dira eta argialdiaren kontzientzia sortzen da.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but was spread with the Mahayana path of love and many Indian yoga techniques. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and the path of love that includes everything. In Kundalini yoga, the body postures of yoga, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations awaken Kundalini energy (light energy). The center of Tibetan meditation is the yoga of God. Several gods are visualized, energy channels are cleaned, chakras are activated and the consciousness of light is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Programa 8:30ean (pm) hasi zen (15:00 UTC). Herrialde osoko abeslari famatuek bhajan-ak (erlijio-abestiak) abestu zituzten Shri Shyam-en oinen ondoan. Sanju Sharma abeslaria hasi zen, eta ondoren Jai Shankar Choudhary-k abestu zuen. chhappan bhog bhajan ere bai. Raju Khandelwal abeslariak berarekin abestu zuen. Ondoren, Lakkha Singh-ek hartu zuen bhajan-ak abesteko ardura. Chhappan Bhog-en 108 plater (hinduismoan, jainkoari eskaintzen zaizkion 56 elementu jangarri, hala nola gozoak, frutak, fruitu lehorrak, platerak eta abar) zerbitzatu zizkioten Baba Shyam-i. Lakkha Singh-ek chhappan bhog bhajan-a ere aurkeztu zuen, eta Raju Khandelwal abeslariak berarekin abestu zuen.
mt: 8:30 pm (15:00 UTC) was the start of the program. Famous singers from all over the country sang bhajans (religious songs) in front of Shri Shyam. Sanju Sharma started singing, and then Jai Shankar Choudhary sang. chhappan bhog bhajan was also sung. Raju Khandelwal singer sang with him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the responsibility to sing bhajans. Chhappan Bhog was served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also presented chhappan bhog bhajan, and Raju Khandelwal singer sang with him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Programa 8:30ean (pm) hasi zen (15:00 UTC). Herrialde osoko abeslari famatuek bhajan-ak (erlijio-abestiak) abestu zituzten Shri Shyam-en oinen ondoan. Sanju Sharma abeslaria hasi zen, eta ondoren Jai Shankar Choudhary-k abestu zuen. chhappan bhog bhajan ere bai. Raju Khandelwal abeslariak berarekin abestu zuen. Ondoren, Lakkha Singh-ek hartu zuen bhajan-ak abesteko ardura. Chhappan Bhog-en 108 plater (hinduismoan, jainkoari eskaintzen zaizkion 56 elementu jangarri, hala nola gozoak, frutak, fruitu lehorrak, platerak eta abar) zerbitzatu zizkioten Baba Shyam-i. Lakkha Singh-ek chhappan bhog bhajan-a ere aurkeztu zuen, eta Raju Khandelwal abeslariak berarekin abestu zuen.
mt: 8:30 pm (15:00 UTC) was the start of the program. Famous singers from all over the country sang bhajans (religious songs) in front of Shri Shyam. Sanju Sharma started singing, and then Jai Shankar Choudhary sang. chhappan bhog bhajan was also sung. Raju Khandelwal singer sang with him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the responsibility to sing bhajans. Chhappan Bhog was served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also presented chhappan bhog bhajan, and Raju Khandelwal singer sang with him.

Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Ospakizunen hasieran, mundu osoan ezaguna den Cirque du Soleil-ek saio berezia eman zuen. Ondoren, Istanbuleko Estatuko Orkestra Sinfonikoak jo zuen, eta Janissary banda batek eta Fatih Erkoç eta Müslüm Gürses abeslariek parte hartu zuten. Ondoren, Derbitxe Birakariak igo ziren antzeztokira. Turkiako diva Sezen Aksu-k Alessandro Safina tenore italiarrarekin eta Haris Alexiou abeslari greziarrarekin abestu zuen. Amaitzeko, Fire of Anatolia dantza-talde turkiarrak “Troy” emanaldia antzeztu zuen.
mt: The opening ceremony featured Cirque du Soleil, a world-famous circus. The Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra then played, followed by a Janissary band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Next, the Derbent Dancers ascended to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu sang with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. Finally, the Turkish dance troupe Fire of Anatolia performed "Troy".
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Bidaiariei ura eman zitzaien 90(F) gradutan zain zeuden bitartean. Scott Kouns suhiltzaileen kapitainaren esanean, “Egun beroa zen Santa Clara-n, eta tenperaturak 90(F) gradutik gorakoak ziren. Errusiar mendi batean harrapatuta igarotako denbora deserosoa izan zen, besterik ezean, eta ordubete baino gehiago behar izan zen atrakziotik lehen pertsona ateratzeko.”
mt: 90(F) degree temperatures were waiting for the passengers. "It was a hot day in Santa Clara, and the temperatures were in the 90s. It was a long, uncomfortable time on the Russian mountain, and it took more than an hour to get the first person off the slide," said Scott Kouns, the fire captain.
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Azken txostenaren arabera, itsas-mailaren erregistroak erakutsi du tsunami bat sortu zela. Tsunami-jarduera argia erregistratu zen Pago Pago eta Niue inguruan. Ez da kalteen edo zaurituen berri eman Tonga-n, baina argindarra eten egin zen aldi batean, eta, diotenez, horren erruz ez zuten jaso Tonga-ko agintariek PTWC-k igorritako tsunami-alerta. Hawaii-n, kostan edo kostatik gertu zeuden hamalau eskola itxita zeuden asteazkenean, nahiz eta alerta-egoera amaitu den.
mt: The latest report states that the sea level record shows a tsunami was generated. Strong tsunami activity was recorded around Pago Pago and Niue. No reports of damage or injuries have been received from Tonga, but power was briefly cut off, and, according to reports, this is why the Tongan authorities did not receive the PTWC tsunami alert. In Hawaii, sixteen schools were closed on Monday, although the alert was lifted.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, Zeelanda Berriko A1GP taldeko kopilotua, historiako zerrendetan sartu da, legea betez, Auckland-eko 48 urteko Harbour Bridge zubitik (Zeelanda Berria) inor baino azkarrago igaro ondoren. Reid-ek Zeelanda Berriko A1GP autoa, Black Beauty, gidatu zuen eta zazpi aldiz igaro zen zubiaren gainetik 160 km/h-ra. Zeelanda Berriko poliziak arazoak izan zituen abiadura neurtzeko radar-pistola erabiltzeko eta Reid zein abiaduran zihoan neurtzeko, Black Beauty oso baxua delako. 160 km/h-ko abiadurara jaitsi zenean soilik lortu zuen Poliziak Reid harrapatzea.
mt: 48-year-old Jonny Reid, co-driver for the New Zealand A1GP team, has entered the record books by driving across the Harbour Bridge in Auckland, New Zealand, faster than anyone else in history. Reid drove the New Zealand A1GP car, Black Beauty, and crossed the bridge seven times at 160 km/h. The New Zealand police had trouble measuring the speed of Reid's car, as it was so low to the ground. They were only able to catch him when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Lurrikara ahul batek jo zuen mendebaldeko Montana astelehenean (10:08 pm). Ez da inolako kalteren berri jaso ez Estatu Batuetako Azterketa Geologikoen taldean (USGS) ez haren Lurrikaren Informaziorako Zentro Nazionalean. Dillon-etik 20 km (15 milia) ipar-ekialdera eta Butte-tik 65 km-ra (40 milia) zegoen lurrikararen erdigunea.
mt: A weak earthquake struck western Montana on Monday (10:08 pm). No damage has been reported by the U.S. Geological Survey or its National Earthquake Information Center. The epicenter was 20 km (15 miles) northeast of Dillon and 65 km (40 miles) from Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Irakeko Abu Gharib kartzelan sua piztu da istilu baten ondorioz. Kartzela ezaguna egin zen, AEBetako militarrek haren agintea hartu zutenean presoek jasandako abusuak ezagun egin zirenean.
mt: A fire broke out in the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq as a result of a riot. The prison became notorious when American military took control of it and the abuse of prisoners became known.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Bandak Maui-ko War Memorial estadioan zuen ikuskizuna bertan behera utzi zuen. 9.000 pertsona ziren bertaratzekoak, eta bandak barkamena eskatu zien zaleei. Bandaren kudeaketa-enpresak, HK Management Inc.-ek, hasiera batean ez zuen aipatu zergatik utzi zuen ikuskizuna bertan behera irailaren 20an, baina hurrengo egunean arazo logistikoak aipatu zituen.
mt: 9,000 people were expected to attend the concert at the War Memorial Stadium in Maui. The band apologized to fans. The concert's promoter, HK Management Inc., initially did not say why the concert was canceled on September 20, but the next day cited logistical issues.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Azaldu dutenez, harrapaketek gau osoan zehar jarraitu zuten, poliziarik ez baitzegoen Bishkek-eko kaleetan. Lekuko baten esanean, Bishkek “anarkiara” bidean zegoen, pertsona taldeak kaleetan gora eta behera zebiltzalako dendatako produktuak harrapatzen. Bishkek-eko biztanle askok hegoaldeko manifestariei egotzi zien anarkia-egoera.
mt: Witnesses say Bishkek was in a state of anarchy as looters roamed the streets all night long, with no police in sight. One witness said that people were going up and down the streets, looting shops. Many Bishkek residents blamed the southern protesters for the anarchy.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Horren aurretik, Jamie Siminoff-ek, Ring-eko zuzendari exekutiboak, azaldu zuen garajeko tailerretik etxeko txirrina entzun ezin zelako abian jarri zuela enpresa. WiFi txirrin bat sortu zuela esan zuen. Siminoff-en esanean, 2013an Shark Tank saioaren atal batean agertu ondoren handitu ziren salmentak, saioko epaileek enpresa abian jartzeko dirulaguntza ez ematea erabaki ondoren. 2017 amaiera aldera, QVC erosketa telebista-kanalean agertu zen Siminoff. Horrez gain, Ring-ek haren lehiakide zen ADT Corporation segurtasun-enpresarekin zuen auzia ebatzi zen.
mt: Before that, Jamie Siminoff, the CEO of Ring, said that he was unable to get his garage door opener to work from his home. He said that he invented a WiFi garage door opener. Siminoff said that sales increased after he appeared on an episode of Shark Tank in 2013, when the show's judges decided not to fund the company to get it off the ground. By the end of 2017, Siminoff appeared on QVC, a shopping television channel. In addition, Ring's lawsuit against its competitor ADT Corporation was settled.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Sesamo auzoa eta Rogers jaunaren auzoa baino denbora gutxiagoz jardun duen arren, bi dozena Emmy sari baino gehiago ditu PBS saio honek. Saioko atal bakoitzak liburu baten gaian jartzen du arreta eta, ondoren, gai hori lantzen da hainbat istorioren bidez. Halaber, haurrek liburutegian bila ditzaketen liburuen gomendioak ere ematen ditu saio bakoitzak. Honako hau esan zuen WNED Buffalo-ko (Reading Rainbow-en irrati-etxea) John Grant-ek: «Reading Rainbow ikuskizunak irakurtzearen arrazoia azaldu die haurrei, irakurtzeko zaletasuna; halaber, [saioak] haurrak liburu bat hartu eta irakurtzera animatu ditu». Batzuek diote, besteak beste, John Grant-ek, finantzaketa faltak eta telebista pedagogikoaren programazioaren inguruko filosofiak bultzatu dutela telesailen amaiera.
mt: Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood have been on the air for less than half as long, but Reading Rainbow has won more than a dozen Emmys. Each episode focuses on a particular book and then explores that topic through several stories. It also provides book recommendations for children to look for in the library. John Grant of WNED in Buffalo (the Reading Rainbow radio station) said, "Reading Rainbow shows children why they should read, and it inspires them to pick up a book and read." Some have attributed the show's end to funding issues and the philosophy of educational television programming.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amsterdam hiriko agintariek eta Anne Frank Museoak esan dutenez, zuhaitza onddo batek infektatu du eta publikoarentzat arriskutsua da, edozein unetan erortzeko arriskua baitu. Asteartean ebakitzea programatuta zegoen, baina epaitegiko larrialdiko agindu batek salbatu zuen.
mt: Officials in Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum say the tree has been infected by a fungus and is dangerous to the public, as it could fall at any time. It was scheduled to be cut down on Monday, but a court injunction has saved it.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Animalien Askapenak eta Animaliekiko Krudeltasuna Prebenitzeko Errege-sozietateak (RSPCA) berriro aldarrikatu dute Australiako hiltegietan zaintza-kamerak instalatzeko derrigortasuna. Hegoaldeko Gales Berriko RSPCAko inspektore nagusi David O'Shannessy-k esan dio ABCri hiltegien zaintza eta ikuskapenek ohiko izan beharko luketela Australian. “Zaintza-kamerek argi adieraziko liekete animaliekin lanean ari diren pertsonei animalien ongizatea dela lehentasun nagusia.”
mt: The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) has again called for mandatory CCTV in Australian abattoirs. RSPCA South Australia chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that animal welfare should be the top priority for staff working in abattoirs. "CCTV would make it clear to staff that animal welfare is the number one priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Albistea denon ahotan dabil Red Lake komunitatean, martxoaren 21eko eskolako tiroketekin erlazionatuta beste ikasle bat atxilotu baitute, Jeff Weiseren eta bederatzi biktimetako hiruren hileta ospatzen ari zirela. Gaurko atxiloketa baieztatzeaz gain, ezer gutxi adierazi dute autoritateek. Hala ere, ikerketari buruzko informazioa duen iturri batek adierazi dio Minneapolis Star-Tribune-ri Louis Jourdain izan dela, Red Lake tribuaren lehendakari Floyd Jourdain-en 16 urteko semea. Oraindik ere ez da zehaztu atxilotuari zein kargu egotziko dizkioten, ezta autoritateak mutilarengana zerk gidatu dituen ere. Edonola ere, martxan jarri dute adingabekoei zuzendutako prozesu judiziala auzitegi federalean.
mt: 21 March 2005 school shooting in Red Lake, Minnesota, USA, is still in the news. Another student has been arrested, Jeff Weiser, while attending the funeral of one of the nine victims. Authorities have not released any information on the arrest, but a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that the student was Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Floyd Jourdain, the tribal chairman of the Red Lake tribe. It is not known what charges the student will face, or what led authorities to the student. A federal court has been convened to hear the case.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Protestaren antolatzaileen arabera, 100.000 pertsona agertu ziren Alemaniako hainbat hiritan, hala nola Berlinen, Kolonian, Hanburgon eta Hannoverren. Berlinen, 6.500 manifestari inguru egon zirela kalkulatu du poliziak. Parisen, Sofian (Bulgaria), Vilniusen (Lituania), Valettan (Malta), Tallinnen (Estonia) eta Edinburgon eta Glasgowen (Eskozia) ere protestak egin ziren. Londresen, 200 lagun inguruk protesta egin dute egile-eskubideen hainbat jabe nagusiren bulegoen aurrean. Pasa den hilean, protesta jendetsuak egin ziren Polonian, herrialdeak datuak faltsutzearen aurkako akordioa (ACTA) sinatzearen ondorioz eta, haiei esker, Poloniako gobernuak ez du akordioa berretsiko oraingoz. Bai Letoniak bai Eslovakiak atzeratu egin dute ACTAn sartzeko prozesua.
mt: 100,000 people reportedly protested in several German cities, including Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover. Berlin police estimated 6,500 protesters. Protests were also held in Paris, Sofia (Bulgaria), Vilnius (Lithuania), Valletta (Malta), Tallinn (Estonia) and Edinburgh and Glasgow (Scotland). In London, about 200 people protested outside the offices of several major copyright holders. In the past week, large protests were held in Poland, in response to the country signing the ACTA agreement (Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement), which would allow the government to block websites accused of copyright infringement. Both Latvia and Slovakia have delayed the process of signing the ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Gaizki funtzionatu eta gehiegi berotu diren iPod-en 60 kasu ingururen berri eman da; guztira, sei sute eragin dituzte, eta lau pertsonak erredura arinak izan dituzte. Japoniako Ekonomia, Merkataritza eta Industria Ministerioak (METI) adierazi duenez, gailuarekin erlazionatutako 27 gorabeheraren berri izan du. Azken astean, METIk azaldu zuen Apple-k gehiegi berotzearen beste 34 kasu jaso zituela, eta, enpresaren esanean, “arinak” izan zirela. Ministerioak erantzun zuen esanez “guztiz deitoragarria” zela Apple-k kasuen berri beranduago eman izana.
mt: 60 cases of iPods malfunctioning and overheating have been reported; six fires and four minor burns have resulted. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) has reported 27 other incidents related to the device. Last week, Apple reported 34 more cases of overheating, and the company said they were “minor.” METI responded by saying it was “regrettable” that Apple had waited so long to report the incidents.
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: Steve Jobs Apple-ko zuzendari exekutiboa eszenatokira igo zen, praketako poltsikotik iPhone-a atera eta gailua erakutsi zuen. Bi ordutako hitzaldian esan zuenez, “gaur Apple-k telefonoa berrasmatu behar du. Historia idatzi behar dugu gaur.”
mt: Steve Jobs, Apple's CEO, walked on stage, pulled an iPhone from his pocket, and held it up. In a two-hour presentation, he said, "Today Apple has to reinvent the phone. We have to write the next chapter of this story."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner senatariak eta Argentinako lehen damak lehendakari izateko hauteskundeetarako hautagaitzaren berri eman zuen atzo iluntzean La Plata-n, Buenos Aires-etik 50 kilometrora (31 miliara) dagoen hirian. Kirschner-ek Argentina Antzokian azaldu zuen bere helburua lehendakari izatea dela. Toki berean iragarri zuen 2005ean senatari izateko kanpaina, Buenos Aires-eko probintziako ordezkaritzako kide zenean.
mt: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, senator and wife of the president of Argentina, announced her candidacy for the presidency in a speech in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. She said her goal was to be president. She also announced her candidacy for senator in 2005, when she was a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMAk aurkitu duenez, gainera, bideoa Internet bidez igorri bada ere, Big Brother saioak ez ditu sareko edukien zentsura-legeak urratu, edukia ez baitzen gorde Big Brother-en webgunean. Irrati-difusio zerbitzuen legeak Interneteko edukia erregulatzen du, baina Interneteko eduki gisa hartzeko, zerbitzari batean egon behar du fisikoki.
mt: In addition, the ACMA has found that if the video was broadcast over the Internet, it did not breach the censorship laws for content on the Internet, as the content was not stored on the Big Brother website.  The laws regulating radio broadcasting services apply to Internet content, but only if it is physically stored on a server as Internet content.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Peter Costello-k, Australiako diruzainak, ditu alderdi liberaleko buru gisa John Howard lehen ministroaren ondorengo izateko aukera gehien, eta Australian indar nuklearraren industria sortzearen alde egin du. Costello-k esan du Australiak indar nuklearraren sorkuntza bultzatu beharko lukeela haren erabilera ekonomikoki bideragarria izatera iristen denean. “Komertziala bihurtzen bada, eduki beharko genuke. Hau da, ez dago energia nuklearraren kontrako objekziorik” esan du Costello-k.
mt: Peter Costello, Australia's treasurer, is the leading contender to replace John Howard as Liberal Party leader, and has advocated the development of nuclear power in Australia. Costello has said that Australia should pursue the development of nuclear power when it becomes economically viable. "If it becomes commercial, we will have to have it. That is, there is no objection to nuclear energy," Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Eguneko hemezortzi domina bakarrik daudenez eskura, herrialde askok ez dute lortu podiumera iristea. Horien artean daude Herbehereak, Anna Jochemsen-ek bederatzigarren amaitu baitzuen emakumeen Super-G zutikako klasean, baita Finlandia ere, Katja Saarinen-ek hamargarren amaitu baitzuen proba berean. Australiako Mitchell Gourley-k hamaikagarren amaitu zuen gizonezkoen Super-G zutikako klasean. Txekiako Oldrich Jelinek-ek, berriz, hamaseigarren amaitu zuen gizonezkoen Super-G eseritako klasean. Mexikoko Arly Velasquez-ek hamabosgarren amaitu zuen gizonezkoen Super-G eseritako klasean. Zeelanda Berriko Adam Hall-ek bederatzigarren amaitu zuen Super-G eseritako klasean. Poloniako Maciej Krezel eskiatzaile itsuak eta Anna Ogarzynska gidak hamahirugarren amaitu zuten Super-G proban. Hego Koreako Jon Seork Park-ek hogeita laugarren amaitu zuen Super-G eseritako klasean.
mt: 18 medals are available for the day, so many countries are unable to reach the podium. Among them are the Netherlands, where Anna Jochemsen finished 8th in the women's Super-G standing event, Finland, where Katja Saarinen finished 9th in the same event, Australia, where Mitchell Gourley finished 15th in the men's Super-G standing event, Czech Republic, where Oldrich Jelinek finished 16th in the men's Super-G sitting event, Mexico, where Arly Velasquez finished 6th in the men's Super-G sitting event, New Zealand, where Adam Hall finished 8th in the men's Super-G sitting event, Poland, where Maciej Krezel and Anna Ogarzynska finished 3rd in the Super-G event, South Korea, where Jon Seork Park finished 14th in the men's Super-G sitting event.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Birmingham-eko Gorteko Auzitegian egin zen epaiketa eta abuztuaren 3an amaitu zen. Tokian bertan atxilotu zuten aurkezleak erasoa ukatu zuen eta ziurtatu zuen zutoina erabili zuela hogeita hamar lagun inguru jaurtitzen ari zitzaizkion botilengandik babesteko. Justiziaren bidea oztopatzen saiatzeagatik ere zigortu zuten Blake. Epaileak espetxera joatea «ia saihestezina» zela adierazi zion Blake-ri.
mt: The trial took place in Birmingham Crown Court and ended on August 3. The speaker was arrested at the scene and denied the attack and assured that he used the can to protect himself from about twenty people throwing bottles at him. He was also punished for obstructing the course of justice. The judge told Blake that going to prison was "virtually inevitable".
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Birmingham-eko Gorteko Auzitegian egin zen epaiketa eta abuztuaren 3an amaitu zen. Tokian bertan atxilotu zuten aurkezleak erasoa ukatu zuen eta ziurtatu zuen zutoina erabili zuela hogeita hamar lagun inguru jaurtitzen ari zitzaizkion botilengandik babesteko. Justiziaren bidea oztopatzen saiatzeagatik ere zigortu zuten Blake. Epaileak espetxera joatea «ia saihestezina» zela adierazi zion Blake-ri.
mt: The trial took place in Birmingham Crown Court and ended on August 3. The speaker was arrested at the scene and denied the attack and assured that he used the can to protect himself from about twenty people throwing bottles at him. He was also punished for obstructing the course of justice. The judge told Blake that going to prison was "virtually inevitable".
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Bali-ko agendako gaien artean daude hauek: munduan geratzen diren basoak salbatzea, eta teknologiak partekatzea, garatzen ari diren herrialdeei era ez hain kutsatzailean hazten laguntzeko. Nazio Batuek, gainera, klima-aldaketak eragindako inpaktuak pairatuko dituzten herrialdeei laguntzeko funtsa osatu nahi du. Uholdeak jasateko gai diren etxeak eraikitzeko, uraren kudeaketa hobetzeko eta uztak dibertsifikatzeko erabili nahi da dirua.
mt: Among the issues on the Bali agenda are saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technology to help developing countries grow in a less polluting way. The United Nations also wants to set up a fund to help countries affected by climate change. The money is to be used to build homes that can withstand floods, improve water management and diversify crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigeria-k iragarri du AfCFTA hitzarmenarekin bat egingo duela goi-bileraren aurreko aste honetan. AUko merkataritza eta industria ordezkari Albert Muchanga-k iragarri du Benin-ek ere bat egingo duela. Ordezkariaren esanean, “Oraindik ez gara adostasunera iritsi jatorri-arauei eta tarifa-kontzesioei dagokienez, baina esku artean dugun markoa nahikoa da 2020ko uztailaren 1ean negozioekin hasteko”.
mt: Nigeria has announced that it will join the AfCFTA agreement before the next summit of the AU. The trade and industry representative Albert Muchanga has announced that Benin will also join. In his words, “We are not yet in agreement on the origin rules and tariff concessions, but the mark we have so far is enough to start business on July 1, 2020.”
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Kritikaren oniritzia lortu zuen Atlanta-n zegoen bitartean, eta hiri-hezkuntza berritzailearen arloan aritzeagatik aintzatetsi zuten. 2009an, Urteko Superintendente Nazionala titulua eman zioten. Saria jaso zuen garai berean, Atlanta-ko eskolek nabarmen hobetu zituzten azterketen emaitzak. Handik gutxira, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution egunkariak jakinarazi zuen azterketen emaitzekin arazoak zeudela. Erreportajeak erakutsi zuen probetako emaitzak normala dena baino azkarrago hobetu zirela, eta esan zuen eskolak, barneko arazoak detektatu arren, ez zuela horren inguruan ezer egin. Horren ondoren agertutako aztarnek erakutsi zuten azterketak faltsifikatu egin zirela, eta 2013an Hall eta hezkuntzako beste 34 funtzionario inputatu zituzten.
mt: 2009, while in Atlanta, she received the Critic's Choice Award for her work in urban education and was named National Superintendent of the Year. She received the award at a time when Atlanta schools had made significant improvements in test scores. Shortly thereafter, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reported that the test scores were inflated. The report showed that the test scores had been improved faster than normal, and that the schools had not done anything about internal problems. Subsequent investigations showed that the tests had been falsified, and in 2013 Hall and 34 other education officials were indicted.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Bonba batek eztanda egin zuen gobernadore nagusiaren bulegoan. Beste hiru bonbak eztanda egin zuten gobernuaren inguruko eraikinetan, bi orduko epean. Txosten batzuen arabera, zortzi dira hildakoak, eta txosten ofizialek diote ia 30 pertsona zauritu zirela; hala ere, oraindik ez dago azken kopururik.
mt: 1. A bomb exploded in the governor's office. 2. Three other bombs exploded in government buildings in the area over the next two hours. 3. Reports say eight are dead, and official reports say nearly 30 were injured; however, the final number is still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21 urteko Jesus iaz hasi zen Manchester City-n, 2017ko urtarrilean, Brasilgo Palmeiras klubari £27 milioi ordaindu eta gero. Ordutik, jokalari brasildarrak 53 partida jokatu ditu klubarekin hainbat lehiaketatan eta 24 gol egin ditu.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus started at Manchester City in January 2017, after being signed from Brazilian club Palmeiras for £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 games for the club in various competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Ostatu bat kolapsatu da Meka-n, islamaren hiri santuan, gaur goizeko 10:00etan (bertako ordutegia). Haj erromesaldian hiria bisitatzera etorritako erromes ugari zeuden eraikinean. Ostatuko gonbidatu gehienak Arabiar Emirerri Batu-etako biztanleak ziren. 15 hildako daude, gutxienez, baina gehiago izatea espero da.
mt: A hotel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam, at 10:00 am local time (0300 UTC). Many pilgrims visiting the city for the Haj were in the building. Most of the guests were citizens of the United Arab Emirates. At least 15 are dead, but more are expected.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: 1.000 libera baino gehiago pisatzen zuten eta 17.500 milia orduko abiaduran zihoazen bi sateliteek talka egin zuten Lurretik 491 miliara. Zientzialarien arabera, sekulakoa izan zen talkak eragindako leherketa. Talkaren tamaina eta Lurrean izan dezakeen eragina zehazten saiatzen ari dira oraindik. AEBetako Defentsa Sailaren zati den Estatu Batuetako Komando Estrategikoa ari da hondakinen jarraipena egiten. Analisi teknikoaren emaitza webgune publiko batean argitaratuko da.
mt: 1,000 pounds or more and traveling at 17,500 miles per hour, two satellites collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion was huge. They are still trying to determine the size of the collision and its impact on Earth. The U.S. Strategic Command, a part of the U.S. Department of Defense, is tracking the debris. The analysis will be posted on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Estatu Batuetako 400 pertsona aberatsenen 2008ko zerrendan, 190. postuan zegoen Batten, eta $2,3 mila milioi inguru zituela zenbatesten da. Virginia-ko Unibertsitatean graduatu zen 1950ean, Arte eta Zientzien fakultatean, eta erakundearen dohaintza-emaile nabarmena izan zen.
mt: 400 richest Americans in 2008, Batten was ranked 190th with an estimated $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia in 1950 with a degree in the College of Arts and Sciences, and was a prominent benefactor of the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Arnold Schwarzenegger Kalifornia-ko gobernadoreak lege bihurtu du adingabekoei bideo-joko bortitzak saltzea edo alokatzea debekatzen duen lege-proiektua. Lege-proiektuaren arabera, Kalifornia-ko estatuan saldutako bideo-joko bortitzek “18” jartzen duen itsasgarri bat izan behar dute, eta $1.000eko isuna jarriko da horiek adingabeei saltzen zaizkien bakoitzean.
mt: Arnold Schwarzenegger, governor of California, has signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in California to have an "18" rating, and a $1,000 fine for each game sold to minors.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Duvall ezkonduta dago eta bi seme-alaba heldu ditu, eta ez zuen eragin askorik izan Miller-engan, istorioa harekin erlazionatuta zegoen arren. Horren inguruko iritzia eskatu zitzaionean, Miller-ek honela esan zuen: “Mike-k asko hitz egiten du saioak irauten duen bitartean...Ni prestatzen ari nintzen, eta ez nengoen esaten ari zenari arreta jartzen.”
mt: Duvall is married and has two adult children, and the incident had little effect on Miller, who was related to the story. When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the show...I was getting ready, and I wasn't paying attention to what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Stephen Harpen lehen ministroak adostu du gobernuaren ‘Clean Air Act’ delakoa alderdi guztiekin osatutako batzorde batera bidaliko duela, berrikus dezan, bigarren aldiz irakurri aurretik, lehen ministroaren bulegoan Jack Layton NDPren buruarekin asteartean 25 minutuko bilera izan eta gero. Layton-ek kontserbadoreen ingurumeneko lege-proiektuan aldaketak egiteko eskatu zuen lehen ministroarekin izan zuen bileran, eta alderdi kontserbadorearen ingurumeneko lege-proiektua “goitik behera berridazteko” eskaera egin zuen. Gobernu Federalak Tasmaniako Devonport hiriko Mersey ospitaleko funtsen kontrola hartu duenetik, estatuko gobernuak eta parlamentu federaleko zenbait kidek ekintza hori kritikatu egin dute, eta azaroan abian jarriko diren hauteskunde federalei begira egindako mugimendu gisa ikusi dute. John Howard lehen ministroak esan du ekintza hori ospitalearen instalazioak babesteko egin dela, Tasmaniako gobernuak kategoriaz jaitsi aurretik, eta AUD$45 milioi gehigarri eman ditu.
mt: Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to a committee made up of all parties for review before a second reading, after a 25 minute meeting with Jack Layton NDP leader in the Prime Minister's office on Monday. Layton asked Harper to make changes to the Conservative's environment bill in their meeting, and asked for a "complete overhaul" of the Conservative's environment bill. The Federal government has taken control of the funds of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania since the state government and some members of the federal parliament have criticized the action, and have seen it as a move in the lead up to the federal elections in November. John Howard has said the action was taken to protect the hospital's facilities before the state government downgraded them, and has added an extra AUD$45 million.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Azido zianurikoa eta melamina aurkitu ziren kutsatutako animalia-janaria kontsumitu ondoren hil ziren etxeko animalien gernu-laginetan. Unibertsitateko ikerlariek esan zutenez, bi konposatuek elkarren artean erreakzionatu eta giltzurrunen funtzioa blokeatzen duten kristalak eratzen dituzte. Katuen gernuan melamina eta azido zianurikoa gehituta kristalak eratzen zirela behatu zuten ikerlariek. Kristal horien osaera bat dator kaltetutako maskoten gernuan aurkitutakoekin, espektroskopia infragorriaren (FTIR) bidez alderatu zirenean.
mt: Cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the urine of household pets that died after eating contaminated pet food. University researchers said the two compounds reacted with each other to form crystals that block kidney function. Researchers observed that crystals formed in the urine of cats when melamine and cyanuric acid were added. The composition of these crystals is similar to those found in the urine of affected pets, as determined by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: Azido zianurikoa eta melamina aurkitu ziren kutsatutako animalia-janaria kontsumitu ondoren hil ziren etxeko animalien gernu-laginetan. Unibertsitateko ikerlariek esan zutenez, bi konposatuek elkarren artean erreakzionatu eta giltzurrunen funtzioa blokeatzen duten kristalak eratzen dituzte. Katuen gernuan melamina eta azido zianurikoa gehituta kristalak eratzen zirela behatu zuten ikerlariek. Kristal horien osaera bat dator kaltetutako maskoten gernuan aurkitutakoekin, espektroskopia infragorriaren (FTIR) bidez alderatu zirenean.
mt: Cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the urine of household pets that died after eating contaminated pet food. University researchers said the two compounds reacted with each other to form crystals that block kidney function. Researchers observed that crystals formed in the urine of cats when melamine and cyanuric acid were added. The composition of these crystals is similar to those found in the urine of affected pets, as determined by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua-k esan zuen gobernuko ikertzaileek hegaldia grabatu zuten bi ‘kutxa beltz’ berreskuratu zituztela asteazkenean. Borrokalari kideek ere omendu egin zuten Luna. Tommy Dreamer-en esanean, “Luna izan zen lehen Queen of the Extreme. Nire lehen managerra. Luna bi ilargiko gau batean hil zen. Gau berezia, bera bezalakoa. Emakume indartsua.” Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels-ek esan zuenez, “Luna ni bezain frikia zen… agian ni baino gehiago… maite dut eta faltan botako dut… toki hobean egotea espero dut.”"
mt: "Xinhua reported that government researchers had recovered two "black boxes" from the flight on Monday. Wrestling rivals also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first Queen of the Extreme. My first manager. Luna died on a full moon night. A special night, like her. A strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels said, "Luna was as crazy as me... maybe more... I love her and miss her... I hope to be with her in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Autoak etxearen kontra talka egitean etxe barruan hiru pertsona bazeuden ere, hiruetako bat ere ez da zauritu. Hala ere, gidariak zauri larriak ditu buruan. Istripuaren agertoki izan den errepidea aldi baterako itxi zen, larrialdietako zerbitzuek gidaria Audi TT gorritik atera bitartean. Hasieran, Great Yarmouth-eko James Paget ospitalera eraman zuten. Ondoren, Addenbrooke’s ospitalera (Cambridge) eraman zuten.
mt: 3 people were in the house when the car crashed into the house, but none of them were injured. However, the driver has serious head injuries. The road was closed temporarily while emergency services removed the driver from the Audi TT. He was first taken to James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth, but was later taken to Addenbrooke’s Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Partidak goizeko 10etan hasi ziren, eguraldi ederrak lagunduta. Goiz erdian euri-lanbroa bota zuen, baina berehala garbitu zuen eta egun ezin hobea izan zen 7ko errugbian aritzeko. Hego Afrika zen serieko buru eta ezin hobe hasi zen, 26 eta 00 irabazi baitzion seriearen 5. postuan zegoen Zambiari. Hegoaldeko ahizpen aurkako jokoan okerxeago ari zirela zirudien arren, pixkanaka hobetzen joan zen Hego Afrika, txapelketak aurrera egin ahala. Euren defentsa diziplinatuari, baloia maneiatzeko abileziari eta taldeko lan bikainari esker, gailendu egin ziren eta argi geratu zen eurena zela garaitu beharreko taldea.
mt: 10am, the weather was perfect. A morning shower was brought in, but it quickly cleared and the day was perfect for a 7pm start. South Africa was in charge of the series and started off perfectly, beating Zambia, who were in 5th place in the series, 26-0. It seemed as though they were going to lose the match against their southern sister, but they slowly improved as the series went on. Their disciplined defense, ability to handle the ball, and great team work allowed them to win and it was clear that they were the team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Azken hiru hamarkadetan, ofizialki estatu komunista izaten jarraitzen duen arren, merkatu-ekonomia garatu du Txinak. Deng Xiaoping-en gidaritzapean egin ziren lehen erreforma ekonomikoak. Ordutik, 90 aldiz hazi da Txinaren tamaina ekonomikoa. Iaz lehen aldiz, Txinak Alemaniak baino auto gehiago esportatu zituen; Estatu Batuak gainditu eta industria horren merkaturik handiena bihurtu da. Txinako BPG Estatu Batuena baino handiagoa izan daiteke bi hamarkada barru.
mt: In the last three decades, China has developed a market economy, officially remaining a communist state. Under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping, the first economic reforms were made. Since then, China's economic size has grown 90 times. For the first time, China has exported more cars than Germany; it has surpassed the United States and become the world's largest car industry market. China's GDP could be larger than the United States in two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: “GDP unitateko karbono dioxidoaren igorpenak nabarmen murriztuko ditugu 2020rako, 2005eko mailarekin alderatuta” esan du Hu-k. Ez du murrizketen zenbakirik eman, haren esanean Txinako emaitza ekonomikoetan oinarrituta egingo baitira. Hu-k garapen bidean dauden herrialdeei eskatu die “orain arte kutsatu eta gero garbitzean oinarritutako bidea alde batera uzteko”. Gehitu duenez, “ez litzaieke behartu beharko haien garapen-mailatik, arduratik eta gaitasunetik haratago dauden betebeharrik betetzera.”
mt: “We will significantly reduce the carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by 2020, compared with 2005,” Hu said. He did not give specific targets, saying they would be based on China’s economic performance. Hu urged developing countries to “abandon the path of development through polluting first and cleaning up later.” He added, “We cannot ask them to bear responsibilities beyond their development level, capacity and ability.”
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Mangola erakunde medikoak, Medecines Sans Frontieres eta Munduko Osasun Erakundeak esan dutenez, herrialdean erregistratu den agerraldirik okerrena da. Medecines Sans Frontieres erakundeko bozeramaile Richard Veerman-en esanean, “Angolak inoiz izan duen agerraldirik okerrenera bideratuta dago eta egoerak txarra izaten jarraitzen du Angolan.”
mt: The medical organization Médecins Sans Frontières and the World Health Organization say it is the worst outbreak ever recorded in the country. Médecins Sans Frontières spokesman Richard Veerman said, "It is the worst outbreak Angola has ever seen and the situation is getting worse in Angola."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Salaketa Publikoen zuzendari Kier Starmer QC-k gaur goizean emandako adierazpenean iragarri du Huhne-k eta Pryce-k, biek, salaketak jaso dituztela. Huhne-k dimititu egin du eta Ed Davey parlamentuko kideak ordezkatuko du kabinetean. Norman Lamb parlamentuko kideak, berriz, Davey-k utziko duen Negozioen Ministro postua hartuko du. Programatutakoaren arabera, otsailaren 16an agertuko dira Huhne eta Pryce Westminster-eko Epaitegian.
mt: 8:30 am (UK time) - The Director of Public Prosecutions, Keir Starmer QC, has announced that Chris Huhne and Vicky Pryce have been charged with perverting the course of justice. Huhne has resigned and Ed Davey will replace him in the cabinet. Norman Lamb will take over Davey's Business Secretary role. Huhne and Pryce are due to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Frantziako operan Camille Saint-Saens-ek aurkeztu zuen istorioko protagonista artista bat zen, “zeinen bizitza drogengatik eta Japoniagatik sentitzen duen maitasunak gidatzen baitu”. Hori dela eta, antzezleek kalamua erretzen dute antzeztokian, eta ikusleak berdin egitera animatzen ditu antzezlanak berak.
mt: In the French production, Camille Saint-Saens introduced a historic protagonist artist, "whose life is guided by love of drugs and Japan".  As a result, actors smoke opium on stage, and the play itself encourages the audience to do the same.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonov, “11. kosmonauta” izenez ere ezaguna, Sobiet Batasuneko kosmonauten jatorrizko taldeko kidea izan zen. 1965eko martxoaren 18an, ibilgailuz kanpoko lehen gizaki-jarduera (EVA) edo “espazioko ibilaldia” egin zuen, eta hamabi minutuz egon zen espazio-ontzitik kanpo. Egindako lanagatik “Sobietar Batasuneko Heroia” izendapena jaso zuen, Sobietar Batasuneko ohorerik handiena. Hamar urte beranduago, Apollo-Soyuz misioaren alde sobietarra gidatu zuen; misio horrek espazioko lasterketaren amaiera ekarri zuen.
mt: Leonov, also known as the "Eleventh Cosmonaut", was a member of the original group of Soviet cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extravehicular activity (EVA) by a human being, and spent twelve minutes outside the spacecraft. For this work he was awarded the title of Hero of the Soviet Union, the highest honor in the Soviet Union. Ten years later, he led the Soviet side of the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, which marked the end of the space race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Istripua gertatu ondoren, Gibson ospitalera eraman zuten baina iritsi eta gutxira hil zen. 64 urteko kamioi gidaria ez zen zauritu istripuan. Ibilgailua egun bereko 12:00etan (GMT) kendu zuten istripua gertatu zen tokitik. Istripua gertatu zen tokitik gertu dagoen garaje bateko langilearen esanean, “haurrak errepidea gurutzatzeko zain zeuden, guztiak oihuka eta negarrez.” Guztiek korrika alde egin zuten istripua gertatu zen tokitik.
mt: 64-year-old truck driver was not injured in the crash. The vehicle was removed from the crash site at 12:00 GMT. A worker at a nearby garage, "the children were crossing the road, all screaming and crying." Everyone ran away from the crash site.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Egindako lanaren gehiengoa teoriakoa zen, baina Sagitario galaxian egindako behaketak simulatzeko idatzi zen programa. Taldea bilatzen ari zen efektua galaxiako materia ilunaren eta Esne Bideko materia ilunaren arteko marea-indarrek eragindakoa izango litzateke. Ilargiak Lurrean eragiten duen indarrak mareak sortzen dituen era berean, Esne Bideak indarra eragiten du Sagitario galaxian. Zientzialariek ondorioztatu ahal izan zuten materia ilunak beste materia ilunean eragina duela, materia arruntak duen era berean. Teoria honek esaten duenez, galaxiaren inguruko materia ilun gehiena halo baten gisan dago galaxiaren inguruan eta partikula txiki ugariz eginda dago.
mt: The team's work was mostly theoretical, but the program they wrote to simulate the effect in the Sagittarius galaxy. The team concluded that the effect would be caused by the tides between the dark matter of the Sagittarius galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way. Like the tides the moon causes on Earth, the Milky Way exerts a gravitational pull on the Sagittarius galaxy. The team was able to conclude that dark matter has an effect on other dark matter, in the same way that ordinary matter does. The theory says that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in a halo around the galaxy and is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

Zientzialariek ondorioztatu ahal izan zuten materia ilunak beste materia ilunean eragina duela, materia arruntak duen era berean. Teoria honek esaten duenez, galaxiaren inguruko materia ilun gehiena halo baten gisan dago galaxiaren inguruan eta partikula txiki ugariz eginda dago.
mt: The team's work was mostly theoretical, but the program they wrote to simulate the effect in the Sagittarius galaxy. The team concluded that the effect would be caused by the tides between the dark matter of the Sagittarius galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way. Like the tides the moon causes on Earth, the Milky Way exerts a gravitational pull on the Sagittarius galaxy. The team was able to conclude that dark matter has an effect on other dark matter, in the same way that ordinary matter does. The theory says that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in a halo around the galaxy and is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Katrina urakanaren ondoren laguntzetan eta berreraikitzean gastatutako diruaren inguruko gorabeherak piztu zuen eztabaida. Zenbait legegile kontserbadorek “Bush-en New Orleans-eko negozioa” izena ezarri zioten umorez. Itxuraz, Washington-eko informazio pribilegiatua zutenei berreraikuntza-kontratuak ematean zentratu dira liberalek berreraikitzeko ahaleginei egindako kritikak.
mt: A debate was sparked over the fluctuations in the amount of money spent on relief and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina. Some conservative lawmakers jokingly referred to "Bush's New Orleans business deal." It appears that liberals have focused their criticism of rebuilding efforts on the fact that privileged information in Washington has been used to award rebuilding contracts.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Kapsula Lurrera iritsi eta atmosferan sartzen denean, goizeko 5:00ak inguruan (ekialdeko ordua), argi-espektakulu ikusgarria izango dute Kalifornia iparraldeko, Oregon-eko, Nevada-ko eta Utah-ko biztanleek. Kapsulak zerua zeharkatzen duen izar uxo baten antz handia izango du. Kapsula 12,8 km edo 8 milia segundoko abiaduran joango da, San Francisco-tik Los Angeles-era minutu batean iristeko bezain azkar. Stardust-ek errekor berria ezarriko du Lurrera itzuli den espazio-ontzi azkarrena izategatik. Aurreko errekorra 1969ko maiatzean ezarri zen Apolo X-aren komando-modulua itzultzean. “Kalifornia iparraldeko mendebaldeko kostan zehar mugituko da, eta zerua argituko du Kalifornia-tik Oregon erdialdera, Nevada eta Idaho zeharkatu eta Utah-raino iritsi arte” esan du Tom Duxbury-k, Stardust-en proiektuburuak.
mt: The capsule will enter the atmosphere and land at around 5:00 am local time (1300 UTC), creating a spectacular light show for residents of northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will have a star-like appearance. The capsule will travel at 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, arriving from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a minute. Stardust will set a new record as the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth. The previous record was set in May 1969 by the Apollo X command module. "It will move along the west coast of northern California, lighting up the sky from northern California to central Oregon, through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah," said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Ohio-ko agintariek azaldu dutenez, Pittsburgh-eko Children’s Hospital ospitalean lan egin zuen mediku bati erailketa bortitza leporatuko diote, asteazkenean bere ama autoaren maletategian hilik aurkitu ostean. Malar Balasubramanian doktorea (29 urte) Blue Ash-en (Ohio) aurkitu zuten Cincinnati-tik gutxi gorabehera 15 miliara dagoen aldirian, errepide ondoan lurrean etzanda, kamiseta bat eta barruko arropa jantzita zituela eta, itxuraz, botika ugariren eraginpean. Poliziako kideak bere Oldsmobile Intrigue markako autoraino eraman zituen, zegoen lekutik 500 oinetara. Han, Saroja Balasubramanian-en (53 urte) gorpua aurkitu zuten odolez zikindutako tapakiez estalita. Poliziaren esanean, gorpuak egun oso bat zeraman autoan.
mt: Authorities in Ohio say a doctor who worked at Pittsburgh's Children's Hospital will be charged with murder after his mother was found dead in his car's trunk on Monday. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, about 15 miles from Cincinnati, lying on the side of the road in his Oldsmobile Intrigue, wearing a T-shirt and underwear, apparently under the influence of drugs. Police took him to the car, which was about 500 yards from where he was found. There, they found the body of his mother, Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, wrapped in blood-soaked towels. Police say the body had been in the car for a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: eBay-ko historian egin den erosketarik handiena. Enpresak irabazien iturriak dibertsifikatzea espero du, eta Skype-k kokapen sendoa duen tokietan ezagunagoa izatea, adibidez, Txinan, Ekialdeko Europan eta Brasilen.
mt: 1. The largest ever purchase in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue sources, and Skype will be more well known in places where it has a strong presence, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Borrokak bertan behera gelditu zirenean, zaurituak ospitalera garraiatu ondoren, oraindik bertan zeuden 40 preso patioan geratu ziren eta zeldetara itzultzeari uko egin zioten. Negoziatzaileak egoera zuzentzen saiatu ziren, baina ez dago argi presoek zer eskatzen zuten. 10:00ak eta 11:00ak bitartean (pm) (MDT) sute bat piztu zuten presoek patioan. Handik gutxira, istiluen kontrako ekipamendua zuten poliziak patioan sartu ziren, eta gas negar-eragilea erabilita inguratu zituzten presoak. Suhiltzaileen taldeek 11:35 (pm) inguruan itzali zuten sua.
mt: 40 prisoners remained in the yard after the riot was quelled, and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to calm the situation, but it is unclear what the prisoners were asking for. At around 10:00 and 11:00 pm (MDT), a fire was started by the prisoners in the yard. Shortly after, riot control equipment was used by police to enter the yard, and tear gas was used to surround the prisoners. The fire was extinguished by firefighters at around 11:35 pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
