src: Telebistan zuzenean egindako iruzkin horietan onartu dute lehen aldiz Iran-eko iturri nagusiek zigorrak eragingarriak izaten ari direla. Zigorren artean daude, besteak beste, murrizketa finantzarioak eta Europako Batasunak petrolio gordina esportatzeko debekua; esportazio horretatik lortzen du Irango ekonomiak atzerriko diru-sarreren %80. Kaleratu den azken hileko txostenean, LPEEk esan du petrolio gordinaren esportazioa azken bi hamarkadetako mailarik baxuenera jaitsi dela; 2,8 milioi upel esportatzen dira eguneko. Herrialdeko agintari gorenak, Ali Khamenei aiatolak esan du petrolioarekiko mendekotasuna Irango 1979ko iraultza islamikoa baino lehenagoko “tranpa” dela, eta herrialdea tranpa horretatik libratu behar dela.
mt: For the first time, Iranian state media have acknowledged that sanctions are having an effect.  Among the sanctions are financial restrictions and a European Union ban on the export of crude oil; the export of oil accounts for 80% of Iran's foreign currency income.  In a statement released last week, the OPEC said that crude oil exports have fallen to their lowest level in two decades, to 2.8 million barrels a day.  The country's top officials, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, have said that dependence on oil is a "trap" that predates the 1979 Islamic revolution, and that the country must be freed from that trap.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Frantzian, bozkatzeko prozedura teknologia gutxiko esperientzia izan ohi da: bozkatu behar dutenak kabina batean sartzen dira, hautatu duten hautagaiaren izena aurrez inprimatuta duen paper bat hartu eta gutun-azal batean sartzen dute. Teknikariek bozkatu behar duen pertsonaren identitatea egiaztatu ondoren, bozkatzen duen pertsonak gutun-azala bozka-kutxan sartzen du, eta bozkatze-zerrendan sinatu egiten du. Frantziako hauteskunde-legeak nahiko zorrotz kodifikatuta ditu prozedurak. 1988az geroztik bozka-kutxak gardenak izan behar dira, bozkatu duen pertsonak eta behatzaileek argi ikus dezaten bozkatzearen hasieran ez dagoela gutun-azalik eta ez dela besterik gehitzen baimendutako bozkatzaileek sartutakoak direnak ezik. Hautagaiek ordezkariak bidal ditzakete prozesuaren zati guztiak behatzeko. Iluntzean, boluntarioek botoak kontatzen dituzte, zorrozki zainduta eta prozedura zehatzak betez.
mt: In France, the voting process is usually a low-tech experience: voters enter a booth, take a piece of paper with the name of the candidate they have chosen, and put it in a ballot box. After the technicians have verified the identity of the voter, the voter puts the ballot paper in the ballot box and signs the voting list. The procedures are very strictly codified in the French electoral law. Since 1988, the ballot boxes have been transparent, so that voters and observers can see that there is no ballot paper at the beginning of the voting and that only the ballot papers put in by the authorized voters are present. Candidates can send representatives to follow the entire process. At night, volunteers count the ballots, carefully and following strict procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Berretsiko balitz, honekin amaitzen da Musashi aurkitzeko Allen-ek egin duen zortzi urteko bilaketa. Itsaso hondoaren mapei jarraituz, urrunetik gidatutako ur azpiko ibilgailu bat erabilita aurkitu ziren hondakinak. Munduko pertsona aberatsenetako bat da Allen, eta aberastasunaren zati handi bat itsasoa esploratzeko erabili du. Bizitza osoan gerraren inguruan izan duen interesagatik jarri zuen abian Musashi bilatzeko misioa.
mt: If successful, this will end Allen's eight-year search for Musashi. The wreckage was found using a remote-controlled underwater vehicle, following the ship's tracks on a map. Allen is one of the world's richest men, and has used a large part of his fortune to explore the sea. He has had an interest in war throughout his life, and put the search for Musashi on his agenda.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Telebistako erreportajeek erakusten dute ke zuria ateratzen ari dela instalaziotik. Tokiko agintariek etxe barruan egoteko, aire girotua itzaltzeko eta iturriko ura ez edateko eskatu die inguruko biztanleei. Japoniako agentzia nuklearraren arabera, zesio eta iodo erradioaktiboa identifikatu dira instalazioan. Agintariek uste dute horrek esan nahi duela instalazioan uranio-erregaia gordetzen duten edukiontziak hautsita eta erregaia ateratzen hasita egon daitekeela.
mt: News footage shows white smoke rising from the facility. Local officials have asked residents to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink water from the tap. The Japanese nuclear agency has identified cesium and iodine radioactivity at the facility, indicating that the fuel rods may have been damaged and releasing radioactive material.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Tony Moll doktoreak Hegoafrikako KwaZulu-Natal eskualdean aurkitu zuen Botikekiko izugarri erresistentea den tuberkulosia (XDR-TB). Elkarrizketa batean aipatu zuenez, aldaera berria “oso kezkagarria eta larria da, heriotza-tasa oso altua duelako.” Moll doktorearen ustez, litekeena da paziente batzuek ospitalean bertan gaitza harrapatu izana; horietatik bi, gutxienez, ospitaleko osasun-langileak ziren. Urtebetean, infektatutako pertsona batek kontaktu hurbilean dituen 10 eta 15 pertsona bitartean infekta ditzake. Hala ere, tuberkulosia duten pertsona guztien artean SXDR-TB dutenen ehunekoa txikia da; Hegoafrikan, infektatuta egon daitezkeen 330.000 pertsonetatik 6.000 pertsonek izango lukete.
mt: Tony Moll, a doctor in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, discovered a highly resistant strain of tuberculosis (XDR-TB). In an interview, he said the new strain was "very alarming and serious because of its high mortality rate." Moll believes it is possible that some patients contracted the disease in the hospital; at least two of them were hospital health workers. In a year, an infected person can infect 10 to 15 people in close contact. However, the percentage of people with XDR-TB among all those infected is small; in South Africa, 6,000 of the 330,000 people who could be infected would have it.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: FAAren esanean, NextGen sistemari esker hegazkinek ibilbide laburragoak egin ahal izango dituzte eta milioika galoi erregai aurreztuko dira urtero, karbono-emisioak murriztuz. Satelite bidezko teknologia erabiltzen du lurreko radarretan oinarritutako teknologia zaharkituaren kontrara, eta, horri esker, aireko trafikoaren kontrolatzaileek zehaztasun handiagoz koka dezakete hegazkina eta pilotuei informazio zehatzagoa eman diezaiekete.
mt: The FAA says that the NextGen system will allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel per year, reducing carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology instead of the outdated ground-based radar technology, and allows air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft more precisely and provide more accurate information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Historialariek FBIren iraganeko gidalerroak kritikatu dituzte, ebazteko errazak ziren kasuetan -bereziki lapurtutako autoen kasuetan- baliabide ugari jartzeagatik, agentziaren arrakasta-tasa igotzeko asmoz egin zutelakoan. Kongresua lizunkeria ekimena diruz laguntzen hasi zen 2005. urte fiskalean, eta zehaztu zuen FBIk 10 agente bideratu behar izan zituela helduen pornografiara.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past sting operations, which were easy to solve in cases where - especially in stolen car cases - the agency deployed many resources, in order to increase its success rate. Congress began funding sting operations in the 2005 fiscal year, and specified that the FBI had to deploy ten agents to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39C hegazkinak aireportuko pista baten kontra talka egin eta eztanda egin zuen 9:30ak (am) inguruan (02:30 UCT), eta aireportua itxi egin behar izan zuten hegaldi komertzialetarako. Pilotua Dilokrit Pattavee zen, Eskuadroi burua. Tokiko komunikabideek jakinarazi dutenez, aireportuko suhiltzaileen ibilgailu bat irauli egin zen larrialdiari erantzuten ari zela.
mt: 9:30am (02:30 UTC) a JAS 39C fighter jet crashed into a runway and exploded at the airport, forcing the closure of the airport for commercial flights. The pilot was Dilokrit Pattavee, squadron leader. Local media reported that a fire engine was crushed while responding to the emergency.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: 1960ko hamarkadan, John F. Kennedy-ren aholkulari gisa lan egin zuen Brzezinski-k, eta, ondoren, Lyndon B. Johnson-en administrazioan. 1976ko hauteskundeetan, atzerriko politikei buruzko aholkuak eman zizkion Carter-i, eta, ondoren, Segurtasun nazionaleko aholkulari (NSA) gisa lan egin zuen 1977tik 1981era, Henry Kissinger-en ordezko gisa. NSA izan zen bitartean, munduko gaiak era diplomatikoan kudeatzen lagundu zion Carter-i, besteak beste, Camp David-eko Hitzarmenetan (1978), AEB-Txina harremanetan 1970. hamarkadaren azken urteetan, Irango Iraultzan eta haren ondorengo Teherango gatibuen krisialdian (1979), eta Sobietarrek Afganistan inbaditzean (1979).
mt: 1960s, he served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy, and later in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and later served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, as a replacement for Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he helped Carter manage world affairs in a diplomatic manner, including the Camp David Accords (1978), Sino-American relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution and its aftermath in the hostage crisis in Tehran (1979), and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan (1979).
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Bobek, Kroaziako hiriburuko (Zagreb) jokalaria, ezagun bihurtu zen Partizan Belgrade talderako jokatzean. 1945ean hasi zen haiekin jokatzen, eta 1958 arte jarraitu zuen bertan. Taldean egin zuen denboran, 403 gol egin zituen 468 agerralditan. Beste inork ez du Bobek-ek bezainbat agerraldi izan edo gol egin klub bakarrarentzat. 1995ean, Partizan-en historiako jokalaririk onena izendatu zuten.
mt: 1945-1958, Bobek played for Partizan Belgrade. In that time, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No other player has scored as many goals or made as many appearances for a single club. In 1995, he was named the greatest player in Partizan's history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: Hesperonychus elizabethae espeziea Dromaeosauridae familiako kidea da, Velociraptor-en lehengusua. Lumaz guztiz estalitako eta odol beroko hegazti harrapari horrek Velociraptor-en antzeko erpeak zituela eta bi hankatan oinez ibiltzen zela uste da. Bigarren erpea handiagoa zenez, Hesperonychus izena eman zitzaion, hau da “mendebaldeko erpea”.
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a member of the Dromaeosauridae family, a relative of Velociraptor. It is believed to have had the same sickle-shaped claws as Velociraptor, and to have walked on two legs like it. Its second claw was larger, and it was named Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw".
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Gutxienez 100 pertsona zeuden jaian; pasa den urtean ezkondutako bikote baten lehen urteurrena ospatzeko elkartu ziren. Agintarien arabera, urteurren-ekitaldi formal bat programatuta zegoen beste egun baterako. Bikotea duela urte bat ezkondu zen Texasen, eta Buffalo-ra etorri ziren lagunekin eta familiako kideekin ospatzera. 30 urteko senarra, Buffalo-n jaiotakoa, izan zen tiroketan hildako lau pertsonetako bat, baina emaztea ez zen zauritu.
mt: 100 people were at the party; they had gathered to celebrate the first anniversary of their marriage. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for another day. The couple had married a year ago in Texas and had come to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old groom, a Buffalo native, was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno-ak 120-160 metro kubiko erregai zituen hondatu zenean eta haize eta olatu bortitzek olatu-hormara bultzatu zutenean. Helikopteroek tripulazioko hamabi pertsonak erreskatatu zituen, eta apurtutako sudur bat izan zen zauri bakarra. 100 metroko ontzia ongarrien ohiko karga hartzera bidean zihoan, eta agintariak, hasiera batean, ontziak karga botako zuen beldur ziren.
mt: 120-160 cubic meters of fuel were spilled when the ship collided with a breakwater and was hit by strong winds and waves. Twelve people were rescued by helicopters, and the only injury was a broken nose. The ship was on its way to pick up a normal cargo of oil, and officials initially feared the ship would dump its cargo.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Vautier-ek, zuzendari izateaz gain, beste lorpen batzuk ere izan zituen, besteak beste, zentsura politikotzat jotzen zuenaren aurka 1973an egin zuen gose greba. Frantziako legea aldatu egin zen. Haren aktibismoa 15 urterekin, II. Mundu Gerran, Frantziako erresistentziarekin bat egin zuenetik dator. Egindakoak 1998an idatzitako liburu batean jaso zituen. 1960ko hamarkadan, independizatu berri zen Aljeriara joan zen zinema-zuzendaritza irakastera.
mt: Vautier also had other achievements, including a 1973 hunger strike against censorship, which was later changed by law. His activism dates back to the French Resistance during World War II. He wrote about his experiences in a book published in 1998. In the 1960s, he went to teach film directing in newly independent Algeria.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Lau milioi pertsona baino gehiago joan ziren Erromara hileta elizkizunetan parte hartzeko. Hainbeste pertsona bertaratu zen, ezen guztiek ezin baitzuten hileta elizkizunetarako sarbidea izan San Pedro plazan. Hainbat telebista-pantaila erraldoi ezarri ziren Erromako zenbait tokitan, jendeak zeremonia ikusteko aukera izan zezan. Italiako eta munduko gainerako beste hiri askotan, batez ere Polonian, antzekoak antolatu ziren, eta pertsona ugarik kusi zuten ekitaldia.
mt: 4 million people or more attended the funeral mass in Rome. So many people came, that not all could get in to the funeral mass in St. Peter's Square. Large TV screens were set up in several locations in Rome, so people could see the ceremony. Similar events were held in other cities in Italy and other countries, especially in Poland, and many people cried.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

Hainbeste pertsona bertaratu zen, ezen guztiek ezin baitzuten hileta elizkizunetarako sarbidea izan San Pedro plazan. Hainbat telebista-pantaila erraldoi ezarri ziren Erromako zenbait tokitan, jendeak zeremonia ikusteko aukera izan zezan. Italiako eta munduko gainerako beste hiri askotan, batez ere Polonian, antzekoak antolatu ziren, eta pertsona ugarik kusi zuten ekitaldia.
mt: 4 million people or more attended the funeral mass in Rome. So many people came, that not all could get in to the funeral mass in St. Peter's Square. Large TV screens were set up in several locations in Rome, so people could see the ceremony. Similar events were held in other cities in Italy and other countries, especially in Poland, and many people cried.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Txostenen arabera, Macbeth Street-eko apartamentu batek eztanda egin zuen gas-isuri baten ondorioz. Gas-konpainiako langile bat deitu zuten etxebizitzara, bizilagun batek gas-isuri bati buruzko deia egitean. Langilea iristean, apartamentuak eztanda egin zuen. Ez da zauritu larririk egon, baina eztanda gertatzean bertan zeuden bost pertsona, gutxienez, tratatu egin behar izan dituzte shock-sintomak direla eta. Ez zegoen inor apartamentu barruan. Une hartan, ia 100 biztanle ebakuatu zituzten eremutik.
mt: According to reports, a gas leak in a Macbeth Street apartment exploded. A gas company employee was called to the apartment, after a neighbor reported a gas leak. When the employee arrived, the apartment exploded. No one was injured, but at least five people who were in the apartment at the time were treated for shock symptoms. No one was in the apartment at the time. At the time, almost 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Nicholas Alden (25) eta Zachary Cuddeback (21) dira hildakoak. Cuddeback ari zen gidatzen. Edgar Veguilla-k zauriak pairatu zituen besoan eta barailan, eta Kristoffer Schneider-ek berreraikitze-ebakuntza jaso beharko du aurpegian. Uka-ren armak huts egin zuen bosgarren pertsonaren burura apuntatzen ari zenean. Schneider-ek mina izaten jarraitzen du, begi bat itsututa du, garezurreko zati bat falta zaio eta aurpegiaren zati bat titanioz berreraikita dauka. Schneider-ek bideo-dei bidez eman zuen testigantza haren herriko USAF base batetik.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was driving. Edgar Veguilla suffered injuries to his arm and jaw, and Kristoffer Schneider will require reconstructive surgery to his face. Uka's gun misfired when it was pointed at the fourth person. Schneider is still in pain, has one eye blinded, is missing part of his skull, and has part of his face replaced with titanium. Schneider gave his testimony via video from his hometown USAF base.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Golfa eta errugbia itzuli egingo dira Olinpiar Jokoetara. Nazioarteko Batzorde Olinpikoak kirol horiek sartzeko bozkatu du gaur Berlinen egin duten batzorde exekutiboaren bileran. Errugbia, zehazki hamabosteko errugbia, eta golfa hautatu dira beste bost kirolen artetik Olinpiar Jokoetan parte hartzeko. Squasha, karatea eta patinekin egindako kirolak ere Olinpiar programan sartzen saiatu ziren, beisbol eta softball-arekin batera, baina Olinpiar Jokoetatik kanpo geratu ziren 2005ean. Hala ere, IOC osoak berretsi behar du bozka urrian Kopenhage-n egingo duen bileran.
mt: Rugby and golf will return to the Olympics. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports in the 2016 Games at a meeting in Berlin on Monday. Rugby, specifically rugby sevens, and golf were selected from a list of five sports to be included in the Olympic program. Squash, karate and roller sports were also considered, along with baseball and softball, but were left out of the 2005 Games. However, the IOC must still vote on the inclusion of the sports at a meeting in Copenhagen in October.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 1759ko irailaren 24an, Arthur Guinness-ek 9.000 urteko alokairua sinatu zuen Dublineko (Irlanda) St. James’ Gate garagardotegia eskuratzeko. 250 urte geroago, Guinness enpresa mundu osora hedatu da, eta urtero 10 mila milioi euro (US$14,7 mila milioi) baino gehiago irabazten ditu.
mt: 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease to acquire the St. James’ Gate Brewery in Dublin (Ireland). 250 years later, the Guinness company has spread worldwide, and earns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) annually.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Astelehenean Lyon-en, Frantzia ekialdean, padura batean hilda aurkitutako ahate basati batek gizakientzat hilgarria den hegaztien gripearen aldaeraren (H5N1) infekzioa zuela berretsi da. Frantzia birus hori pairatzen ari den Europa Batasuneko zazpigarren herrialdea da, Austria, Alemania, Eslovenia, Bulgaria, Grezia eta Italiarekin batera. Kroazia eta Danimarkako H5N1 kasu susmagarriak berretsi gabe daude oraindik.
mt: On Monday, a wild duck found dead in a marsh in eastern France near Lyon was confirmed to have been infected with the deadly strain of bird flu (H5N1) that has infected seven other European Union countries, including Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Cases in Croatia and Denmark are still unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Gaixotasuna hedatu izanaren errua 2010eko lurrikararen ondoren Haitira iritsitako NBEko tropa bakegileei ari zaie egozten. Izan ere, tropen kanpamentuaren inguruan hasi zen hedatzen. Auziaren arabera, NBEren kanpamentuko hondakinak ez ziren behar bezala desinfektatu eta, horren ondorioz, Haitiko ibairik luzeenetakoa den Artibonite-ren adarrera sartu ziren bakterioak. Tropak iritsi aurretik, Haitik ez zuen gaixotasunarekin lotutako arazorik izan 1800. urteaz geroztik. Haitiko Justizia eta Demokraziarako Institutuak aipatutako ikerketa independenteen arabera, NBEko bakegileen batailoi nepaldarrak ekarri zuen gaixotasuna nahi gabe Haitira. Gaixotasunean aditu den Danielle Lantagne NBEko kideak adierazi zuen segur aski bakegileek eragin zutela agerraldia.
mt: 2010 earthquake in Haiti, blame for the spread of the disease is being placed on the UN peacekeepers who arrived there. The disease began to spread around the camp of the troops. According to the lawsuit, the waste of the camp of the UN troops was not properly disinfected and as a result, the bacteria entered the Artibonite, the longest river in Haiti. Haiti had not had any problems with the disease since 1800. According to the Institute of Justice and Democracy in Haiti, the independent investigations cited, the disease was brought to Haiti by the Nepalese battalions of the UN peacekeepers. Danielle Lantagne, a member of the UN, said that the outbreak was probably caused by the peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: Irlandako gobernuak azpimarratu du legedi parlamentarioa gauzatu behar dela egoera zuzentzeko. “Osasun publikoaren nahiz justizia kriminalaren ikuspegitik garrantzitsua da legedia ahalik eta azkarren promulgatzea”, esan du gobernuko bozeramaile batek. Osasun Ministroak azaldu du arduratuta dagoela substantzien aldi baterako legezkotasunaz aprobetxatzen diren pertsonen ongizateaz, baita drogekin erlazionatutako espetxeratze-aginduez ere, konstituzioaren kontrakoak diren aldaketak indarrean jarri direlako.
mt: The Irish government has stressed that legislation must be enacted to address the situation. "It is important that legislation is enacted as soon as possible from a public health and criminal justice perspective," said a government spokesman. The Health Minister has said he is concerned about the welfare of people who are taking advantage of the temporary legality of substances, as well as those who are sentenced for drug-related offences, as the changes to the constitution are in force.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Christopher Garcia-k, Los Angeles-eko Polizia departamenduko bozeramaileak esan duenez, gizonezko gaizkilea eremu pribatura sartzeagatik ikertzen ari dira, ez bandalismoagatik. Zeinuak ez du kalte fisikorik; bakearen ikurrez eta bihotzez apaindutako olana beltzak erabili dira eraldaketarako, “O” letraren ordez “e” txikia irakurtzeko.
mt: Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the male suspect is being investigated for trespassing, not vandalism. The graffiti does not appear to cause any physical damage; the letters “O” have been replaced with a small “e” in the word “peace” and the word “love” has been written in cursive.
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Ingeleseko tutore ezagun baina polemikoa da Karno; Modern Education eta King’s Glory ikastetxeetan irakatsi zuen eta, haren esanean, bere ibilbidearen punturik gorenean 9.000 ikasle izan zituen. Irakasteko oharretan erabiltzen dituen hitzak zakarrak dira guraso batzuentzat, eta, diotenez, biraoak erabiltzen ditu klasean. Modern Education-ek salatu zuen iragarki handiak jarri zituela autobusetan baimenik gabe eta gezurretan aritu zela Ingeleseko tutore nagusia zela esanez. Halaber, copyright-eskubideak urratzea ere leporatu diote, baina ez da kargurik aurkeztu. Ikasle ohi baten esanean “jargoia erabiltzen zuen klasean, ligatzeko argibideak ematen zituen oharretan eta ikasleen lagun gisa jokatzen zuen”.
mt: Controversial English tutor Karno; taught at Modern Education and King’s Glory schools and, according to him, had 9,000 students at the peak of his career.  His remarks in class are vulgar to some parents, and, according to reports, he uses profanity in class.  Modern Education has accused him of putting up large advertisements on buses without permission and lying about being the main English tutor.  They have also accused him of copyright infringement, but no charges have been filed.  According to a former student, he used profanity in class, gave advice on how to tie shoelaces in his remarks, and acted as a friend to the students.
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Filipinetako polizia ohi batek Hong Kongeko turistak bahitu hartu ditu Manilan, Filipinetako hiriburuan, haien autobusa bahitu ondoren. Rolando Mendozak tiro egin zien turistei bere M16 fusilarekin. Bahitu batzuk erreskatatu egin dituzte eta gutxienez sei hildako konfirmatu dira dagoeneko. Sei bahitu, haurrak eta adinduak barne, lehenago askatu zituzten, baita argazkilari filipinarrak ere. Argazkilariek adineko emakume baten tokia hartu zuten gero, komunera joan behar baitzuen. Mendoza tiroz hil zuten.
mt: A former police officer in the Philippines has taken Hong Kong tourists hostage in Manila, the country's capital, after taking their bus hostage. Rolando Mendoza fired at the tourists with his M16 rifle. Some of the hostages have been rescued and at least six deaths have been confirmed so far. Six hostages, including children and the elderly, were released earlier, as well as Filipino journalists. The journalists took the place of an elderly woman who was going to the church. Mendoza was killed by gunfire.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brasil da munduko herrialde katoliko erromaniko handiena, eta Eliza katoliko erromanikoak gogor egin du herrialdean sexu bereko pertsonen arteko ezkontza legeztatzearen aurka. Brasilgo Kongresu Nazionalak 10 urtez eztabaidatu du legeztatzea, eta, oraingoz, Rio Grande do Sul-en bakarrik dira legezkoak halako ezkontza zibilak. Jatorrizko lege-proiektua Marta Suplicy-k, São Paulo-ko alkate ohiak, proposatu zuen. Legedi hori, aldaketak egin eta gero, Roberto Jefferson-en eskuetan dago orain. Manifestatzaileek 1,2 milioi sinadurako eskaera jasotzea espero dute azaroan Kongresu Nazionalean aurkezteko.
mt: Brazil is the largest Catholic country in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church has strongly opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The Brazilian National Congress has debated the legalization for 10 years, and, so far, only in Rio Grande do Sul are civil unions between same-sex couples legal. The original bill was proposed by Marta Suplicy, former mayor of São Paulo. The bill, with changes, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. The activists expect to collect 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: Ikuskizuna hasi eta bost minutura haizea harrotu zen, eta handik minutu batera orduko 70 km-ko abiadura zuen… Gero euria hasi zuen; tantak handiak ziren eta gogor jotzen zuten azalean, orratzek bezala. Ondoren, txingorra hastearekin batera, jendea beldurrez oihuka hasi zen, elkarren gainetik lasterka. Ahizpa eta bere laguna galdu nituen, eta gurpildun aulkian zihoazen pertsona desgaituak ikusi nituen harako bidean, jendea haien gainetik salto egiten eta bultzaka ari zela” esan zuen Armand Versace-k.
mt: 5 minutes into the show, the wind picked up to 70 km/h… Then it started raining; the drops were big and hard, like hail. Then, as the storm intensified, people started screaming in fear, running away from each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and saw disabled people in wheelchairs being pushed away by the crowd” said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Iragarleek diotenez, Cabo Verde-tik 645 milia (1.040 kilometro) mendebaldera kokatuta dagoen ekaitza saretu egingo da, ziurrenez, lur-eremuak mehatxatu aurretik. Fred-ek mugitzen duen haizeak 105 milia orduko (165 km/h) abiadura du une honetan, eta ipar-mendebalderantz ari da mugitzen. Sateliteko irudiak lortzen hasi zirenetik Atlantikoaren hain hegoaldean eta ekialdean inoiz erregistratu den zikloi tropikal indartsuena da Fred, eta 35°W-etik ekialdera erregistratu den hirugarren urakan handiena da.
mt: Forecasters say the storm will move away from land before it can threaten any land areas, as it moves westward at 105 mph (165 km/h). Fred is the strongest tropical storm ever recorded in the Atlantic so far south and east, and the third strongest storm ever recorded east of 35°W.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n estandarrak 2.4Ghz eta 5.0Ghz maiztasunetan funtzionatzen du. Horri esker, 802.11a, 802.11b eta 802.11g-rekin bateragarria izango da, oinarri-estazioak banda bikoitza baldin badu. 802.11n-ren abiadurak nabarmen azkarragoak dira aurrekoenak baino, eta 600Mbit/s-ko errendimendu maximo teorikoa du.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies. This allows it to be compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g, if the base station has dual-band capability. 802.11n's speeds are much faster than the previous ones, and has a theoretical maximum throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Urrezko domina olinpikoa irabazitakoak estilo libreko 100m eta 200m-ko probetan eta hiru errelebotan parte hartu behar zuen Commonwealth-eko Jokoetan, baina aipatu dituen minak direla-eta zalantzan jarri da haren sasoia. Mina kentzeko behar dituen botikak hartu ezinik egon da Jokoetan debekatuta daudelako.
mt: 100m and 200m freestyle gold medalists and member of three Commonwealth Games relay teams, has been ruled out of the Games due to a medical condition. She has been unable to take the medication required to remove the condition as it is banned at the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

Mina kentzeko behar dituen botikak hartu ezinik egon da Jokoetan debekatuta daudelako.

src: Ameriketako Estatu Batuetako Geologia Zerbitzuaren nazioarteko lurrikaren mapak ez zuen adierazi lurrikararik Islandian aurreko astean. Islandiako Meteorologia Bulegoak ere ez zuen Hekla inguruan jarduera sismikoaren berri eman aurreko 48 orduetan. Fase-aldaketa eragin zuen jarduera sismiko nabaria martxoaren 10ean gertatu zen sumendiaren galdararen ipar-ekialdean. Mendiaren magalean jarduera bolkanikoarekin zerikusirik ez zuten hodei ilunak agertu zirela jakinarazi zen. Hodeien eraginez, zaila izaten zen jakitea erupzio bat benetan jazo zen ala ez.
mt: The US Geological Survey's international earthquake map did not report any earthquakes in Iceland in the previous week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also did not report any seismic activity around Hekla in the previous 48 hours. A significant seismic activity occurred on March 10, 2010, which caused a phase change in the summit of the volcano. It was reported that dark clouds appeared over the mountain, which were not related to volcanic activity. Due to the clouds, it was difficult to determine whether an eruption actually occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Gizakirik gabeko Chandrayaan-1 Ilargiko orbitadoreak Moon Impact Zunda (MIP) jaurti zuen; 1,5 kilometro segundoko abiaduran (3.000 milia orduko) joan zen ilargiaren gainazalean zehar, eta ilargiaren hego polotik gertu lurreratu zen talka eginez. Hiru tresna zientifiko garrantzitsu garraiatzeaz gain, ilargiko zundak Indiako bandera nazionalaren irudia eraman zuen alde guztietan margotuta.
mt: The Moon Impact Probe (MIP) was ejected from the Chandrayaan-1 lunar orbiter; it flew at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 mph) across the lunar surface, and landed near the lunar south pole, crashing into the surface. In addition to three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe carried the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Denboraldi honetako lehen kasuak uztaila amaieran jakinarazi ziren. Txerriek eramaten dute gaitza, eta eltxoen bidez heltzen da gizakiengana. Agerraldiaren ondorioz, Indiako gobernuak neurriak hartu behar izan ditu, hala nola gaitzak larri jotako eremuetara txerri-harrapatzaileak eraman ditu, eltxoetatik babesteko milaka gortina banatu eta pestizidak ihinztatu. Halaber, entzefalitisaren txertoaren hainbat milioi unitate agindu ditu gobernuak, osasun-agentziak datorren urterako prestatzen laguntzeko. Historikoki eragin handiena pairatu duten tokietara txertoak eramateko planak atzeratu egin dira aurten diru-faltagatik eta, beste gaitz batzuekin alderatuz, lehentasun gutxiago duelako.
mt: The first cases of the year were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, and transmitted to humans by mosquitoes. As a result, the Indian government has taken measures such as bringing in pig catchers to areas where the disease is most severe, distributing thousands of mosquito nets to protect against mosquitoes, and ordering millions of doses of the encephalitis vaccine to be prepared by health agencies for the coming year. Historically, the most affected areas have had plans to bring in vaccines delayed due to lack of funds, and compared to other diseases, have had lower priority.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: 2011n bi ganberetan onartu zen proposatutako zuzenketa. Saio legegilean aldaketa bat egin zen: Ordezkarien Ganberak bigarren esaldia ezabatu zuen, eta Senatuak antzeko bat onartu zuen astelehenean. Bigarren esaldia sartu ez izanak, zeinak sexu bereko pertsonen arteko bat-egite zibilak debekatzea proposatzen baitzuen, etorkizunean bat-egite zibiletarako atea zabalik utz lezake. Prozesuari jarraituz, HJR-3 berriz berrikusiko da hautetsitako hurrengo legegintzaldian, 2015ean edo 2016an, prozesuan jarrai dezan.
mt: 2011 saw the passage of the bill in both chambers. A change was made in the legislative session: The House of Representatives removed the second sentence, and the Senate passed a similar one on Monday. The removal of the second sentence, which proposed to ban civil unions between same-sex persons, could leave open the door to civil unions in the future. The process will continue, with HJR-3 being reconsidered in the next elected legislature, in 2015 or 2016, to continue the process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: “Panamako paperak” izen orokorra erabiltzen da 2016ko udaberrian Panamako Mossack Fonseca abokatuen bulegotik prentsara filtratu ziren hamar milioi dokumentu ingururen multzoa izendatzeko. Dokumentuek erakutsi zuten hamalau bankuk mila milioika dolar estatubatuar ezkutatzen lagundu zietela bezero aberatsei, zergak ordaintzea eta bestelako legedia betetzea saihesteko. The Guardian egunkari britainiarraren esanean, Deutsche Bank bankuak kontrolatzen zituen helburu hori lortzeko erabiltzen ziren 1.200 sasienpresen heren bat. Mundu osoan egin ziren protestak, hainbat salaketa kriminal jarri ziren eta Islandiako eta Pakistango gobernuburuek dimititu egin zuten.
mt: 2016 Panaman Papers is the name given to a set of about ten million documents leaked from the Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca in April 2016. The documents show how sixteen banks helped their clients to hide over a billion dollars from tax authorities and other legal requirements. According to The Guardian, Deutsche Bank used 1,200 shell companies to achieve this goal. Protests were held around the world, criminal charges were filed, and the prime ministers of Iceland and Pakistan resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Iran-en hegazkin-istripuak ohikoak dira, hegazkin-flota zaharra baitu eta haren mantentze-lanak eskasak baitira, bai zibilek erabiltzeko, bai militarren operazioetan erabiltzeko. Nazioarteko zigorren ondorioz, ezin izan dira hegazkin berriak erosi. Aste honen hasieran, polizia-helikoptero baten istripuaren ondorioz hiru pertsona hil ziren eta beste hiru zauritu. Azken hilabetean, urteetan izan den istripurik okerrena bizi izan zen Iranen; Armeniara zihoan airelineako hegazkin batek lurra jo zuen, eta zeramatzan 168 pertsonak hil egin ziren. Hilabete berean, airelineako beste hegazkin bat pistatik kanpora atera zen, horma baten kontra talka egin zuen Mashhad-en, eta hamazazpi pertsona hil ziren.
mt: Iran has a history of frequent air accidents, due to an aging fleet and poor maintenance, both for civilian and military operations. International sanctions have prevented the purchase of new aircraft. In the beginning of this month, three people were killed and three others injured in a police helicopter crash. Last month, Iran experienced its worst air accident in years, when an airliner crashed, killing all 168 people on board. In the same month, another airliner veered off the runway in Mashhad, crashed into a wall, and killed 27 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Irak-eko Ikasketa Taldeak txostena aurkeztu du gaur 12:00etan (GMT). Ohartarazten duenez, inork ezin du bermatu Iraken egindako edozein ekintzak geldiarazi ahal izango dituenik gerra sektarioa, areagotzen ari den indarkeria edo kaoseranzko gainbehera. Txostenaren hasieran, eztabaida irekia egiteko eskatzen da, baita Estatu Batuetan Ekialde Hurbilerako politikei buruzko adostasuna lortzeko ere. Txostenak zorrotz kritikatzen ditu gobernu exekutiboak Irak-en aplikatzen duen politikaren alderdi guztiak, eta berehalako norabide-aldaketa eskatzen du. Jasotzen dituen 78 gomendioen artean aipatzen da ekimen diplomatiko berri bati ekin behar zaiola urtearen amaiera baino lehen, Irak-eko mugak kontrako esku-hartzeetatik babesteko eta bizilagunekin harreman diplomatikoak berrezartzeko.
mt: 12:00 GMT, the Iraq Study Group has released its report. It states that no one can guarantee that any action taken in Iraq will prevent sectarian war, further violence or chaos. The report calls for an open debate, and for agreement on the policy towards the Middle East. The report criticizes all aspects of the executive government's policy in Iraq, and calls for an immediate change of direction. Among the 78 recommendations it makes, it calls for a new diplomatic initiative before the end of the year, to protect Iraq's borders from counter-attacks, and to re-establish diplomatic relations with neighbours.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Ansa-ren esanean “polizia arduratuta zegoen, goi mailan gertatutako kolpe pare batek ordezkoen arteko gerra irekia piztuko ote zuen”. Poliziaren esanean, Lo Piccolo-k zuen abantaila, Provenzano-ren laguntzaile estuena izan baitzen Palermo-n eta esperientzia gehiago izateagatik irabazi baitzuen buruen belaunaldi zaharragoaren errespetua, haien botere-sarea sendotu bitartean jarduera apaltzeko erabakia hartu zutelako, Provenzano-k proposatu bezala. Provenzano-k kontrolatzen zituen buruak Riina-k estatuaren kontrako gerra amaitu zuenean, zeinaren ondorioz hil baitziren 1992an Giovanni Falcone eta Paolo Borsellino, Mafiaren kontrako borrokalariak.”
mt: According to Ansa, "the police were concerned that a high-level blow could open a war between the replacements". According to the police, Lo Piccolo had the advantage, having been Provenzano's closest aide in Palermo and having won the respect of the older generation of bosses for his more experienced activity, having decided to act with restraint while consolidating his power base, as proposed by Provenzano.
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Japoniako Hitoshi Saito judoka, urrezko bi domina Olinpiko irabazitakoa, hil egin da 54 urte zituela. Heriotzaren arrazoia behazun-hodiko minbizi intrahepatikoa izan da. Osaka-n hil zen asteartean. Olinpiadetako eta Munduko txapeldun izateaz gain, All Japan Judo Federazioko entrenamendu-batzordeko kidea zen hil zenean.
mt: 54-year-old judoka Hitoshi Saito, who won two Olympic gold medals, died. The cause of death was intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Monday. In addition to being an Olympic and world champion, he was a member of the All Japan Judo Federation's training committee at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Bidaian zehar, behin baino gehiagotan izan zituen arazoak Iwasaki-k. Piratek lapurreta egin zioten, Tibet-en amorrua zuen txakur batek eraso egin zion, Nepalen ezkontza batetik ihes egin zuen eta Indian atxilotu egin zuten.
mt: Iwasaki had problems along the way. Pirates robbed him, a dog he had in Tibet attacked him, he escaped a wedding in Nepal, and he was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella-k bere autoaren kontrola galdu zuen, eta hasi eta segituan amaitu zuen lasterketa. Fernando Alonso taldekidea izan zen lasterketaren buru probaren zatirik handienean, baina geldialdi teknikoaren ostean amaitu behar izan zuen, aurreko eskuineko gurpila gaizki sartuta zegoelako, ziurrenez. Michael Schumacher-ek Alonso-ren ondoren amaitu zuen lasterketa, proban zehar izandako tirabiren ondorioz esekiduran kalteak izateagatik.
mt: 2006 San Marino Grand Prix: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and retired immediately. Fernando Alonso, his teammate, was leading the race for most of the time, but had to retire after a pit stop due to a problem with the right rear wheel, probably. Michael Schumacher finished second, behind Alonso, due to damage to his car from contact with Alonso.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Azken 3 hilabeteetan, atxilotutako 80 pertsona libre geratu dira Central Booking-eko instalaziotik, inolako kargu formalik jaso gabe. Aurtengo apirilean, Glynn epaileak instalazioaren aurkako aldi baterako murrizketa-agindua igorri zuen, epaitegiko ikuskari batekin saiorik izan gabe 24 orduz baino gehiagoz atxilotuta egon ziren horiek askatzeko. Ikuskariak ezartzen du fidantza, halakorik ematen bada, eta atxiloketa egin duen poliziak formalizatzen ditu karguak. Ondoren, kargu horiek estatuko sistema informatikoan sartzen dira eta kasuaren jarraipena egiten da. Halaber, entzunaldian ezartzen da epaiketa azkarra egiteko data, susmagarriaren eskubidea baita.
mt: 80 people arrested in the last three months have been released from Central Booking without any formal charges. In April, Judge Glynn issued a temporary restraining order against the facility, after people were held for more than 24 hours without a hearing. The hearing requires a bond, if given, and the arresting police formalize the charges. Then, the charges are entered into the state's computer system and the case is tracked. Also, a speedy trial date is set, as the defendant has a right to.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin-ek aipatu du, halaber, agintariek bigarren itzulia bertan behar utzi dutela afganistandarrei beste hauteskunde baten gastua eta segurtasun-arriskua aurreztearren. Diplomazialariek esan dute bigarren itzulia egiteko beharra alde batera uztea erabakitzeko beste anbiguotasun aurkitu dutela Afganistango konstituzioan. Horrek hasieran egindako txostenen aurka egiten du, haietan aipatzen baitzen bigarren itzulia bertan behera uztea konstituzioaren kontrakoa izango litzatekeela.
mt: Lodin also reported that the government has decided to cancel the second round of elections in order to avoid the cost and security risks of holding another election. Diplomats said that the decision to cancel the second round was made after finding another ambiguity in the Afghan constitution. This contradicts the initial reports, which stated that the cancellation of the second round would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: 1947an britainiarrengandik independentzia lortu zuenetik, Pakistango presidenteak FATA gobernatzeko “Agente politikoak” izendatu ditu, eremu haietan ia autonomia osoa duen kontrola ezartzeko. Agente horiek gobernu- eta justizia-zerbitzuak emateaz arduratzen dira, Pakistango Konstituzioaren 247. artikuluaren arabera.
mt: 1947, since independence from Britain, the president of Pakistan has appointed “political agents” to govern the FATA, to gain control of the region with almost complete autonomy. These agents are responsible for providing government and justice services, according to Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Ryan Gosling eta Emma Stone protagonista dituen filmak izendapenak jaso zituen kategoria nagusi guztietan. Gosling-ek eta Stone-k Aktore onenen sarirako izendapenak jaso zituzten. Beste izendapen batzuen artean, hauek daude: film onena, zuzendaria, zinematografia, jantzien diseinua, film-edizioa, jatorrizko musika, ekoizpen-diseinua, soinu-edizioa, soinu-nahasketa eta jatorrizko gidoia. Filmeko bi abestik —”Audition (The Fools Who Dream)” eta “City of Stars”— abesti original onenaren izendapena jaso zuten. Lionsgate estudioak 26 izendapen jaso zituen, beste edozein estudiok baino gehiago.
mt: 2016's La La Land won the most awards, including Best Picture, Best Director, Best Actor, Best Actress, and Best Original Screenplay. Other awards included Best Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, and Original Song. The film's two songs—"Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars"—were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate won the most awards, with 26, more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK-k ere jakinarazi zuen Kashiwazaki Kariwa indar nuklearreko instalazioa (Niigata prefekturakoa) ohi bezala funtzionatzen ari zela. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. konpainiak jakinarazi zuen ez zuela lurrikararen ondoriozko kalterik izan, eta Shika instalazio nuklearreko 1. eta 2. erreaktoreak itzalita zeudela. Aipatu denez, 9.400 etxe inguru daude eskualdean urik gabe, eta 100 inguru elektrizitaterik gabe. Litekeena da errepide batzuk kaltetuta egotea; tren-zerbitzua eten egin da eragindako eremuetan, eta Ishikawa prefekturako Noto aireportuak itxita jarraitzen du.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant (in Niigata Prefecture) was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported that it had not suffered any damage from the quake, and that the Shika nuclear power plant's 1 and 2 reactors were shut down. It was reported that about 9,400 homes were without water, and about 100 without electricity. It is possible that some roads were damaged; train service was suspended in affected areas, and the Noto airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remained closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: NHK-k ere jakinarazi zuen Kashiwazaki Kariwa indar nuklearreko instalazioa (Niigata prefekturakoa) ohi bezala funtzionatzen ari zela. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. konpainiak jakinarazi zuen ez zuela lurrikararen ondoriozko kalterik izan, eta Shika instalazio nuklearreko 1. eta 2. erreaktoreak itzalita zeudela. Aipatu denez, 9.400 etxe inguru daude eskualdean urik gabe, eta 100 inguru elektrizitaterik gabe. Litekeena da errepide batzuk kaltetuta egotea; tren-zerbitzua eten egin da eragindako eremuetan, eta Ishikawa prefekturako Noto aireportuak itxita jarraitzen du.

src: Filtrazioaren arabera, dokumentua mugako istiluari buruzkoa da, zeinean Palestinak 1967ko Ekialde Hurbileko gerraren aurretik zeuden mugak berreskuratu nahi izatea aipatzen baita. Informazioen arabera, landutako beste gai batzuen artean daude Jerusalemeko estatuaren etorkizuna, zeina sakratua baita bi nazioentzat, eta Jordaneko bailararen auzia. Israelek bailaran militarrak egotea nahi du hitzarmena sinatu eta hurrengo hamar urteetan; Palestinak, berriz, bost urtera mugatu nahi du egonaldia.
mt: According to the filtering, the document is about border disputes, where it is mentioned that Palestine wants to recover the borders that existed before the 1967 Six-Day War.  Other issues mentioned are the future of the state of Jerusalem, which is sacred to both nations, and the issue of the Jordanian bailar.  Israel wants to keep military bases in the bailar for the next ten years; Palestine wants to limit the stay to five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Ma Hong Kongen jaio zen, eta New York-eko unibertsitatean eta Harvard-eko Zuzenbide Eskolan ikasi zuen. Garai batean, Estatu Batuetan bizitzeko “txartel berdea”, baimen iraunkorra, izan zuen. Hauteskundeetan, Hsieh-k iradoki zuen Ma-k herrialdetik ihes egin lezakeela krisi-garaian. Halaber, Hsieh-k esan zuen Ma fotogenikoak estilo gehiago duela substantzia baino. Salaketa horiek jaso arren, Ma-k erraz irabazi zuen, kontinenteko Txinarekin harremanak estutzearen aldeko plataformari esker.
mt: Ma was born in Hong Kong, and studied at New York University and Harvard Law School. At one time, she had a "green card", a permanent visa, to live in the United States. In the elections, Hsieh suggested that Ma could flee the country in a crisis. Hsieh also said that Ma is photogenic and has more style than substance. Despite these allegations, Ma won easily, thanks to a platform to strengthen ties with mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Argi ikusi zenean familia asko etxegabetzeen aurka egiteko laguntza legalaren bila ari zirela, etxebizitzen iruzurraren biktimentzako bilera bat egin zen martxoaren 20an, East Bay-ko Komunitatearen Zuzenbide Zentroan. Maizterrak gertatutakoa azaltzen hasi zirenean, bertan zeuden familia gehienak konturatu ziren OHA-ko Carolyn Wilson-ek haien segurtasun-gordailuak lapurtu zituztela eta hiritik alde egin zuela. Lockwood Gardens-eko maizterrek uste dute beste 40 familia edo gehiago daudela etxegabetzeko arriskuan, OHA-ko polizia Oakland-eko etxebizitzen iruzurrean sartuta egon daitezkeen beste etxebizitza-eraikuntza publiko batzuk ikertzen ari baita.
mt: After hearing about the recent events, many of the families in attendance were shocked to hear that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had stolen their security deposits and fled the city. Lockwood Gardens teachers believe that there are another 40 families or more at risk of being displaced, as OHA police are investigating other public housing developments that could be involved in the Oakland housing scandal.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Lasterketaren ondoren, Keselowski-k jarraitzen du lasterketako buru izaten, 2.250 punturekin. Zazpi puntu atzerago, Johnson dago bigarren postuan 2.243 punturekin. Hirugarrena, Hamlin, hogei puntu atzerago dago, baina Bowyer-ek baino bost gehiago ditu. Kahne eta Truex Jr., berriz, bosgarren eta seigarren dira, hurrenez hurren, 2.220 eta 2.207 punturekin. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth eta Harvick-ek osatzen dute pilotuen lasterketako hamar lehenen zerrenda, denboraldia amaitzeko lau lasterketa falta direnean.
mt: 1. Keselowski 2. Johnson 3. Hamlin 4. Bowyer 5. Kahne 6. Truex Jr. 7. Stewart 8. Gordon 9. Kenseth 10. Harvick
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Ustez, bosgarren aldia da historian Marteko materiala Lurrera erortzen behatu dela; materiala hangoa dela berretsi da kimikoki. Lurrera erori diren 24.000 meteorito ezagunetatik, 34 Martekoak direla ziurtatu ahal izan da soilik. Arroka horietatik hamabost iragan uztaileko ozar-izarretatik datozela uste da. Lurrean oso arraroak diren arroketako batzuk ontzako 11.000 22.500 US$-tan saltzen ari dira, urreak kostatzen duena baino hamar aldiz gehiagoan.
mt: 24,000 meteorites have been found on Earth, of which 34 are known to be from Mars. It is believed that ten of these are from the 2008 meteor shower. Some of these rare rocks are being sold for $11,000 to $22,500, more than ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacher 2006an erretiratu zen Formula 1 lehiaketa zazpi aldiz irabazi ondoren, baina Felipe Massa zauritua ordezteko prest zegoen. Brasildarrak zauri larria du buruan Hungariako 2009ko Sari Nagusian izandako istripuaren ondorioz. Massa lehiaketatik kanpo egongo da, gutxienez, 2009ko denboraldiaren gainerakoan.
mt: 2006, Schumacher retired from Formula 1 racing after winning the championship seven times, but was ready to replace Felipe Massa, who was injured in a crash at the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa will be out of the race, at least for the rest of the 2009 season, due to a severe head injury.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Orain arte, bere erritmoan mugitu eta garatu ahal izan du IM merkatua AOL-ek, Estatu Batuetan erabilera hedatua duelako. Antolamendu hau ezartzen denean, askatasun hori amaitu egingo da. Yahoo! eta Microsoft-en zerbitzuak erabiltzen dituztenak batera hartuta, AOL-ren bezero kopuruaren parera iritsiko dira.
mt: Until now, AOL has been able to maintain its market share in the U.S. because of its wide usage. When this arrangement ends, Yahoo! and Microsoft users will be able to join together to reach AOL's subscriber level.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Auto-bonba batek eztanda egin zuen atzo goizean Gaziantep-eko (Turkia) polizia-kuartelean. Bi polizia hil eta hogei pertsona baino gehiago zauritu zituen. Gobernadorearen bulegokoek esan dutenez, zaurituetatik hemeretzi poliziak ziren. Poliziaren esanean, Daesh-eko (ISIL) militante bat izan liteke erasoaren arduraduna.
mt: A car bomb exploded this morning in the police headquarters in Gaziantep (Turkey). Two police officers were killed and more than twenty people were injured. According to the governor's office, eighteen of the injured were police officers. According to the police, a Daesh (ISIL) militant could be responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote.
