src: Newt Gingrich, Ordezkarien Ganberako bozeramaile ohia, Rick Perry Texas-eko gobernadorea eta Michele Bachmann kongresukidea laugarrena, bosgarrena eta seigarrena izan ziren, hurrenez hurren. Emaitzak plazaratu ondoren, Gingrich-ek Santorum goraipatu zuen, baina hitz gogorrak esan zituen Romney-ri buruz, Iowa-n Gingrich-en aurka argitaratu ziren kanpaina-iragarki negatiboen inguruan. Perry-ren hitzetan, “Texas-era itzuliko naiz gaurko hauteskunde-bilerako emaitza ebaluatzeko eta lehiaketa honetan aurrera egiteko biderik badudan erabakitzeko”. Beranduago, ordea, esan zuen lehian jarraituko zuela eta urtarrilaren 21ean Hego Carolina-ko lehen hauteskundean parte hartuko zuela. Bachmann-ek, abuztuan Ames Straw inkesta irabazi zuenak, kanpaina bertan behera uztea erabaki zuen.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich, former Speaker of the House, Rick Perry, Governor of Texas, and Michele Bachmann, Congresswoman, finished fourth, fifth, and sixth, respectively. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but made harsh comments about Romney, in reference to the negative campaign ads that were released in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry said, “I will return to Texas to evaluate the results of this election and determine whether there is a path forward in this campaign.” Later, however, he said he would continue the race and participate in the first South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Newt Gingrich, Ordezkarien Ganberako bozeramaile ohia, Rick Perry Texas-eko gobernadorea eta Michele Bachmann kongresukidea laugarrena, bosgarrena eta seigarrena izan ziren, hurrenez hurren. Emaitzak plazaratu ondoren, Gingrich-ek Santorum goraipatu zuen, baina hitz gogorrak esan zituen Romney-ri buruz, Iowa-n Gingrich-en aurka argitaratu ziren kanpaina-iragarki negatiboen inguruan. Perry-ren hitzetan, “Texas-era itzuliko naiz gaurko hauteskunde-bilerako emaitza ebaluatzeko eta lehiaketa honetan aurrera egiteko biderik badudan erabakitzeko”. Beranduago, ordea, esan zuen lehian jarraituko zuela eta urtarrilaren 21ean Hego Carolina-ko lehen hauteskundean parte hartuko zuela. Bachmann-ek, abuztuan Ames Straw inkesta irabazi zuenak, kanpaina bertan behera uztea erabaki zuen.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich, former Speaker of the House, Rick Perry, Governor of Texas, and Michele Bachmann, Congresswoman, finished fourth, fifth, and sixth, respectively. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but made harsh comments about Romney, in reference to the negative campaign ads that were released in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry said, “I will return to Texas to evaluate the results of this election and determine whether there is a path forward in this campaign.” Later, however, he said he would continue the race and participate in the first South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Irrati-kanalaren webguneak honela deskribatzen du saioa: “iraganeko irrati-antzerkia ukitu friki berri eta bitxiarekin!” Hasieran, saioa TogiNet Radio Interneteko irrati-webgune iraunkorrean soilik agertzen zen, gehien bat hizketa-irratsaioak dituen horretan. 2015. urtearen amaiera aldera, TogiNet-ek AstroNet Radio kanala ezarri zuen filial gisa. Hasieran, bertako (ekialdeko Texaseko) ahots-aktore amateurrek parte hartzen zuten saioan.
mt: The show is described on the radio channel's website as "a retro radio show with a new, quirky twist!"  Originally, the show was only available on TogiNet Radio's Internet radio station, which was mostly talk radio.  In late 2015, TogiNet launched AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary.  Originally, amateur voice actors from the (east Texas) area participated in the show.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Mumbai-ko erasotzaileak itsasontziz iritsi ziren 2008ko azaroaren 26an, eta granadez eta arma automatikoz erasotu zituzten hainbat toki, Chhatrapati Shivaji tren estazioa eta Taj Mahal Hotela, besteak beste. David Headley-k egindako behaketek eta jasotako informazioak lagundu zuten Pakistango Laskhar-e-Taiba taldearen 10 erasotzailek egindako operazioa. Erasoak tentsio handia eragin zuen India eta Pakistanen arteko harremanetan.
mt: 2008 Mumbai attacks were carried out by 10 terrorists who arrived by sea on November 26, 2008, and attacked several locations, including Chhatrapati Shivaji railway station and the Taj Mahal Hotel, with grenades and automatic weapons. David Headley's reconnaissance and information gathering helped the Lashkar-e-Taiba terrorist group in the operation. The attacks strained relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: Nadal-ek kanadiarraren aurka duen errekorra 7 eta 2-koa da. Duela gutxi galdu du Raonic-en kontra Brisbane-ko Openean. Nadal-ek sareko puntuen % 88 bereganatu zituen partidan, eta 76 puntu irabazi zituen lehen sakearekin. Lur zanpatuaren erregeak honela esan zuen partida amaitzean: “Pozik nago finalerako bidean nagoelako berriro lehiaketa garrantzitsuenetako batean. Lehiaketa hau irabaztera etorri naiz.”
mt: 7-2 Nadal's record against Canadians. Recently lost to Raonic in Brisbane. Nadal won 88% of the points in the match, and won 76 points on his first serve. The king of clay said after the match: "I'm happy to be in the final of a big tournament again. I came to win this tournament."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Pasa den astean, Naked News-ek iragarri zuen izugarri handituko zuela berriak ematerakoan nazioarteko hizkuntzak erabiltzeko agindua, eta hiru saio berri izango dituela. Dagoeneko ingelesez eta japonieraz ematen ditu berriak, eta orain gaztelaniaz, italieraz eta koreeraz eskainitako saioak jarriko ditu abian telebistan, sarean eta telefono mugikorretan ikusteko.
mt: In the coming week, Naked News announced that it would greatly expand its use of foreign languages in its news reports, and would launch three new shows. It already reports in English and Japanese, and will now offer shows in Spanish, Italian, and Korean, available on television, the web, and mobile phones.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Asteazkeneko ekitaldiaz gain, Carpanedo-k beste bi banakako lasterketatan parte hartu zuen Txapelketan. Lehen proba eslaloma izan zen, eta lehen jaitsieran ez zuen ibilbidea amaitu. 116 lehiakideetatik 36k emaitza bera izan zuten lasterketa hartan. Eslalom erraldoian, berriz, hamargarren bukatu zuen emakumeen eseritakoen taldean, 4:41.30 denbora konbinatua eginda, lehen postuan amaitu zuen Austriako Claudia Loesch-ek baino 2:11.60 minutu beranduago, eta bederatzigarren amaitu zuen Hungariako Gyöngyi Dani-k lortutakoa baino 1:09.02 minutu beranduago. Emakumeen eseritakoen taldeko lau kidek ez zuten jaitsiera amaitzerik lortu, eta eslalom erraldoian parte hartu zuten 117 eskiatzaileetatik 45ek ez zuten lortu sailkatzea.
mt: 2nd day, Carpanedo also participated in two other individual events in the competition. The first race was a slalom, and she did not finish the course in the first run. Of the 116 competitors, 36 had the same result in that race. In the giant slalom, she finished 16th in the women's sitting team, with a combined time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes behind the first place finisher, Claudia Loesch of Austria, and 1:09.02 minutes behind the 18th finisher, Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four of the five members of the women's sitting team did not finish the course, and of the 117 skiers who participated in the giant slalom, 45 did not qualify.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Asteazkenean, Estatu Batuetako Saskibaloi Elkarte Nazionalak (NBA) bertan behera utzi zuen uneko saskibaloi-denboraldia, COVID-19a dela eta. Utah Jazz taldeko jokalari batek COVID-19 birusaren proban emaitza positiboa jasotzean hartu zuen erabakia NBAk.
mt: On Tuesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) in the United States postponed its current basketball season, due to COVID-19. The decision was made after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Washington Capitals taldeko Alex Ovechkin da gaurko jokalaria. Bi gol eta bi asistentzia egin zituen Washington-ek Atlanta Thrashers-en aurka jokatutako partidan, eta 5-3 irabazi zuten. Ovechkin-en gaueko lehen asistentzia erabakigarria izan zen partida irabazteko, hari esker egin baitzuen gola Nicklas Backstrom hasiberriak; egindako bigarren gola, berriz, bere denboraldiko 60. gola izan da. Hala, denboraldi batean 60 gol edo gehiago egin dituen lehen jokalaria da 1995-96 denboraldiaz geroztik. Denboraldi hartan Jaromir Jagr eta Mario Lemieux jokalariek lortu zuten marka hori.
mt: Washington Capitals forward Alex Ovechkin is the NHL's first star. He scored two goals and two assists in a 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers, including the game-winning assist on Nicklas Backstrom's first goal; his second goal was his 60th of the season. He is the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished the feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Northern Rock bankua nazionalizatu egin zen 2008an, Britainia Handiko gobernuaren larrialdiko laguntza jaso zuela jakin zenean. Northern Rock-ek laguntza behar izan zuen 2007ko arrisku handiko hipotekekin izan zituen gorabeherak direla eta. Richard Branson-en Virgin Group-ek erosketa-eskaintza bat egina zuen nazionalizatu aurretik, baina bankuak ez zuen onartu. 2010ean, nazionalizatuta zegoen bitartean, Northern Rock plc banku komertziala Northern Rock (ondasunen kudeaketa) “banku txarretik” banatu zen. Virgin-ek Northern Rock-en “banku ona” soilik erosi zuen, ez ondasunen kudeaketaz arduratzen zen enpresa.
mt: 2008, the Northern Rock bank was nationalized when it was known to have received government bailout. Northern Rock needed help due to the turmoil of its risky mortgages in 2007. Richard Branson's Virgin Group made an offer to buy the bank before it was nationalized, but the bank did not accept. In 2010, while it was nationalized, the commercial bank Northern Rock plc was separated from the Northern Rock (asset management) "bad bank". Virgin bought only the "good bank" of Northern Rock, not the company that took care of the assets.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Rudd-ek Kyoto-ko klimari buruzko hitzarmena sinatzeko erabakiak bakarrik utziko ditu Estatu Batuak, hitzarmenarekin bat ez datorren herrialde garatu bakarra izango baita. Australiako iraganeko gobernu kontserbadoreak ez zuen Kyoto-ko hitzarmena sinatu, ikatzaren esportazioetan mendekotasun handia duen ekonomia kaltetuko zuela esanez, India-k eta Txina-k emisio-helburuekiko konpromisorik ez zuten bitartean.
mt: Rudd has decided to leave the decision to sign the Kyoto climate treaty to the US, the only developed country not to sign the treaty. The previous conservative Australian government did not sign the Kyoto treaty, saying that its coal-exporting economy would be hurt, while India and China had no emissions commitments.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Plagen kontrol osagarriaren proban zeuden ehiztariak zorrotz zaindu zituzten basozainek, probaren jarraipena egiten eta haren eraginkortasuna ebaluatzen ari baitziren. NPWSrekin eta Australiako Kirol-tiratzaileen elkartearekin (Hegoaldeko Gales Berria) lankidetzan, kualifikazioa zuten boluntarioak aukeratu zituzten, Kirol-tiratzaileen elkarteko ehiza-programaren barruan. Mick O'Flynn-ek, NPWSko Parkearen Kontserbazio eta Ondarearen Zuzendari exekutiboak, esan duenez, lehen tiro-operaziorako hautatutako lau tiratzaileek segurtasun- eta trebakuntza-jarraibide osoak jaso zituzten.
mt: The shooters were closely monitored by the park rangers, who were also evaluating the effectiveness of the control. The shooters were selected in collaboration with NPWS and the Shooting Association of South Australia (SA). Mick O'Flynn, NPWS's Executive Director of Conservation and Heritage, said the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation had received very detailed safety and training guidelines.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

The shooters were selected in collaboration with NPWS and the Shooting Association of South Australia (SA). Mick O'Flynn, NPWS's Executive Director of Conservation and Heritage, said the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation had received very detailed safety and training guidelines.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: Fosil honen arabera, aztarna molekularrek aurresandakoa baino lehenago gertatu zen banaketa. “Horrek esan nahi du guztia berrantolatu egin behar dela” esan du Bernhane Asfaw-ek, Etiopiako Rift Haraneko Ikerketa Zerbitzuko ikertzaile eta azterketaren egileetako batek.
mt: The molecular traces suggest the split occurred before what was previously thought. "This means everything needs to be reorganized," says Bernhane Asfaw, an investigator and author of the study at the Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Service.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Tokyo Game Show-eko osteguneko atariko aurkezpenean, Satoru Iwata-k, Nintendo-ko presidenteak, konpainiaren Nintendo Revolution kontsola berrirako kontrolagailuaren diseinu berria erakutsi zuen. Kontrolagailua telebistako urruneko kontrolaren antzekoa da, eta erabiltzailearen telebistatik gertu dauden bi sentsore erabiltzen ditu hiru dimentsioko espazioan erabiltzailearen kokapena triangulatzeko. Horri esker, jokalariek bideo-jokoetako ekintzak eta mugimenduak kontrolatu ahal izango dituzte gailua airean mugituta.
mt: At the Tokyo Game Show's Monday morning keynote, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata showed off the new design for the controller for the company's Nintendo Revolution console. The controller is similar to a remote control for a television, and uses two sensors close to the player's television to triangulate the player's position in three dimensions. This allows players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the controller in the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Horren aurretik, Xinhua albiste-agentzia txinatarrak esan zuen hegazkin bat bahitu zutela. Beranduago aipatu zen hegazkinak bonba-mehatxu bat jaso zuela eta Afganistanera desbideratu zela, Kandahar-en lurreratzeko. Hasierako adierazpenen arabera, Afganistanera bidali zuten bueltan, Ürümqi-n larrialdiko lurreratzea egiteko aukerari ezezkoa eman ondoren.
mt: Earlier, Xinhua news agency reported that a plane was hijacked. Later it was reported that the plane had received a bomb threat and was diverted to Afghanistan to land in Kandahar. In initial statements, it was reported that the plane was sent back to Afghanistan after the option of an emergency landing in Ürümqi was rejected.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: Astelehenean, Sara Danius-ek, Suediako Akademiako Literaturako Nobelaren Batzordeko idazkari iraunkorrak, publikoki azaldu zuen Suediako Sveriges Radio-ko irrati-programa batean bertan behera utzi zutela Bob Dylan-ekin zuzenean harremanetan jartzeko ahalegina, 2016ko Literaturako Nobel Saria irabazi duela jakinarazteko. Danius-en hitzetan, “Une honetan ez gara ezer egiten ari. Gertuen duen kolaboratzaileari deitu eta mezu elektronikoak bidali dizkiot, eta erantzun oso abegikorrak jaso ditut. Oraingoz, hori da guztia.”
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, publicly announced that they had abandoned their attempt to contact Bob Dylan directly to inform him of his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature. In her words, "We are not doing anything at the moment. We have contacted the closest collaborator and sent electronic messages, and we have received very polite answers. That's all for now."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: George W. Bush AEBetako presidenteak ontzat jo zuen iragarpena. Bush-en bozeramaile Gordon Johndroe-k adierazi zuenez, Ipar Korearen eskaera “urrats handia da Koreako penintsularen desnuklearizazio egiaztagarria lortzera bidean.”
mt: George W. Bush, President of the United States, welcomed the announcement. Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe said, "This is a significant step toward verifiably ending North Korea's nuclear weapons program."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: 1956an, Słania Suediara joan zen, eta, hiru urte beranduago, Suediako posta-zerbitzurako hasi zen lanean; grabatzaileen buru izatera heldu zen. Suediarako eta beste 28 herrialdetarako 1.000 zigilu baino gehiago ekoitzi zituen. Haren lanak halako kalitatea eta xehetasunak ditu, ezen filatelisten artean “etxeko izen” bakarrenetakoa baita. Zenbait filatelista espezialistak dira haren lana biltzen. 1.000. zigiluan David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl-en “Suediako erregeen balentria handiak” artelan bikaina irudikatu zuen, 2000. urtekoa. Munduko Errekorren Guinness Liburuan dago jasota. Horrez gain, hainbat herrialdetako billeteak ere grabatu zituen. Haren lanaren adibiderik berrienak dira Kanadako $5 eta $100 billeteen aurrealdeko lehen ministerioaren erretratuak.
mt: 1956, Słania moved to Sweden, and three years later, began working for the Swedish postal service; he became head of the engravers. He designed over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work has such quality and detail that he is one of the few “home names” in philately. A few philatelic specialists are collecting his work. The 1,000th stamp, “The Great Achievements of the Swedish Kings” by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl, was a beautiful work of art, 2000th anniversary. It is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. In addition, he also engraved the front of several countries' bills. Some of his latest works are the front of the Canadian $5 and $100 bills of the Prime Minister.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Trans-Alaska Hodi Sistemako 800 milia itxi egin ziren Fairbanks hegoaldean (Alaska), petrolio gordinaren milaka kupel isuri ondoren. Abian jartzeko agindu-sistemaren ohiko proba baten ondoren gertatutako argindar-hutsegite baten ondorioz, askatze-balbulak ireki egin ziren eta petrolio gordinak gainezka egin zuen Fort Greely-ko 9 ponpaketa-estaziotik gertu. Balbulak irekitzean presioa askatu egin zen sisteman, eta petrolioa isuri zen kuxin batetik 55.000 kupeleko (2,3 milioi galoiko) edukiera duen tanke batera. Asteazken arratsaldean, tankeko hodietatik oraindik ere petrolioa isurtzen ari zen, ziurrenez tanke barruko espantsio termikoa dela eta. 104.500 kupel eusteko gaitasuna duen eta tankearen azpian kokatuta dagoen bigarren mailako euste-eremua guztiz bete gabe zegoen oraindik.
mt: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed south of Fairbanks (Alaska) after thousands of barrels of crude oil spilled. The release was caused by a power outage during a routine test of the pipeline's pressure control system. When the valves were opened, pressure was released in the system and oil spilled from a 55,000-barrel (2.3 million gallon) tank. As of Monday evening, oil was still spilling from the tank's pipes, likely due to thermal expansion inside the tank. The second containment area, which can hold 104,500 barrels, was not yet full.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: AEBko Ingeniarien Gorputzak zenbatetsi duenez, 6 hazbeteko euri-jasak apurtzeko arriskuan jarriko ditu lehendik hondatuta zeuden dikeak. Bederatzigarren Distrituak, Katrina urakanak jo zuenean 20 oinetara arteko uholdeak pairatu zituenak, gerrirainoko ura du une honetan, urak ondoko dikea gainditu baitu. 100 oineko zabalera duen sekzio batean ari da ura diketik gainezka egiten.
mt: 6 feet of rain could overwhelm levees already damaged by Katrina, the ninth district, which suffered 20 feet of flooding when the hurricane hit, has gulf water now, as the water has gone over the next levee. The section is 100 feet wide.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton-ek berretsi du Howard University ospitaleak pazientea onartu duela eta egoera egonkorrean dagoela. Pazientea Nigeria-n egon zen, ebola birusaren kasu batzuk agertu diren tokian. Ospitaleak infekzio-kontrolerako protokoloari jarraitu dio, eta, besteak beste, pazientea bereizi egin du besteak infektatu ez ditzan.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that the patient was accepted by Howard University Hospital and is in stable condition. The patient had been in Nigeria, where cases of Ebola virus have been reported. The hospital has followed infection control protocols, including isolating the patient from others to prevent infection.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Litekeena da izar uxoak izatea Lurra urez hornitu zuten iturrietako bat, baita proteinak sortu eta bizia garatzen lagundu dezakeen materia organikoaren iturrietako bat ere. Zientzialariek planetak nola eratzen diren ulertu nahi dute, batez ere, Lurra nola sortu zen; izan ere, izar uxoek duela asko talka egin zuten Lurrarekin.
mt: It is possible that comets brought water to Earth to fill the oceans, and also brought organic material that could have helped life develop. Scientists want to understand how planets are formed, especially how Earth was formed; comets have collided with Earth in the distant past.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Agintariak mehatxuaren sinesgarritasunaz ziur ez badaude ere, Maryland-eko Garraio Agintaritzak itxi egin zuen FBIren eskaerari jarraituz. Iraulki-kamioiak erabili ziren tunel-sarrerak blokeatzeko, eta 80 poliziaren laguntza behar izan zen gidariak beste bide batzuetara desbideratzeko. Ez da trafiko-atzerapen larririk egon saihesbidean, hiriaren ordezko ibilbidean.
mt: While officials are not sure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the tunnel at the request of the FBI. Trucks were used to block the entrances, and 80 police officers were used to divert drivers to other routes. There was no major traffic delay in the alternate route, through the city.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: Argazkilaria Ronald Reagan UCLA zentro medikora garraiatu zuten, eta han hil zen. 20 urte inguru zituen. Bieber-ek emandako adierazpenean esan zuenez, “ez nintzen istripuan bertan egon eta ez nuen inolako esku-hartzerik izan, baina biktimaren familiari nire doluminak eman nahi dizkiot.” Aisialdiko albisteei buruzko TMZ webgunearen arabera, argazkilariak Sepulveda bulebarraren beste aldean gelditu zuen ibilgailua eta poliziaren geldialdiaren argazkiak ateratzen saiatu zen, errepidea gurutzatu eta aurrera jarraitu aurretik. Orduan, Kaliforniako Errepideko Zaintzako poliziak gelditzeko eta itzultzeko eskatu zioten bi aldiz. Poliziaren arabera, argazkilaria jo zuen ibilgailuaren gidariak ez du salaketa kriminalik izango.
mt: The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he died. He was about 20 years old. In a statement given by Bieber, he said, “I wasn’t at the scene of the accident and I didn’t have any involvement, but I wanted to send my condolences to the victim’s family.” According to the TMZ website, which covers celebrity news, the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of the Sepulveda Boulevard and took pictures of the police stop, before crossing the road and continuing. Then, the California Highway Patrol asked him to stop and turn around twice. According to police, the photographer hit the vehicle’s driver, who will not have criminal charges.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: Arias-ek positibo eman du birusaren aldaera apalaren proban, Presidentetzaren Ministro Rodrigo Arias-ek esan duenez. Presidentearen egoera egonkorra da, baina etxean isolatuta egongo da hainbat egunez. Sukarra eta eztarria urratuta izan arren, ongi sentitzen naiz eta bide telematikoetatik lanean jarraitzeko moduan nago. “Astelehenean lanera bueltatzea espero dut” esan du Arias-ek adierazpen batean.
mt: Arias has tested positive for the milder strain of the virus, according to President Arias. The President's condition is stable, but he will be isolated at home for several days. Although he has been hit in the chest and throat, he feels well and is working from home via telecommuting. "I expect to return to work on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Arias-ek positibo eman du birusaren aldaera apalaren proban, Presidentetzaren Ministro Rodrigo Arias-ek esan duenez. Presidentearen egoera egonkorra da, baina etxean isolatuta egongo da hainbat egunez. Sukarra eta eztarria urratuta izan arren, ongi sentitzen naiz eta bide telematikoetatik lanean jarraitzeko moduan nago. “Astelehenean lanera bueltatzea espero dut” esan du Arias-ek adierazpen batean.
mt: Arias has tested positive for the milder strain of the virus, according to President Arias. The President's condition is stable, but he will be isolated at home for several days. Although he has been hit in the chest and throat, he feels well and is working from home via telecommuting. "I expect to return to work on Monday," Arias said in a statement.
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Punturik gorenean, Gonu zikloi tropikalaren haizea 240 kilometro orduko (149 milia orduko) abiadura izatera iritsi zen. Maldivatako hizkuntzan palma hostoen poltsa esan nahi du izenak. Gaur goizean haizeak 83 km/h-ko abiadura zuen eta ahultzen joatea espero da.
mt: At its peak, the storm's winds reached 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour). In the Maldivian language, it means "the palm tree's basket". Winds were at 83 km/h this morning and are expected to subside.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Marea gorriak sortzen dira, Karenia brevis itsasoko organismo zelulabakarra ohi baino kontzentrazio handiagoan agertzen denean. Faktore naturalek bat egin eta kondizio egokiak daudenean alga honen kantitatea izugarri handitzen da. Algak neurotoxina bat ekoizten du, zeinak gizakien nahiz arrainen nerbioak desgaitu baititzake. Arrainak hil egiten dira maiz, uretan dagoen toxinaren kontzentrazio handia dela eta. Haizearen eta olatuen bidez airera iristen den ura arnastean eragiten die gizakiei.
mt: Red tides are formed when Karenia brevis, a single-celled organism found in the ocean, appears in unusually high concentrations. Under the right conditions, the organism's numbers can increase dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can paralyze the nervous systems of humans and fish. Fish often die from the high concentration of toxin in the water. The water is carried to the air by wind and waves, where humans can inhale it.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: Felicia, Saffir-Simpson urakan-eskalan 4. kategoriako ekaitza izandakoa, ahuldu eta depresio tropikal bihurtu zen, asteartean saretu zen arte. Haren hondarrek zaparradak eragin zituzten uharte gehienetan, baina, oraingoz, ez da kalterik edo uholderik gertatu. Prezipitazioak 6,34 hazbetera iritsi ziren, Oahu-ko neurgailu baten arabera, eta “onuragarritzat” jo dira. Euri-jasaren zati batean trumoiak eta tximista ugari izan ziren.
mt: Felicia, a tropical storm that had been a Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale, weakened to a tropical depression on Monday, before dissipating. Its remnants brought rain to most of the islands, but, so far, no damage or flooding has been reported. Rainfall totaled 6.34 inches, according to a gauge on Oahu, and was “beneficial.” There were also numerous showers and thunderstorms in the storm's wake.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr.-ek istripua izan zuen Singapurreko 2008ko Sari Nagusian, Fernando Alonso-k geldialdi tekniko goiztiar eta erraza egin ondoren, eta segurtasun-autoa atera behar izan zen. Alonso-ren aurretik zeuden autoak segurtasun-autoaren atzean erregai bila zihoazela, Alonsok multzoan aurrera egin eta saria irabaztea lortu zuen. Piquet Jr. kaleratu egin zuten Hungariako 2009ko Sari Nagusiaren ondoren.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix: Piquet Jr. crashed after Fernando Alonso made an early and easy pit stop, and the safety car was deployed. Alonso passed the cars in front of him, looking for fuel, and won the race. Piquet Jr. was disqualified after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Science aldizkarian ostegunean argitaratutako ikerketa batean jakinarazi zen hegazti espezie berri bat sortzen ari zela Ekuadorreko Galapago uharteetan. Estatu Batuetako Princeton unibertsitateko eta Suediako Uppsala unibertsitateko ikertzaileek esan dutenez, espezie berri bat sortu da bi belaunalditan, nahiz eta prozesua hori askoz luzeagoa zela uste izan; hain zuzen ere, elkarrekin ugaldu dira Darwinen txonta (Geospiza fortes) eta kaktus txonta immigrantea (Geospiza conirostris).
mt: A new bird species is being created on the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador, according to a study published in Science on Monday. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden say a new species has arisen in two generations, though the process has taken much longer than expected; in fact, they have bred together Darwin's finch (Geospiza fortes) and the immigrant cactus finch (Geospiza conirostris).
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Ekitaldi artistikoa Bukaresteko udaletxearen kanpaina baten parte da, Errumaniako hiriburua sormenez betetako metropoli koloretsuaren irudia berriz indartu nahi duena. Europa hego-ekialdeko lehen hiria izango da CowParade antolatzen, munduko arte-ekitaldi publikorik handiena, zeina aurtengo ekainetik abuztura bitartean ospatuko baita.
mt: The event is part of a campaign by the city hall to reinvigorate Bucharest as a colorful metropolis of art. It will be the first city in Southeast Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, which will be held from June to August.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Hegazkina Irkutsk-era zihoan eta herrialdeko tropek gidatzen zuten. Galdeketa bat egin da gertaera ikertzeko. II-76a Errusiako eta Sobietarren armadetako osagai garrantzitsua izan da 1970. hamarkadaz geroztik, eta duela hilabete beste istripu larri bat izan zuen Errusian. Urriaren 7an, motor bat hegazkinetik askatu zen aireratzeko unean; ez zen zauriturik egon. Errusiak II-76ak lurrean utzi zituen tarte labur batez istripua gertatu ondoren.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was being escorted by Russian troops. An investigation has been launched into the incident. The II-76 has been a key component of the Russian and Soviet armed forces since the 1970s, and just last month had another serious incident in Russia. On October 7, a motor fell off the plane during takeoff; no one was injured. Russia grounded its II-76s after the incident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: The Simpsons saioaren aurretik, Simon-ek beste hainbat saiotan lan egin zuen lanpostu ezberdinetan. 1980ko hamarkadan, Taxi, Cheers eta The Tracy Ullman Show saioetan lan egin zuen, besteak beste. 1989an The Simpsons sortzen lagundu zuen Brooks eta Groening-ekin batera, eta saioaren lehen idazle taldea kontratatzeaz arduratu zen. Saioa 1993an utzi arren, ekoizle exekutibo izaten jarraitu zuen, eta denboraldi bakoitzean hamarnaka milioi dolar jasotzen jarraitu zuen egile-eskubideengatik.
mt: Before The Simpsons, Simon worked on other shows in various capacities. In the 1980s, he worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show, among others. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing staff. He left the show in 1993, but continued to serve as executive producer, and continued to earn millions of dollars per season for his share of the show's copyright.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke-k idatzi zuenez, ez dira arrakastatsuak izan emakumeek beren osasunari buruz hitz egiteko saiakerak isiltzeko ahaleginak. Ondorio horretara iritsi zen emakume nahiz gizonengandik jasotako iritzi positiboak eta sostengu zabala jaso zuelako, kontrazepziorako botikak behar mediko gisa har zitezela eskatzeko garaian.
mt: Fluke wrote that women are not successful in their attempts to remain silent about their health. They received positive feedback and support from both men and women, when they asked for prescription drugs as a medical necessity, during the time of their contraception.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: Uraren portaera bera izan behar du. Gardena da, ura bezala. Horregatik, kostatik gertu egonez gero, hondoan dauden harriak edo zikinkeria ikusteko gai izango zinateke. Dakigunaren arabera, gorputz planetario bakarra dago Titan-ek baino dinamismo gehiago duena; haren izena Lurra da” gehitu zuen Stofan-ek.
mt: "It should behave like water. It's like water. So if you're close to the shore, you should be able to see rocks or debris on the bottom. We know of only one other body in the solar system that has more dynamic activity than this, and that's called Earth," Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Horrek baieztatu egiten du dinosauro batzuek behintzat lumak dituztela dioen teoria eta, gainera, fosilek oro har eman ez ditzaketen xehetasun batzuk erakusten ditu, besteak beste, kolorea eta hiru dimentsiotako antolamendua. Zientzialariek diote animaliaren lumajea gaztaina-kolorekoa zela goiko aldean eta karotenoide-kolore edo kolore apalekoa azpialdean. Aurkikuntzak, gainera, lumek hegaztietan izan duten bilakaerari buruzko xehetasunak ematen ditu. Dinosauroen lumek ez dute ongi garatutako estalkia (errakia izenekoa) baina badituzte lumen beste ezaugarri batzuk (luma-bizarrak); horregatik, ikertzaileek ondorioztatu dute errakia eboluzioan beranduago garatu zela aipatu beste ezaugarriak baino. Lumaren egituratik ondoriozta daiteke ez zirela hegan egiteko erabiltzen, tenperatura erregulatzeko edo itxura aldatzeko baizik. Ikertzaileen proposamenaren arabera, dinosauro gazte baten isatsa bada ere, laginak lumaje heldua erakusten du, ez kume baten lumatxa. Ikertzaileen proposamenaren arabera, dinosauro gazte baten isatsa bada ere, laginak lumaje heldua erakusten du, ez kume baten lumatxa.
mt: This discovery confirms the theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers and, moreover, shows details that fossils usually do not show, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists say the animal's plumage was chestnut-colored on top and pale or carotenoid-colored on the bottom. The discovery also provides details about the evolution of feathers in birds. The dinosaur's feathers do not have a well-developed covering (the rachis) but they do have other features of feathers (rachis-like structures); therefore, researchers conclude that the rachis evolved later than the other features. The structure of the feather suggests that they were not used for flight, temperature regulation or appearance. According to the researchers' proposal, the tail of a young dinosaur is also showing adult plumage, not a chick's down. According to the researchers' proposal, the tail of a young dinosaur is also showing adult plumage, not a chick's down.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

According to the researchers' proposal, the tail of a young dinosaur is also showing adult plumage, not a chick's down. According to the researchers' proposal, the tail of a young dinosaur is also showing adult plumage, not a chick's down.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Txerto esperimental batek ebolak eragindako hilkortasuna murrizteko gaitasuna duela badirudi ere, ez dago infekzioa tratatzeko egokia dela argi erakutsi duen botikarik. ZMapp antigorputz-koktela esparru horretan erabil zitekeela zirudien arren, egindako ikerketa formalek erakutsi zuten heriotza saihesteko garaian nahi baino onura txikiagoa eragiten zuela. PALM entseguan, ZMapp kontrol gisa erabili zen; hau da, ikerlariek hura oinarri gisa erabili zuten eta horrekin alderatu zituzten beste hiru tratamenduak.
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to have some efficacy in reducing mortality from Ebola, there is no clear evidence that any drug is effective in treating the infection. ZMapp, a cocktail of antibodies, was thought to be promising in the early days of the outbreak, but formal studies showed that it was less effective than hoped in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that researchers used it as a baseline and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Astelehenean, Stanford Unibertsitateko Medikuntza Eskolako ikerlariek iragarri zuten tresna diagnostiko berri bat asmatu zutela zelulak motaren arabera sailkatzeko: txip inprimagarri txiki bat da, tinta inprimagailu estandarrak erabiliz sor daitekeena, dolar amerikar baten zentimo baten truke. Ikertzaile nagusiek diotenez, minbizia, tuberkulosia, GIB birusa eta malaria goiz detektatzeko aukera emango du herrialde txiroetan, bularreko minbiziaren eta beste zenbait gaixotasunen biziraupen-tasa herrialde aberatsagoetan denaren erdia izan baitaiteke.
mt: On Monday, researchers at Stanford University's School of Medicine announced the development of a new diagnostic tool to classify cells by type: a tiny inkjet-printed chip that can be made using standard inkjet printers and costs a fraction of a cent. The lead researchers say the device will provide an opportunity to detect cancer, tuberculosis, HIV/AIDS and malaria early in poor countries, where survival rates for breast cancer and other diseases can be half that of wealthier nations.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Zientzialariek ilargiaren gainazalean barreiatutako lur-formak aurkitu zituzten, malkar lobatu izenekoak, zeinak ilargia oso mantso uzkurtzearen eraginez sortzen baitira, antza. Ilargi osoan zehar aurkitu dira malkar horiek eta, itxuraz, ez daude ia batere higatuta; horrek esan nahi du egitura horiek sortu dituzten gertaera geologikoak nahiko berriak direla. Ilargian jarduera geologikorik ez dagoela dioen teoriaren kontra egiten du honek.
mt: Scientists have found craters filled with lunar soil, called "lobate scarp", which are thought to have been formed by the shrinking of the moon due to its lack of tectonic activity. They have been found all over the moon and appear to be almost untouched, which suggests that the geological events that created them are relatively recent. This goes against the theory that there is no geological activity on the moon.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: Ordutik, Adekoya Edinburgoko Sheriffaren epaitegian egon da semea erailtzea leporatuta. Zaintzapean dago salaketa eta epaiketaren zain, baina litekeena da lekukoen frogak guztiz sinesgarriak ez izatea, haren irudia toki askotan argitaratu delako. Britainia Handian ohikoa da hala egitea, baina Eskoziako justiziak beste modu batera funtzionatzen du, eta epaitegien ustez, argazkiak argitaratzea kaltegarria izan daiteke. Dundee-ko Unibertsitateko Pamela Ferguson irakasleak esan duenez, “kazetariak lerro mehe baten gainean ibiltzen dira susmagarrien argazkiak eta abar argitaratzen dituztenean.” Koroaren Bulegoak, salaketen ardura orokorra duenak, kazetariei esan die ez dela besterik azalduko, gutxienez, salaketa egin arte.
mt: Since then, Adekoya has been in custody at Edinburgh Sheriff Court, charged with murdering his son. The case is under investigation and the trial is pending, but it is possible that the evidence of witnesses will not be entirely credible, as his image has been published in many places. It is common in Britain, but the justice system in Scotland works differently, and the courts believe that publishing pictures of suspects can be damaging. Pamela Ferguson, a lecturer at the University of Dundee, says, “Journalists walk a thin line when they publish pictures of suspects and their accomplices.” The Crown Office, which is responsible for all charges, has said that nothing will be revealed, at least until the charges are filed.
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Izotz suntsitzaileaz gain, muturreko eguraldiak zaildu egin ditu erreskate-lanak. Pittman-en esanean, kondizioak ez dira hobetuko datorren astera arte. Pittman-en arabera, azken 15 urteetan itsas txakurren ehiztariek ikusi duten handiena da izotz-geruzaren kantitatea eta lodiera.
mt: In addition to the melting ice, extreme weather has complicated rescue efforts. Pittman said conditions won't improve until tomorrow. Pittman said the most they've seen in 15 years of seal hunting is the amount and thickness of the ice.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts-ek guztiz uko egin dio bizitzaren hasierari buruz duen iritzia emateari. Gai garrantzitsua da abortuaren etika kontuan hartzean, eta esaten du ez litzatekeela etikoa izango halako kasuen xehetasunei buruzko iritzia ematea. Hala ere, berriz aipatu zuen Roe vs Wade kasua zela “legea finkatu zuena”, eta Gorte Gorenaren ebazpenak irmoak izatearen garrantzia nabarmendu zuen. Halaber, berretsi zuen pribatutasunerako eskubide inplizituan sinisten zuela, zeinaren mende egon baitzen Roe-ren erabakia.
mt: Roberts said he would not comment on his views on the beginning of life. The issue is important in considering the ethics of abortion, and he said it would not be ethical to comment on the details of such cases. However, he again mentioned the Roe vs Wade case as “setting the law”, and emphasized the importance of the Supreme Court’s decision. He also reaffirmed his belief in the implicit right to privacy, which was the basis of Roe’s decision.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: 8:46an (am), puntu-puntuan, isiltasuna nagusitu zen hirian, lehen hegazkinak itua jo zuen une zehatza markatuta. Bi argi-izpi ezarri dira zerura begira gauez. Gunean bost etxe orratz berri eraikitzen ari dira, eta erdian garraio-zentro bat eta oroitzapen-parke bat egongo dira.
mt: 8:46 am, exactly, silence fell over the city as the first plane hit the ground. Two searchlights are pointed skyward at night. Five new skyscrapers are being built in the area, and a transportation hub and memorial park will be in the center.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: “The Seven Sisters” izenez ezagutzen diren kobazuloen sarrera guztiek 100 eta 250 metro (328 eta 820 oin) arteko diametroa dute. Infragorrien bidezko irudiek erakusten dutenez, gauez eta egunez dauden tenperatura-aldaketek agerian uzten dute kobazuloak direla. Egunean zehar inguruko gainazala baino hotzagoak dira eta epelagoak gauean. “Portaera termikoa ez da Lurreko kobazulo handiena bezain egonkorra (nahiko tenperatura konstantea izan ohi dute), baina bat egiten dute lurrean dauden zulo sakon hauekin” esan du Glen Cushing-ek, Estatu Batuetako Azterketa Geologikoen (USGS) Astrogeologia taldeko eta Flagstaff-eko (Arizona) Ipar Arizonako Unibertsitateko kideak.
mt: “The Seven Sisters” are named for the seven entrances to the cave system. The entrances are 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the cave is a cold spot at night and a hot spot during the day. “The thermal behavior is not as constant as the largest cave on Earth, but it does share some characteristics with these deep holes in the ground,” said Glen Cushing, a member of the Astrogeology team at the U.S. Geological Survey and the University of Northern Arizona in Flagstaff.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Ustez, gizonak lehergaiz betetako hiru gurpileko ibilgailu bat gidatu zuen jende artera. Bonba lehertzearen ustezko arduraduna atxilotu egin zuten, eztandaren eraginez zauriak pairatu ondoren. Agintariek oraindik ez dute ezagutzen haren izena, baina badakite Uighur-en talde etnikoko kide bat dela.
mt: It is believed that the man drove a three-wheeled vehicle filled with explosives into a crowd. The suspected bomb maker was arrested after the explosion, which injured him. Authorities have not yet identified his name, but they know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Hegoafrikak All Blacks-ak (Zeelanda Berria) garaitu ditu Tri Nations lehiaketako partida batean, Rustenburg-eko (Hegoafrika) Royal Bafokeng estadioan. Azken puntuazioa 21-20 izan zen, puntu bateko aldearekin irabazi zuten, eta horrekin amaitu zen 15 partida iraun dituen All Blacks taldearen irabazte-bolada. Springbok-en kasuan, bolada aldaketa ekarri zuen irabazteak, bost partida segidan galdu ondoren. All Blacks-en azken partida zen, duela bi aste trofeoa irabazi baitzuen. Serieko azken partida Johannesburg-eko Ellis Park-en egingo da datorren astean, Springbok eta Australiaren arteko norgehiagokan.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a Tri Nations match, at the Royal Bafokeng stadium in Rustenburg (South Africa). The final score was 21-20, with a one-point margin of victory, ending the All Blacks' winning streak of 15 games. For the Springbok, the streak was a turning point, having lost five games in a row. The All Blacks' last game was two weeks ago, when they won the trophy. The last game of the series will be in Johannesburg's Ellis Park next week, between the Springbok and Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Estazioak bere jarrerari eutsi zion espazio-ibilaldiaren amaiera arte, espazio-estazioaren misioaren hasieran giroskopio bat galdu arren. Chiao-k eta Sharipov-ek jakinarazi zuten jarrera egokitzeko propultsatzaileetatik distantzia segurura zeudela. Errusiako lurreko kontrolak motorrak aktibatu zituen eta estazioak ohiko jarrera berreskuratu zuen.
mt: The station maintained its attitude until the end of the spacewalk, despite losing a gyroscope early in the mission. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were at a safe distance from the thrusters. Russian ground control activated the motors and the station regained its normal attitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

mt: The station maintained its attitude until the end of the spacewalk, despite losing a gyroscope early in the mission. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were at a safe distance from the thrusters. Russian ground control activated the motors and the station regained its normal attitude.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Kasua Virginia-n prozesatu zen, hura delako AOL interneteko zerbitzuko hornitzaile nagusiaren egoitza eta enpresa hark bultzatu dituelako karguak. Erabiltzaileen postontzietan eskatu gabeko spam-a mugatzeko 2003an indarrean jarri zen legedia erabilita gauzatu den lehen zigorra da.
mt: The case was prosecuted in Virginia, where AOL's headquarters and the company that had been sued for spamming were located. The first criminal spamming conviction under the 2003 law that required unsolicited spam to be filtered was made.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: Vidal 28 urteko jokalaria duela hiru denboraldi hasi zen Barça-rekin jokatzen, Sevillatik joanda. Kataluniako hiriburura joan denetik, Vidal-ek 49 partida jokatu ditu klubarekin.
mt: 28-year-old midfielder Vidal started playing for Barça three seasons ago, coming from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 games for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Ez da tsunami-alertarik igorri, eta, Jakartako geofisika agentziaren arabera, ez da tsunami-alertarik igorriko, lurrikarak ez duelako alerta igortzeko beharrezkoa den 6,5 magnitudea izan. Tsunami-mehatxurik egon ez arren, biztanleak beldurtu egin ziren eta negozioetatik eta etxebizitzetatik alde egiten hasi ziren.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued, and according to the Jakarta Geophysics Agency, no tsunami warning will be issued, as the quake did not reach the 6.5 magnitude required to issue a warning.  Despite no tsunami threat, residents were alarmed and began leaving shops and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Aurkikuntzaren arabera, gainerako izarrek dituzten oinarrizko printzipioen arabera funtzionatzen du Eguzkiak ere: sistemako izar guztietan argitasunak eta haien errotazioak gidatzen du jarduera, beste ezerk ez. Argitasuna eta errotazioa batera erabiltzen dira izar baten Rosby zenbakia zehazteko, eta hori plasmaren fluxuarekin erlazionatuta dago. Zenbat eta txikiagoa izan Rossby zenbaki, orduan eta jarduera txikiagoa du izarrak inbertsio magnetikoei dagokienez.
mt: According to the discovery, the Sun also works according to the basic principles of the other stars: the activity of the system is guided by the brightness and rotation of the stars, as nothing else. Brightness and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, and this is related to the flux of plasma. The smaller the Rossby number, the less activity the star has in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 2010eko hauteskunde federalaren aurretik inkesta egin zuten 1.400 pertsonen artean; eta 2008az geroztik, ehuneko 8 igo da Australia errepublika bihurtzearen kontra daudenen kopurua. Julia Gilliard behin-behineko lehen ministroak 2010eko hauteskunde federalen kanpainan esan zuen Australia errepublika bihurtu beharko litzatekeela Elizabeth II.a erreginaren erreinaldiaren amaieran. Inkesta erantzun duten pertsonen ehuneko 34ak iritzi berdina du, eta Elizabeth II.a erregina Australiako azken monarka izatea nahi du. Inkestaren muturretan, erantzun zutenen ehuneko 29k uste dute Australia ahal bezain azkar bihurtu behar dela errepublika, eta ehuneko 31k, berriz, uste dute Australia ez dela inoiz errepublika bihurtu behar.
mt: 1,400 people were polled before the 2010 federal election; and since 2008, the percentage of those against Australia becoming a republic has risen by 8%. Julia Gillard, the interim Prime Minister, said during the 2010 federal election campaign that Australia should become a republic when Elizabeth II's reign ends. 34% of those polled agreed with this, and 29% of those polled thought that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31% thought that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Komen Fundazioko Leslie Aun bozeramaileak esan duenez, erakundeak arau berri bat jarri du abian, lege-ikerketa abian duten erakundeei bekak edo dirulaguntzak emateko aukera debekatzen duena. Komen-en gidalerro horrek Planned Parenthood deskalifikatu egin zuen, Planned Parenthood-ek dirua nola gastatzen duen eta horren berri nola ematen duen ikertzen ari delako Cliff Stearns ordezkaria. Planned Parenthood bidez abortuak ordaintzeko zergak erabiltzen ari ote diren argitzeko lanean ari da Stearns, Omisio eta Ikerketen Azpibatzordeko burua den aldetik (Gobernuko Energia eta Merkataritza Batzordearen barruan dago erakundea).
mt: Leslie Aun, spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization has put a new rule in place that prohibits it from giving grants or funding to organizations that are under investigation. The Komen Foundation has disqualified Planned Parenthood, as Planned Parenthood is being investigated by Cliff Stearns, the representative who is investigating how Planned Parenthood uses the money it receives and how it reports it. Stearns is the chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee (which is part of the House Committee on Energy and Commerce).
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: Madhya Pradesh-eko poliziak berreskuratu ditu lapurtutako ordenagailu eramangarria eta telefono mugikorra. D K Arya Ordezko Inspektore Nagusiak esan duenez, “Suitzako emakumea bortxatu zuten bost pertsona atxilotu ditugu eta haren ordenagailu eramangarria eta telefono mugikorra berreskuratu ditugu”. Hauek dira akusatuak: Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar eta Vishnu Kanjar. Chandra Shekhar Solanki polizia superintendenteak esan duenez, akusatuak aurpegia estalita agertu ziren epailearen aurrean.
mt: 5 people have been arrested for the rape of a Swiss woman and the recovery of her laptop and mobile phone. The accused are Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Chandra Shekhar Solanki, the police superintendent, said that the accused appeared before the judge with their faces covered.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: Mundu osoan lehenago merkaturatu zen ASUS Eee PC-a, kostuak aurrezteko eta funtzionalitate-faktoreengatik, eta denen ahotan egotera igaro zen Taipei-ko 2007ko IT Month delakoan. Baina ordenagailu eramangarriaren kontsumitzaile-merkatua guztiz aldatu zen 2007an Txinako Errepublikako Yuan exekutiboak ASUS-i Taiwan-eko jasangarritasunaren saria ematean.
mt: 2007's IT Month in Taipei, Taiwan, saw the ASUS Eee PC, the world's first mass-produced netbook, become the talk of the town for its low cost and high functionality. But the netbook market changed dramatically in 2007 when the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China awarded ASUS the Taiwan Excellence Award for sustainability.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Arazoa urtarrilaren 1ean hasi zen, tokiko bizilagun talde bat Obanazawa posta-bulegoaren aurka protestan hasi zenean, esanez ez zituztela Urte berriko ohiko posta-txartel tradizionalak jaso. Atzo, posta-bulegoak barkamena eskatu zien biztanleei eta komunikabideei, aurkitu baitzuten mutikoak 600 posta-dokumentu baino gehiago (Urte Berriko 429 posta-txartel barne) gorde zituela eta ez zitzaiela hartzaileei helarazi.
mt: The problem began on January 1, when a local residents group protested in front of the Obanazawa post office, saying they had not received the traditional New Year's postcards. Yesterday, the post office apologized to the residents and media, saying they had found a child had kept over 600 pieces of mail (including 429 New Year's postcards) and had not delivered them to the recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.
