src: Murray-k lehen set-a galdu zuen tie-break batean, bi gizonek set-eko zerbitzu guztiei eutsi ondoren. Del Porto-k abantaila azkar lortu zuen bigarren set-ean, baina tie-break egin behar izan zuten 6-6 egin ondoren. Une horretan, Potro-k tratamendua jaso zuen sorbaldan, baina jokora itzultzea lortu zuen.
mt: Murray lost the first set in a tie-break after both men held serve throughout. Del Potro quickly took the second set, but had to play a tie-break after both were tied at 6-6. At that point, Del Potro received treatment on his shoulder, but was able to return to the court.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: Ofizial horiek lagunduta, Texaseko biztanleei ziurtatu zien publikoaren segurtasuna babesteko urratsak eman direla. Zehazki, Perry-k hau esan zuen: “Munduan toki gutxi egongo dira erronka honi aurre egiteko hobeto prestatuta daudenak.” Gainera, gobernadoreak zera esan zuen: “Gaur jakin dugu eskola-adineko haur batzuek pazientearekin kontaktua izan dutela.” Hala jarraitu zuen: “Kasu hau larria da. Gure sistema behar bezain ondo ari da funtzionatzen, lasai egon horregatik.”
mt: Officials assured Texans that steps have been taken to protect public safety. Specifically, Perry said, "There will be few places in the world better prepared to deal with this challenge." In addition, the governor said, "We know today that some school-aged children have had contact with the patient." He continued, "This is serious. Our system is working as it should, so be calm for that reason."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: The Daily Show eta The Colbert Report telebista saioak sortu baino askoz lehenago, 1988an, Heck-ek eta Johnson-ek, UW-ko ikasle zirela, albiste-saioen (eta albisteen berri ematen zituztenen) parodia izango zen argitalpena asmatu zuten. Sortu zenetik, The Onion albiste-parodien egiazko inperio bihurtu da, honako hauek barne hartzen dituena: paperezko argitalpena, webgunea (urrian 5.000.000 bisita berri erakarri zituena), iragarki pertsonalak, 24 orduko berrien kanala, podcastak eta duela gutxi abian jarritako Our Dumb World munduko atlasa. Al Gore-k eta Tommy Franks jeneralak gogokoen dituzten tituluak aipatu dituzte (Gore-ren gogokoena: The Onion-ek esan zuenekoa bai hura, bai Tipper inoiz ez bezalako sexua izaten ari zirela, 2000. urtean izandako hauteslekuetako porrota dela eta). Haien idazle askok eragin handia izan dute Jon Stewart-en eta Stephen Colbert-en albisteen parodia-saioetan.
mt: 1988, Heck and Johnson, students at UW, invented a parody of news and news reporting. Since its inception, The Onion has become the real-life empire of news parodies, including: the print publication, the website (which attracted 5 million new visitors in October), personal ads, 24-hour news channel, podcasts, and the recently launched Our Dumb World world atlas. Al Gore and Tommy Franks have cited favorite headlines (Gore's favorite: The Onion's claim that he and Tipper were having sex more than ever, after his 2000 election loss). Many of their writers have gone on to work on Jon Stewart's and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: The Daily Show eta The Colbert Report telebista saioak sortu baino askoz lehenago, 1988an, Heck-ek eta Johnson-ek, UW-ko ikasle zirela, albiste-saioen (eta albisteen berri ematen zituztenen) parodia izango zen argitalpena asmatu zuten. Sortu zenetik, The Onion albiste-parodien egiazko inperio bihurtu da, honako hauek barne hartzen dituena: paperezko argitalpena, webgunea (urrian 5.000.000 bisita berri erakarri zituena), iragarki pertsonalak, 24 orduko berrien kanala, podcastak eta duela gutxi abian jarritako Our Dumb World munduko atlasa. Al Gore-k eta Tommy Franks jeneralak gogokoen dituzten tituluak aipatu dituzte (Gore-ren gogokoena: The Onion-ek esan zuenekoa bai hura, bai Tipper inoiz ez bezalako sexua izaten ari zirela, 2000. urtean izandako hauteslekuetako porrota dela eta). Haien idazle askok eragin handia izan dute Jon Stewart-en eta Stephen Colbert-en albisteen parodia-saioetan.

Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). src: Protesta 11:00 inguruan hasi zen (tokiko ordua, UTC+1) Whitehall-en, Lehen Ministroaren egoitza ofizialaren aurrean, Downing Street-eko sarrera poliziak zainduta zegoelarik. 11:00ak jo ondoren, manifestatzaileek trafikoa eten zuten Whitehall-en iparralderanzko bidean. 11:20an poliziak espaloira joateko eskatu zien manifestatzaileei, protesta egiteko eskubidea eta pilatzen ari zen trafikoa orekatu beharra zegoela argudiatuta. 11:29 inguruan, protesta Whitehall-etik gora joan zen, Trafalgar plaza igaro eta Strand-ean zehar. Manifestatzaileek Aldwych igaro zuten, eta Kingsway-tik gora egin, Holborn-erantz, alderdi kontserbadorea Udaberriko Foruma ospatzen ari baitzen Grand Connaught Rooms hotelean.
mt: 11:00 local time (UTC+1) a protest began in front of the official residence of the Prime Minister, Downing Street, which was guarded by police. After 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on Whitehall in the northbound lane. At 11:20, police asked protesters to disperse, citing the right to protest and the need to clear the congested traffic. At around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, passing Trafalgar Square and along Strand. Protesters passed Aldwych, and went up Kingsway, towards Holborn, as the Conservative Party was holding the Spring Forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: “Diabetiko izateari utzi dioten 4 hilabeteko saguak ditugu orain” gehitu zuen. Ehud Ur doktoreak ohartarazi du ikerketa hasierako fasean dagoela oraindik. Doktorea medikuntza-irakaslea da Halifax-eko (Eskozia Berria) Dalhousie Unibertsitatean eta Kanadako Diabetes Elkarteko atal kliniko eta zientifikoko zuzendaria da. Beste aditu batzuk bezala, eszeptikoa da diabetesa sendatzeko aukerari buruz, eta nabarmendu du aurkikuntza horiek ez dutela inolako garrantzirik dagoeneko 1 motako diabetesa duten pertsonentzat.
mt: 4-month-old guinea pigs that have stopped being diabetic are ours now” he added. Dr. Ehud Ur points out that the research is still in its early stages. Dr. Ur is a medical instructor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chair of the clinical and scientific section of the Canadian Diabetes Association. Like other experts, he is skeptical about the prospects for curing diabetes, and he has pointed out that these findings are not yet important for people with type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Twin Otter hegazkina Kokoda-n lurreratzen saiatu zen (PNG airelinearen CG4684 hegaldia zen), baina lehen saiakeran ez egitea erabaki zuen. Bigarren hurbilketan, lurreratzeko hamar minutu falta zirela, desagertu egin zen. Istripuaren gunea gaur aurkitu dute; hain da zaila hara heltzea, non bi polizia oihanean utzi behar izan baitituzte istripuaren tokiraino oinez joan eta norbait bizirik dagoen egiaztatzeko. Lurreratzea bertan behera utzi beharra eragin zuen eguraldi txarrak, baita bilaketa zaildu ere.
mt: A Twin Otter aircraft attempted to land at Kokoda (PNG airline's CG4684 flight), but decided not to on the first approach. On the second approach, ten minutes from landing, it disappeared. The crash site was found today; it is so difficult to get there that two police had to leave their car and walk to the crash site to check if anyone was alive. Bad weather caused the landing to be aborted, and also complicated the search.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: Zorionez, niri ez zait ezer gertatu baina egoera makabroa bizi izan dut, jendea irteteko asmoz leihoak apurtzen saiatu denean. Aulkiekin jotzen zituzten leihoak, baina beira hauskaitza da. “Azkenean, paneletako bat apurtu egin zen eta leihotik ateratzen hasi ziren” esan du bizirik atera den Francizek Kowal-ek.
mt: Fortunately, I was not hurt, but I have seen a horrible scene, when people tried to break the windows to get out. They were hitting the windows with a broom, but the glass was shatterproof. “Finally, one of the windows broke and they started to come out” said Francize Kowal, who survived.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Danielle ekaitz tropikala, 2010eko Atlantikoko urakan-denboraldian izendatutako laugarren ekaitza, sortu da Ozeano Atlantikoaren ekialdean. Miamitik (Florida) 3.000 milia ingurura kokatutako ekaitzak orduko 40 mph-ko (64 kph) abiadura maximoa duen haize jarraitua du. Urakanen Zentro Nazionaleko zientzialariek aurreikusi dutenez, Danielle indartu eta urakan bihurtuko da asteazkenean. Ekaitza lurra jotzetik urrun dagoenez, zaila da Estatu Batuetan edo Kariben inpakturik izango duen edo ez ebaluatzea.
mt: Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm is about 3,000 miles east of Miami, Florida, and has sustained winds of 40 mph. National Hurricane Center forecasters expect Danielle to strengthen into a hurricane on Monday. Because the storm is far from land, it is difficult to determine whether it will affect the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Lee doktoreak ardura azaldu zuen Turkia-n haurrak hegaztien A(H5N1) gripearen birusarekin infektatu direlako, gaixotu gabe. Esan duenez, ikerketa batzuek proposatzen dute gaitzaren hilgarritasuna gutxitu egin behar dela mundu osoan pandemia sortzeko. Arduratuta daude, gripearen sintomak arinak direnean eta pazienteek eguneroko bizitza egiten dutenean pertsona gehiago infektatzeko aukera egongo delako.
mt: Dr. Lee said that children in Turkey have been infected with the A(H5N1) bird flu virus without getting sick. He said that some studies have proposed that the lethality of the disease should be reduced worldwide to prevent a pandemic. They are concerned that the symptoms are mild and that patients can continue their daily lives, giving more people the opportunity to be infected.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Abuztuaren 9ko gauean, Morakot tifoiaren erdigunea Txinako Fujian probintziatik hirurogeita hamar kilometrora zegoen. Zenbatetsi denez, orduko hamaika km-ko abiaduran mugitzen ari da tifoia Txinarantz.
mt: 9 August, the eye of Typhoon Morakot was 120 km south of Fujian province in China. It was reported to be moving towards China at a speed of 11 km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: George W. Bush AEBetako presidentea azaroaren 16an iritsi zen Singapurrera, Asian zehar astebetez egingo zuen birari hasiera emanez. Wong Kan Seng Singapurreko Ordezko Lehen Ministroak egin zion harrera, eta merkataritzari eta terrorismo-gaiei buruz hitz egin zuen Lee Hsien Loong Singapurreko Lehen Ministroarekin. Legealdiaren erdiko hauteskundeetan astebetez galtzen joan ondoren, Bush-ek ikus-entzuleei azaldu zien Asian negozioak hedatzeko helburua zuela.
mt: 16 November 2006, George W. Bush, President of the United States, arrived in Singapore, to begin a week-long tour of Asia. Wong Kan Seng, Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister, greeted him, and discussed trade and terrorism with Lee Hsien Loong, Singapore's Prime Minister. After losing the mid-term elections, Bush told his audience that he was in Asia to promote trade.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Gaur egindako iragarpenean aipatu da, halaber, gobernuak bagoi gehigarriak erosteko aurtengo martxoan hartu duen konpromisoa. 300 bagoi gehiagorekin, guztira 1.300 bagoi erosiko dira gainkarga arintzeko.
mt: 300 additional containers were also mentioned in the announcement, bringing the total to 1,300 containers to be purchased to alleviate congestion.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Haren esanean, “ez dago berehalako erasoren bat gertatuko dela dioen informaziorik. Hala ere, mehatxu-maila latza izatera jaisteak ez du esan nahi mehatxua guztiz desagertu denik.”
mt: “There is no immediate indication of an imminent attack. However, the fact that the threat level is being raised does not mean that the threat has been completely eliminated.”
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Bederatzi kideko Behin-behineko Hauteskunde Batzorde (CEP) berriaren zina jaso zuen atzo Martelly-k. Martelly-k lau urtetan izan duen bosgarren CEPa da. Iragan hilabetean, presidentetzako batzorde batek gomendatu zuen lehendik zegoen CEPak dimititzea komeni zela, herrialdeak hauteskunde berri batzuk izatera bidean hartu beharreko neurrien artean. Urrian hasi ziren erregimenaren aurkako protesten hedapenari erantzuteko sortu zuen batzordea Martelly-k. Hainbat protesta sortu ziren, bortitzak zenbaitetan, 2011tik egin gabeko hauteskundeak antolatzeko ezintasunaren ondorioz.
mt: 9-member Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) signed by Martelly yesterday. Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month, a presidential commission recommended that the existing CEP resign, as the country was in need of new elections. Martelly created the CEP in response to the spread of protests against the regime in September. Several protests, some violent, were held, as a result of the inability to organize elections in four years.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: USA Gymnastics elkarteak bat egiten du Estatu Batuetako Batzorde Olinpikoaren gutunarekin, eta onartu du ezinbestekoa dela familia olinpikoak atleta guztientzako ingurumen segurua sustatzea. Ados gaude USOCen adierazpenarekin, zeinak esan baitu atleten, kluben eta haien kirolaren interesak hobeto babestuko direla gure antolamenduaren barruan aldaketa esanguratsuak eginda, ziurtapenak kenduta baino. USA Gymnastics ikerketa independente bat sustatzen ari da, Larry Nassar-en abusuak pairatu dituztenek ausardiaz azaldutako gertakari larriak hain luzaroan detektatu gabe nola egon diren argitzeko, eta beharrezkoak diren aldaketa egokiak abian jartzeko. USA Gymnastics eta USOC elkarteek helburu bera dute: gimnasia eta bestelako kirolak ahalik eta seguruenak izatea, atletek ahalduntzeko aukera izan eta ingurumen seguru eta positiboan bete ahal izan ditzaten beren ametsak.
mt: USA Gymnastics has agreed to the letter from the United States Olympic Committee, and agrees that it is imperative that the family of Olympic athletes ensure a safe environment for all athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes, clubs, and our sport will be better served by significant changes within our organization, without the guarantees. USA Gymnastics is conducting an independent investigation to determine how such serious allegations were not detected for so long, and to implement appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, to give athletes the opportunity to achieve their dreams in a safe and positive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: USA Gymnastics elkarteak bat egiten du Estatu Batuetako Batzorde Olinpikoaren gutunarekin, eta onartu du ezinbestekoa dela familia olinpikoak atleta guztientzako ingurumen segurua sustatzea. Ados gaude USOCen adierazpenarekin, zeinak esan baitu atleten, kluben eta haien kirolaren interesak hobeto babestuko direla gure antolamenduaren barruan aldaketa esanguratsuak eginda, ziurtapenak kenduta baino. USA Gymnastics ikerketa independente bat sustatzen ari da, Larry Nassar-en abusuak pairatu dituztenek ausardiaz azaldutako gertakari larriak hain luzaroan detektatu gabe nola egon diren argitzeko, eta beharrezkoak diren aldaketa egokiak abian jartzeko. USA Gymnastics eta USOC elkarteek helburu bera dute: gimnasia eta bestelako kirolak ahalik eta seguruenak izatea, atletek ahalduntzeko aukera izan eta ingurumen seguru eta positiboan bete ahal izan ditzaten beren ametsak.
mt: USA Gymnastics has agreed to the letter from the United States Olympic Committee, and agrees that it is imperative that the family of Olympic athletes ensure a safe environment for all athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes, clubs, and our sport will be better served by significant changes within our organization, without the guarantees. USA Gymnastics is conducting an independent investigation to determine how such serious allegations were not detected for so long, and to implement appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, to give athletes the opportunity to achieve their dreams in a safe and positive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: AEBko Marinak ere esan du gorabehera ikertzen ari dela. Halaber, adierazpen batean esan dutenez, “tripulazioa lanean ari da ontzia segurtasunez ateratzeko metodorik egokiena zehazteko”. Avenger klaseko minen kontrako ontzia da eta Puerto Princesa-ra (Palawan) zihoan. AEBko Marinako Zazpigarren flotakoa da eta Sasebo-ko basean dago (Nagasaki, Japonia).
mt: The US Navy is also investigating the incident. In a statement, “the crew is working to determine the best course of action to safely recover the ship.” It is an Avenger-class mine countermeasures ship and was headed to Puerto Princesa (Palawan). It is part of the Seventh Fleet and is based in Sasebo (Nagasaki, Japan).
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Igande arratsaldean, Donald Trump Estatu Batuetako Presidenteak prentsa-idazkariaren bidez bidalitako adierazpenean iragarri zuen AEBko tropek Siria utziko dutela. Recep Tayyip Erdoğan Turkiako presidentearekin telefonoz hitz egin ondoren egin zuen iragarpena Trump-ek. Turkiak bere gain hartuko luke harrapatutako ISIS-eko borrokalarien zaintza; haren esanean, Europako nazioek ez dituzte aberriratu nahi.
mt: On Sunday afternoon, Donald Trump, President of the United States, announced that U.S. troops would leave Syria, in a statement released through his press secretary. He made the announcement after speaking on the phone with Recep Tayyip Erdoğan, President of Turkey. Turkey would take custody of captured ISIS fighters; in his statement, he asked European nations not to repatriate them.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Koalizioaren eta Afganistan-en tropak eremu hartara joan dira gunea segurtatzeko, eta koalizioaren beste hegazkin bat bidali da laguntzera. Istripua lurralde menditsu batean garaiera handian gertatu zen, eta kontrakoen tiroen eraginez gertatu zela uste da. Eguraldi txarrak eta lur malkartsuak oztopatu egin dituzte istripuaren gunea bilatzeko ahaleginak.
mt: The coalition and Afghan forces have moved into the area to secure it, and another coalition aircraft has been dispatched to assist. The crash occurred in a mountainous area at high altitude, and it is believed to have been caused by enemy fire. Bad weather and rugged terrain have hampered efforts to reach the crash site.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Presa 1963an eraiki ondoren, ez ziren gertatu ibaian sedimentuak hedatzen zituzten sasoiko uholde gehiago. Sedimentu hori ezinbestekoa da area-barrak eta hondartzak sortzeko, zeinak basabizitzarako habitatak baitira. Horren ondorioz, bi arrain-espezie desagertu dira, eta beste bi desagertzeko arriskuan daude, “humpback chub” izenekoa barne. Uholdearen ondoren uraren maila metro gutxi batzuk igoko bada ere, agintariek uste dute ibaian beherago dauden area-barra higatuak leheneratzeko beste izango dela.
mt: 1963, when the dam was built, no major floods occurred that carried sediment downstream. That sediment is crucial for creating sandbars and beaches, which are habitats for fish. As a result, two fish species have gone extinct, and two others are at risk of extinction, including the humpback chub. Even if the water level drops a few meters after the flood, officials believe that the lower sandbars will be replenished.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: Nairobi-n (Kenya) dagoen Estatu Batuetako enbaxadak ohar bat igorri du esanez “Somaliako muturreko ekintzaileak” bonba suiziden bidezko erasoak prestatzen ari direla Kenyan eta Etiopian. AEBek esan dute jakinarazi gabeko iturri batengandik jaso dutela informazioa eta zehazki aipatu dute Etiopiako eta Kenyako “erreferentzia-puntu garrantzitsuak” suntsituko dituztela bonba suiziden bitartez.
mt: The U.S. Embassy in Nairobi (Kenya) issued a warning saying "Somali extremists" are preparing attacks using car bombs in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. said it received the information from an unknown source and specifically mentioned "important reference points" in Ethiopia and Kenya will be destroyed by car bombs.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: Sakis Kechagioglou eta George Nikolakopoulos Greziako abokatu famatuak Atenas-ko Korydallus kartzelan sartu dituzte azpikeria eta ustelkeria-karguen erruduntzat jo ostean. Horren ondorioz, Greziako lege-komunitatean eskandalu handia sortu da, argitara atera baitira aurreko urteetan epaileek, abokatuek, fiskalek eta ordezkari legalek egin dituzten legez kanpoko hainbat ekintzak. Duela aste batzuk, Makis Triantafylopoulos kazetariak Alpha TV-ko “Zoungla” saio famatuan informazioa plazaratu ostean, Petros Mantouvalos Parlamentuko kide eta abokatuak kargua utzi zuen, haren bulegoko kideek legez kanpoko azpikeria eta ustelkerian parte hartu zutelako. Are gehiago, Evangelos Kalousis goi mailako epailea ere kartzelatu egin zuten ustelkeria eta jarrera immoralaren errudun zela frogatzean.
mt: 2 Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos, were arrested in the Korydallos prison in Athens after being found guilty of corruption and bribery. This has caused a scandal in the Greek legal community, as it has been revealed that in previous years, judges, lawyers, prosecutors and legal representatives have been involved in various illegal activities. A few weeks ago, Makis Triantafylopoulos, a journalist, revealed information in the famous Alpha TV show “Zoungla”, and Petros Mantouvalos, a member of Parliament and lawyer, resigned from his position, as his office staff had been involved in illegal corruption and bribery. Furthermore, the high court judge Evangelos Kalousis was also arrested for being guilty of corruption and immoral behaviour.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa-k izan zuen sarrera-puntuazio altuena: 70 korrikaldi 41 pilotarekin, 11 lauko eta 2 seiko jota. Sachin Tendulkar eta Rahul Dravid ordena ertaineko bate-jotzaileek ere lan ona egin zuten, ehun puntuko kidetza eginda. Alabaina, kapitainaren wicket-a galdu ondoren, Indiak 36 puntu soilik lortu zituen, eta sarreren amaieran 7 wicket galdu zituzten.
mt: Robin Uthappa had the highest score: 70 runs off 41 balls, 11 fours and 2 sixes. Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid also did well, scoring 100 runs each. However, after losing the captain's wicket, India scored only 36 runs, and ended up losing 7 wickets.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Pasa den hilabetean Wikinews-ekin hitz egin zuenean, Komunen Ganberako Administratzaile Adam Cuerden-ek adierazi zuen frustrazioa sentitzen zuela ezabaketak direla eta. “[Wales-ek] gezurra esan zigun hasieratik. Lehendabizi, lege-arrazoiengatik ziharduelako itxurak egiten aritu zen. Bigarren, guri kasu egiten ari zelako itxurak egiten aritu zen, artea ezabatu zuen arte.” Komunitatearen haserrea dela eta, lizentzia irekiko milioika multimedia-eduki duen webgunean eduki sexualei buruzko gidalerroa idazten ari dira.
mt: When asked about the situation in an interview last month, Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed frustration with the deletions, saying, "We lied from the start. First, it was pretending to be a legal issue. Second, it was pretending to be a community issue, until it was art. Now it's sex." In response to the community's anger, a draft policy for dealing with sexually explicit content is being written on a wiki with millions of open-licensed multimedia files.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Guztiak ez zeuden emakumeen mailak sartzearen alde. Amir Khan-ek, zeinak 2004an zilarrezko domina olinpikoa irabazi baitzuen, esan zuenez, “Barren-barrenean uste dut emakumeek ez luketela borroka egin beharko. Hori da nire iritzia.” Aipatutakoak gorabehera, esan zuen Britainia Handiko lehiakideen alde egingo duela Londresen, 2012ko Olinpiar Jokoetan.
mt: All were against women's inclusion. Amir Khan, who won an Olympic silver medal in 2004, said, "I don't think women should be fighting. That's my opinion." Notwithstanding, he said he would support British competitors in London, 2012 Olympic Games.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz 13 urteko motor-lasterkaria hil egin da Indianapolis-eko Motor Speedway-en istripu bat izan ondoren. Berotzeko bira egiten ari zen bitartean, Lenz mototik erori eta lasterketako kide Xavier Zayat-ek jo zuen. Lasterketako medikuek artatu zuten berehala eta tokiko ospitalera eraman zuten, eta han hil zen beranduago. Zayat-ek ez zuen zauririk izan istripuaren ondorioz.
mt: 13-year-old motorcyclist Peter Lenz died after a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. He was struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat while making a pit stop. Medics rushed him to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Hegazkinez bidaiatzea beldurgarria suerta dakioke edozein adineko eta iraganeko jendeari, batez ere inoiz ez badute hegan egin edo gertaera traumatiko bat bizi izan badute. Hori ez da lotsatzeko arrazoia: jende askok dituen beldur pertsonalak edo nazkak ez dira bestelakoak. Hegazkinen funtzionamenduari eta hegaldian gertatzen denari buruz zer edo zer ulertzeak lagun diezaieke batzuei aurre egiten ezezaguna den edo kontroletik at dagoen zerbaitetan oinarritutako beldurrari.
mt: Fear of flying is common among people of all ages, especially those who have never flown or have experienced a traumatic event. This is not a reason to be ashamed: many people have personal fears or anxieties that are not based on the functioning of the aircraft or what happens during the flight.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Gaur egun, gutxitan egiten dira erreserbak hegazkin-konpainia batekin, hegaldien prezioak aurretik bilatu eta konparatu gabe. Batzuetan, hegaldi berak erabat desberdinak diren prezioak ditu batzailearen arabera; horregatik, merezi du bilaketa-emaitzak konparatzea eta hegazkin-konpainiaren gunea ere arakatzea erreserba egin baino lehen.
mt: Today, it is rare to make reservations with an airline without first searching and comparing prices for flights. Sometimes, the same flight has different prices depending on the agent; therefore, it is worth comparing the search results and also looking at the airline's website before making a reservation.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Aireko posta-enpresei ongi ordaintzen diete gauzak azkar bidaltzeagatik. Askotan, denbora oso garrantzitsua da negozioetako dokumentuen, salgaien edo premiazko konponketa baterako ordezko piezen kasuan. Ibilbide batzuetan, enpresa handiek beren hegazkinak dituzte, baina beste ibilbide batzuek eta enpresa txikiagoek arazoak zituzten kontu hauekin. Produktuak bidaltzen badituzte aire-garraio bidez, ibilbide batzuetan hainbat egun ematen dituzte produktuak deskargatzeko eta aduanak pasatzeko. Produktuak ekipaje fakturatu gisa bidaltzea zen prozesua bizkortzeko bide bakarra. Hala ere, hegazkin-konpainiek ez dute uzten ekipajerik bidaltzen bidaiaririk gabe, eta hau izan daiteke aprobetxa dezakezun aukera.
mt: The mail carriers are well paid for delivering things quickly. Often, time is very important in cases of business documents, sales, or urgent repairs. In some cases, large companies have their own planes, but other routes and smaller companies had problems with these issues. Shipping products by air transport, in some cases, they take several days to unload and pass through customs. Shipping products as freight was the only way to speed up the process. However, airlines do not allow freight without passengers, and this could be a loophole.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Ohiko bidaiari izateko hegazkin-konpainia tentuz aukeratu behar duzu aliantza batean. Nahiz eta pentsatu zentzuzkoa dela gehien erabiltzen duzun hegazkin-konpainiari batzea, kontuan izan eskainitako pribilegioak desberdinak direla askotan, eta posible dela ohiko bidaiarien puntu gehiago ematea aliantza bereko beste hegazkin-konpainia batean.
mt: When choosing an airline for regular travel, you should carefully consider an alliance. While it may seem logical to join the airline you use most often, keep in mind that the offered privileges are often different, and it is possible to earn more points on a regular basis with another airline in the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Edan alkoholdun edariak neurrian. Alkoholak desberdin eragiten digu eta garrantzitsua da zeure muga ezagutzea. Gehiegi edateak epe luzeko osasun arazoak sor ditzake, adibidez, gibeleko mina, baita itsutasuna eta heriotza bera ere. Arriskua handitu egiten da legez kanpo ekoitzitako alkoholaren kasuan. Legez kanpoko likoreek ezpurutasun arriskutsuak izan ditzakete, hala nola, metanola, zeinak itsutasuna edo heriotza eragin baitezakeen, baita dosi txikietan ere.
mt: Measure your drinks. Alcohol affects us differently and it is important to know your limits. Excessive drinking can lead to long-term health problems, such as liver cancer, as well as blindness and death. Risk is increased in the case of illegally produced alcohol. Illicit liquor may contain dangerous impurities, such as methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Ubideen barrutia (nederlanderaz: Grachtengordel) Amsterdameko Binnenstad inguratzen duen XVII. mendeko barruti famatua da. Barruti osoa Gizadiaren Ondare izendatu zuen UNESCOk, haren balio kultural eta historikoarengatik, eta bertako etxeen balioak herrialdeko altuenen artean daude.
mt: The Grachtengordel (English: Canal District) is a famous 17th-century neighbourhood in the inner city of Amsterdam. The entire district was designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its cultural and historical value, and the value of its houses is among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, Siem Reapetik 12 km hego-mendebaldera. Tontorreko tenplu hau IX. mendearen bukaeran eraiki zen, Yasovarman erregearen agintaldian. Tenpluaren giro ilunarengatik eta Tonle Sap lakuaren bistengatik merezi du mendira igotzea. Toki hau bisitatzea era egokian konbina daiteke lakuan txalupa batean ibiltzearekin. Tenpluan sartzeko Angkor pasea beharko duzunez, ez ahaztu pasaportea Tonle Sapera joaten zarenean.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of Yasovarman. The temple is worth climbing for its dark atmosphere and views of Tonle Sap lake. This site can be combined with a boat trip on the lake. You will need to pass through Angkor to enter the temple, so don't forget your passport when you go to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antartika da Lurreko tokirik hotzena, eta hego poloa inguratzen du. Bisita turistikoak garestiak dira, fisikoki sasoian egon beharra dago, eta udan egin behar dira (azaroa-otsaila bitartean); gainera, penintsula, uharteak eta Ross itsasoa soilik bisita daitezke gehienetan. Bi mila langile inguru bizi dira udan, batez ere eremu horietan biltzen diren berrogeita hamar bat basetan; neguan, ordea, gutxi batzuk geratzen dira. Barnealdeko Antartika goi-ordoki ospela da eta 2-3 km izotzez estalita dago. Tarteka, bisita espezializatuak egiten dira hegazkinez barnealdera, mendizaleentzat edota Polora iritsi nahi dutenentzat; bertan base handi bat dago eta.
mt: Antartica is the coldest place on Earth, and is surrounded by the South Pole.  Tourist visits are expensive, physically demanding, and must be made during the summer (November to February); furthermore, only the peninsula, islands, and Ross Sea can be visited most of the time.  About two thousand people live during the summer, mostly in the dozens of bases collecting data; in the winter, however, only a few remain.  The interior of Antartica is a high plateau and is covered in 2-3 km of ice.  Occasionally, specialized visits are made to the interior by plane, for mountaineers or those who wish to reach the Pole; there is a large base there.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Garai modernoaren aurreko behatokiak zaharkituta daude gaur egun, eta museo edo hezkuntzarako toki gisa erabiltzen dira. Antzinako garaietan argi-kutsadura arazo bat ez zenez, hirietan edo campusetan kokatu ohi zituzten, bertara iristea errazagoa zelako gaur egungo eraikitzen direnekin alderatuta. Ikerketarako teleskopio moderno gehienak baldintza atmosferiko egokiak dituzten urruneko eremuetan kokatutako instalazio erraldoiak dira.
mt: In the modern era, observatories are often obsolete and are used as museums or educational sites. In ancient times, when light pollution was not an issue, they were often located in or near cities or campuses, as they were easier to get to than the modern ones. Most modern telescopes are large installations in remote areas with suitable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Auckland bi porturen artean dagoenez, hondartza ugari daude; ospetsuenak hiru eremutan. Ipar kostaldeko hondartzak (North Harbour barrutian) Ozeano Barean daude; iparraldeko Long Bay-tik hegoaldeko Devonport-era bitarte hedatzen dira. Harea-hondartzak dira ia guztiak, igeri egiteko seguruak, eta pohutukawa zuhaitzen itzala dago gehienetan. Waitemata portuan, Auckland erdialdean, Tamaki Drive-ko hondartzak daude Mission Bay eta St Heliers luxu handiko auzoetan. Familiez bete ohi dira hondartza horiek, eta denda ugari egoten dira kostalde osoan. Segurua da bertan igeri egitea.
mt: Auckland is between two harbours, and there are many beaches; the most famous are in three areas. The northern beaches (North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean, from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are all sand beaches, safe for swimming, and usually have pohutukawa trees for shade. In the Waitemata harbour, in central Auckland, the beaches along Tamaki Drive are in the Mission Bay and St Heliers upmarket suburbs. They are usually full of families, and there are shops along the whole coast. It is safe to swim there.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Gogoratu funtsean hilerri erraldoi bat bisitatzen ari zarela, eta munduko biztanleriaren zati handi batentzat balio ikaragarria daukan eremu bat dela. Gizon eta emakume ugari bizirik daude oraindik, hemen pasatu zuten denboran biziraun zutenak, eta askoz jende gehiagoren pertsona maiteak hemen erail zituzten edo hil arte lan egin zuten, judu izan edo ez. Tratatu leku hau merezi duen duintasun, handitasun eta errespetuarekin. Ez egin holokaustoari ezta naziei buruzko txantxarik. Ez ezazu eremua itxuragabetu egituretan arrastoak edo marrazkiak eginez.
mt: Remember that you are in a vast cemetery, and that this place has great value for a large part of the world's population. Many people are still alive who survived the time they spent here, and many more people's loved ones were killed or died here, whether they were Jews or not. This place deserves the dignity, grandeur and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site with graffiti or drawings.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Hizkuntz laguntzaileak hizkuntza artifizialak edo eraikiak dira, horiek gabe komunikatzeko zailtasunak dituzten bi herriren arteko komunikazioa errazteko helburuarekin sortutakoak. Ez dira lingua francak; hizkuntza natural edo organiko hauek, nagusi bihurtzen dira arrazoi jakin batengatik eta beste hizkuntza batzuetako hiztunek komunikatzeko erabiltzen dituzte.
mt: Language aids are artificial or constructed languages, created with the purpose of facilitating communication between two peoples with communication difficulties. They are not lingua francas; these natural or organic languages become dominant for a certain reason and are used by speakers of other languages to communicate.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Neguan Baltiko Iparraldea zeharkatzen ari bazara, egiaztatu kabinaren kokalekua, izotza zeharkatzeak zarata ikaragarria sortzen baitu eragin handiena jasaten dutenentzat. San Petersburgoko gurutzaldiek hirian denbora igarotzeko aukera ere ematen dute. Gurutzaontziko bidaiariek ez dute bisarekin lotutako betekizunik (begiratu zehaztapenak).
mt: If you are crossing the Baltic Sea in winter, make sure to check the location of the cabin, as the noise from the ice can be deafening for those most affected. The bridges of St. Petersburg also offer a chance to spend time in the city. Passengers on the ferry do not have any restrictions on the use of binoculars (see details).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Neguan Baltiko Iparraldea zeharkatzen ari bazara, egiaztatu kabinaren kokalekua, izotza zeharkatzeak zarata ikaragarria sortzen baitu eragin handiena jasaten dutenentzat. San Petersburgoko gurutzaldiek hirian denbora igarotzeko aukera ere ematen dute. Gurutzaontziko bidaiariek ez dute bisarekin lotutako betekizunik (begiratu zehaztapenak).
mt: If you are crossing the Baltic Sea in winter, make sure to check the location of the cabin, as the noise from the ice can be deafening for those most affected. The bridges of St. Petersburg also offer a chance to spend time in the city. Passengers on the ferry do not have any restrictions on the use of binoculars (see details).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Bartzelonako hizkuntza ofizialak katalana eta gaztelania dira. Gutxi gorabehera, erdiak nahiago du katalanez hitz egin, gehienek ulertu egiten dute, eta ia guztiek dakite gaztelania. Hala ere, seinale gehienak katalanez idatzita daude, katalana baita legez ezarritako lehenengo hizkuntza ofiziala. Baina gaztelania ere asko erabiltzen da garraio publikoan eta beste zerbitzu batzuetan. Metroko ohiko iragarpenak katalanez egiten dira soilik, baina ezusteko etenaldiak sistema automatizatu batek esaten ditu hainbat hizkuntzatan, hala nola gaztelaniaz, ingelesez, frantsesez, arabieraz eta japonieraz.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half prefer to speak Catalan, most understand it, and almost all speak Spanish. However, most signs are written in Catalan, as Catalan is the first legally established official language. But Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other services. Metro announcements are made in Catalan only, but unexpected delays are announced in several languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Garatutako herrialdeetan, maila altuko lotarako tokia eta gosaria eskaintzea arte bihurtu da nolabait. Guztiaren gainetik, halako tokiak bi gauzaren inguruan lehiatzen dira: lotarako tokia eta gosaria. Ondorioz, halako toki onenetan, luxuzko oheak, agian eskuz egindako ohazalak edo antigoaleko oheak aurki daitezke. Gosarietan, eskualdeko sasoiko gozoak edo anfitrioiaren plater berezia sar daitezke. Lekuari dagokionez, antigoaleko altzairuak dituen eraikin historiko zahar bat izan behar du, ondo zaindutako lur eta igerilekuarekin.
mt: In developed countries, the provision of a place to stay and food has become something of a status symbol. In fact, such places compete on two things: a place to stay and food. As a result, the best such places may have luxurious beds, perhaps hand-made quilts or antique beds. In food, local seasonal delicacies or the host's special dish may be served. In terms of location, it should be an old building with antique metal, an old historic building, well maintained land and a swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Txinako Pekin hirian izango dira 2022ko Neguko Olinpiadak. Horrela, hura izango da bai udako bai neguko Olinpiadak antolatu dituen lehen hiria. Pekinek hasierako eta amaierako ospakizunak eta barneko izotz jokoak aurkeztuko ditu. Beste eski ekitaldi batzuk Taizincheng-eko eski eremuan egingo dira, Zhangjiakou-n, Pekindik 220 bat kilometrotara (140 milia).
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be held in Beijing, China. This will be the first city to host both summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be held at the Taizincheng ski area, Zhangjiakou, about 220 kilometers (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Hegazti-gripeak edo, formalago, hegaztien influenzak, hegaztiak zein ugaztunak infekta ditzake. Ehun kasu baino gutxiago azaldu dira gizakietan, baina haietako batzuk hilgarriak izan dira. Gehienak hegaztikiarekin lan egiten duten pertsonen artean gertatu dira, baina hegazti-behatzailek ere badute arriskua.
mt: Bird flu or, more formally, avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than 100 cases have been reported in humans, but some have been fatal. Most have occurred in people working with poultry, but bird watchers also have the risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Bikingoek bide nabigagarri errusiarrak erabiltzen zituzten Itsaso Beltzera eta Kaspiar itsasora iristeko. Bide horietako zati batzuk oraindik ere erabil daitezke. Begiratu ea baimen berezirik behar den, zeinak lortzeko zailak izan daitezkeen. Itsaso Zuriak eta Baltikoak osatzen duten ubideak Ozeano Artikoa eta Itsaso Baltikoa lotzen ditu, Onega aintzira, Ladoga aintzira eta San Petersburgo tarteko, erreketan eta aintziretan zehar oro har. Onega aintzira Volgarekin ere lotuta dagoenez, posible da oraindik Errusia zeharkatzea Kaspiar itsasotik.
mt: Cyclists used the navigable Russian waterways to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some parts of these waterways are still in use. Check if a special permit is required, which can be difficult to obtain. The waterways that make up the White Sea and the Baltic Sea connect the Arctic Ocean and the Baltic Sea, through the Onega Lake, Ladoga Lake and Saint Petersburg, mostly through rivers and lakes. Since Onega Lake is connected to the Volga, it is possible to cross Russia from the Caspian Sea.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Immigrazio-kontrola da hegazkin, ontzi edo beste ibilgailu batetik atera ondorengo lehen geldialdia. Tren mugakideetan ikuskapenak egiten dira trena martxan dagoen bitartean eta balio duen nortasun-agiri bat eduki behar duzu halako trenetara igotzean. Lotarako trenetan, gidariak pasaporteak jaso ditzake, lo egin bitartean bidaiariak ez eragozteko.
mt: Immigration control is the first stop after disembarking from a plane, ship or other vehicle.  Inspections are made on trains while in motion and you must have a valid identification document to board such trains.  On connecting trains, the conductor may collect passports, to prevent passengers from sleeping.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Singapur orokorrean toki izugarri segurua da, oso erraza da bertan mugitzea, eta ia edozer eros dezakezu hara iritsi ondoren. Baina “tropiko altuetan” kokatzen bazara, ekuatoretik gradu batzuk iparraldera, beroa (beti) eta eguzki gogorra (oskarbi dagoenean, gutxiagotan) jasan beharko duzu.
mt: Singapore is a very safe place, and it is easy to get around, and you can buy almost anything after you arrive. But if you are in the “tropics highlands”, a few degrees north of the equator, you will have to endure heat (always) and strong sun (when it is out, less often).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Alemaniako pastelak oso gozoak dira eta Bavarian aberatsak eta askotarikoak dira, eskualdearen hegoaldeko bizilagun Austriakoen antzerakoak. Frutadun pasteltxoak ohikoak dira eta sagarrak ipintzen dituzte pasteletan urte osoan zehar; udan, ordea, gereziak eta aranak erabiltzen dituzte. Alemaniako gozo askok almendrak, hurrak eta bestelako fruitu lehorrak izaten dituzte. Pastel ezagunak bereziki ongi eman ohi dute katilu bat kaferekin. Pastel txikiak baina oparoak nahi badituzu, probatu eskualdearen arabera Berliner, Pfannkuchen edo Krapfen izenekoak.
mt: German cakes are very sweet and rich, and in Bavaria they are abundant and varied, like their Austrian neighbors to the south. Fruit-filled cakes are common and they put apples in the cakes all year round; in the summer, however, they use cherries and plums. Many German cakes have almonds, currants and other dried fruits. Cakes are especially well served with a cup of coffee. If you want small but rich cakes, try the Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Modu merkean edo beharragatik, bizi-estiloa aldatzeagatik edo erronka bati aurre egiteagatik ikusi nahi baduzu mundua, badaude hori egiteko hainbat modu. Funtsean, bi kategoriatan banatzen dira: bidaiatu bitartean lan egitea edo zeure aurrezkiak mugatzea. Artikulu honek bigarren kategoriari buruz hitz egiten du. Ia ezer xahutze aldera erosotasuna, denbora eta aurreikusteko gaitasuna sakrifikatzeko prest dauden horientzat, ikusi aurrekontu txikieneko bidaiak. Gomendioak ziurtzat hartzen du bidaiariek ez dutela lapurtzen, ez direla inora baimenik gabe sartzen, ez dutela legez kanpoko merkatuan parte hartzen, ez direla eskean ibiltzen edo ez dutela euren mesederako jendea esplotatzen.
mt: If you want to see the world, but don't have the money, lifestyle, or foresight to sacrifice time and comfort, there are ways to see cheap trips. This article is for those willing to sacrifice comfort, time, and foresight for the sake of seeing the world. It assumes that travelers are not breaking the law, not entering illegally, not participating in illegal markets, not being exploited, or exploiting others.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Point Marion eta Fairmont arteko bidea da Buffalo-Pittsburgh errepideko gidatzeko zatirik zailena eta maiz oso isolatuta dauden urruneko tokietatik igaro behar da. Landako errepideetan ibiltzera ohituta ez bazaude, izan umorea: zati aldapatsuak, bide estuak eta kurba itxiak dira nagusi. Seinaleetako abiadura-mugak aurreko zatietakoak baino baxuagoak dira nabarmenki. 35-40 m/h izan ohi da, 56-64 km/h, eta oso garrantzitsua da horiek jarraitzea. Bitxiki, estaldura gehiago dago hor errepideko beste puntu batzuetan baino, adibidez, Pennsylvania Wilds-en.
mt: The road between Point Marion and Fairmont is the most difficult to navigate on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh highway and is often far from remote areas. If you are not used to driving on country roads, be warned: steep hills, narrow roads, and tight curves are the norm. Speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous sections. 35-40 mph is typical, 56-64 km/h, and it is important to stick to them.  Notably, there is more overhang on this section of the highway than in other parts, for example, in Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Hondoa lehor edo urez beteta duen arroila baten behealdera jaistea da arroila-jaitsiera. Arroila-jaitsieran igeriketa, eskalada eta jauziak konbinatzen dira, baina ez da trebakuntza handirik edo sasoi fisiko berezirik behar hasteko (adibidez eskaladarekin, urpekaritzarekin edo eskiarekin alderatuta).
mt: Caving is the sport of descending into a pit, either dry or filled with water. Caving combines elements of caving, climbing, and diving, but requires little training or special physical fitness (for example, compared to climbing, diving, or skiing).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Kotxean sartu eta bidaia luze bat egiteak xarma berezia dauka bere sinpletasunean. Ibilgailu handietan ez bezala, ohituta egongo zara seguruenik zeure autoa gidatzen eta jakingo dituzu bere mugak. Kanpin-denda bat eremu pribatuan edo edozein tamainako herri batean muntatzeak nahi gabeko arreta erakar dezake. Laburbilduz, zeure autoa erabiltzea modu bikaina da errepidez bidaia bat egiteko baina ez da izaten “kanpatzeko” modu bat. Autoan kanpatzea posible da furgoneta handi bat, kirol-ibilgailu utilitario bat, sedan bat edo familiar bat edukiz gero, eserlekuak beheratuta.
mt: There is a certain charm in driving a long trip in a car. Unlike larger vehicles, you will likely be familiar with your car and know its limits. Placing a roadside convenience store in a private area or in any size town can attract unwanted attention. In short, driving your car is a great way to take a road trip but it is not a "convenient" way to do so. Car camping is possible with a large van, a sport utility vehicle, a sedan, or a family car, with seats folded down.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Casablanca hiri modernoa arrantzale berbereek sortu zuten K.a. XX. mendean, eta feniziarrek, erromatarrek eta marindarrek erabili zuten Anfa izeneko portu estrategiko gisa. Portugaldarrek suntsitu egin zuten eta Casa Branca izenpeak berreraiki, baina 1755ean lurrikara baten ondoren abandonatu zuten. Marokoko sultanak hiria berreraiki zuen, Daru I-Badya gisa, eta merkataritza guneak ezarri zituzten merkatari espainiarrek Casablanca izena jarri zioten. Erosketak egiteko Maroko osoan interes gutxien daukan tokia da Casablanca. Medina zaharraren inguruan erraz aurkitzen dira izakin tradizional marokoarrak, hala nola taginak, zeramika, larruzko produktuak, nargileak eta mota guztietako tramankuluak, baina turistentzat da guztia.
mt: Casablanca, a modern city, was founded by Berber fishermen in the 20th century BC, and used by the Phoenicians, Romans and Merinids as a strategic port Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it as Casa Branca, but abandoned it after the 1755 earthquake. The Sultan of Morocco rebuilt the city as Daru I-Badya and established trading centers for Spanish merchants who gave it the name Casablanca. Casablanca is the least interesting place in all of Morocco to buy. Traditional Moroccan souvenirs can be easily found around the old medina, such as tagines, ceramics, leather products, nargiles and all kinds of trinkets, but for tourists everything is.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Iparraldera joaten bazara, erraz aurkituko duzu Sintra hiri erromantiko eta liluragarria; kanpotarren artean fama lortu zuen Lord Byronek haren handitasun zoragarria idatziz jaso ondoren. Scotturb 403 autobusa joaten da Sintrara, eta geldialdia egiten du Cabo da Rocan. Iparraldean ere bisita dezakezu Fatimako Andre Mariaren Santutegia (jainkotegia), Andre Mariaren agerraldiengatik mundu osoan famatua den tokia.
mt: If you are heading north, you will easily find the romantic and charming city of Sintra; it gained fame among foreigners after Lord Byron described its grandeur in writing. Scotturb 403 bus goes to Sintra, and stops at Cabo da Roca. You can also visit the Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fátima (shrine), famous worldwide for its apparitions of the Virgin Mary.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: 1994an, etnikoki armeniarra den Azerbaijango Nagorno-Karabakh eskualdea azeriarren aurka borrokatu zen. Armeniarren babesarekin, errepublika berri bat sortu zen. Hala ere, nazio errotu bakar batek ere ez du ofizialki onartzen (ezta Armeniak ere). Eskualdeari buruzko eztabaida diplomatikoek Armeniaren eta Azerbaijanen arteko harremana kaltetzen dute oraindik.
mt: 1994 saw the Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan, which is ethnically Armenian, fight against the Azeris. With Armenian support, a new republic was formed. However, no single nation has officially recognized it (not even Armenia). Diplomatic discussions about the region continue to affect the relationship between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Familientzako kalitate handiko aukera ugari edukitzea da Charlotteren (Ipar Carolina) ezaugarri onenetakoa. Beste toki batzuetako bizilagunek diote familientzako leku egokia dela hara bizitzera joateko arrazoi nagusia, eta bisitariei hiri atsegina iruditzen zaie haurrekin bisitatzeko. Azken 20 urteetan, haurrentzako egokiak diren aukerak izugarri hazi dira Charlotteko aldirietan. Oro har, Charlotteko familiek ez dituzte taxiak erabiltzen, nahiz eta egoera jakinetan erabilgarriak suerta daitezkeen. Gehiago ordaindu behar denez 2 bidaiari baino gehiago doazenean, aukera hori behar baino garestiago ateratzen da.
mt: One of the best features of living in Charlotte is the many opportunities for quality family time. Neighbors from other places say that is the main reason they moved to Charlotte to raise their children, and visitors find the city a pleasant place to visit with children. In the last 20 years, opportunities for children have greatly increased in the suburbs of Charlotte. In general, Charlotte families do not use taxis, although they can be useful in certain situations. Because it costs more to take more than two passengers, this option is more expensive than it needs to be.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Espainiarrak 16. mendean iritsi aurretik, Txile iparraldea Inken boterepean zegoen eta Araucania-ko biztanle indigenak (Mapucheak) Txile erdialde eta hegoaldean bizi ziren. Mapucheak ere izan ziren Amerikako azken talde indigena independenteetako bat. Izan ere, ez zituzten gaztelaniaz hitz egitera behartzen zituen arauak erabat bereganatu Txileren independentziaren ostera arte. Txilek independentzia 1810an adierazi arren (Napoleonen gudek Espainia funtzionatzen zuen gobernu zentralik gabe utzi ondoren urte batzuez), Espainiaren aurkako garaipena ez zen lortu 1818 arte.
mt: 16th century before the Spaniards arrived, the north of Chile was under the power of Inca and the indigenous people of Araucania (Mapuche) lived in central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent indigenous groups in the Americas. They did not fully adopt the rules that forced them to speak Spanish until after Chile's independence was declared in 1810 (during the Napoleonic Wars when Spain was without a central government for a few years), the victory over Spain was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre, bost lurraldeak esan nahi duena, Italiako Liguria eskualdeko itsasaldean dauden bost herri txikik osatzen dute: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza eta Monterosso. UNESCOren Gizadiaren Ondarearen zerrendan agertzen dira. Mendez mende, jendeak terrazak eraiki ditu paisaia zakar eta malkartsuan, itsasora ematen duten itsaslabarren puntetaraino. Xarmaren arrazoietako bat garapen korporatiboaren falta da. Bideek, trenek eta itsasontziek lotzen dituzte herriak, eta kanpotik ezin da autoz iritsi.
mt: The Cinque Terre, meaning "five lands", is a rugged section of coast on the Italian Riviera. It comprises five villages: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza, and Monterosso al Mare. The area is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Over the centuries, people have built terraces on the rugged, rocky cliffs of the area. One of the reasons for this is the lack of corporate development. The villages are connected by paths, trains, and boats, and cars cannot be driven there.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.
