src: Neguko istripuen arrazoi nagusia errepide, galtzada (espaloi) eta bereziki eskailera irristakorrak dira. Gutxienez, zola aproposak dituzten oinetakoak behar dituzu. Udako oinetakoekin oso erraza izaten da izotzean eta elurretan irristatzea eta neguko bota batzuk ere eskas geratzen dira. Ereduak sakonera nahikoa eduki behar du, 5 mm (1/5 oinatz) edo gehiago, eta materiala nahiko biguna izan behar da tenperatura hotzetan. Bota batzuek takoak dituzte eta osagarri takodunak dituzten ekipoak daude egoera irristakorretarako, oinetako eta bota gehienetarako egokiak direnak, takoian soilik edo takoian eta zolan jartzeko. Takoiek baxuak eta zabalak izan behar dute. Harea, legarra edo gatza (kaltzio kloruroa) bota ohi da errepideetan edo bideetan trakzioa hobetzeko.
mt: Winter accidents are most often caused by slippery roads, sidewalks (pavement) and especially slippery stairs. You need appropriate shoes with treads. It is very easy to slip on winter shoes and some winter boots are also too thin. The tread should be deep enough, at least 5 mm (1/5 inch) and the material should be soft enough at low temperatures. Some boots have treads and there are also treads for the equipment that is suitable for most shoes and boots, either in the tread or in the tread and the tread. The treads should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often used on roads or paths to improve traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Cook Uharteak uhartedi bat dira eta Zeelanda Berriarekin elkargo librea osatzen dute. Polinesian daude kokatuta, Hegoaldeko Ozeano Pazifikoaren erdian. 15 uharteko artxipielago bat da eta irlok 2,2 milioi kilometro karratutan daude banatuta ozeanoan. Hawaiiko ordu zona bera dute eta batzuetan “beheko Hawaii” deitzen zaie. Txikiagoak diren arren, Hawaiiko adineko bisitari batzuei euren irla estatu bihurtu aurreko egoera gogorarazten die, turistentzako hotel erraldoi eta bestelako garapenik ez zegoenean. Cook uharteek ez dute hiririk, baina 15 uhartez osatuta daude. Handienak Rarotonga eta Aitutaki dira.
mt: The Cook Islands are a group of islands in the South Pacific Ocean, and New Zealand in free association with it. The Cook Islands have become an important destination for tourism. The Cook Islands have a population of about 9,000 people. The islands were formed by volcanic activity; the northern group consists of sixteen high islands, while the southern group has eleven atolls. The Cook Islands have a land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). The Cook Islands' 15 islands have a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). Rarotonga, the group's most populous island, has an area of 90.7 square kilometres (35.0 sq mi) and a population of 9,500. The capital group, Penrhyn, lies 500 kilometres (310 mi) to the north of Rarotonga and has a population of 700. The southern group of islands consists of the uninhabited Atiu, Mauke, Mitiaro, and Takutea, and the inhabited Mangaia, Ngau, and Tongareva. The northern group of islands consists of the inhabited Aitutaki, Manihiki, Nassau, Pukapuka, and Rakahanga, and the uninhabited Palmerston. The Cook Islands' 15 islands have a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). Rarotonga, the group's most populous island, has an area of 90.7 square kilometres (35.0 sq mi) and a population of 9,500. The capital group, Penrhyn, lies 500 kilometres (310 mi) to the north of Rarotonga and has a population of 700. The southern group of islands consists of the uninhabited Atiu, Mauke, Mitiaro, and Takutea, and the inhabited Mangaia, Ngau, and Tongareva. The northern group of islands consists of the inhabited Aitutaki, Manihiki, Nassau, Pukapuka, and Rakahanga, and the uninhabited Palmerston. The Cook Islands' 15 islands have a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). Rarotonga, the group's most populous island, has an area of 90.7 square kilometres (35.0 sq mi) and a population of 9,500. The capital group, Penrhyn, lies
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Cook Uharteak uhartedi bat dira eta Zeelanda Berriarekin elkargo librea osatzen dute. Polinesian daude kokatuta, Hegoaldeko Ozeano Pazifikoaren erdian. 15 uharteko artxipielago bat da eta irlok 2,2 milioi kilometro karratutan daude banatuta ozeanoan. Hawaiiko ordu zona bera dute eta batzuetan “beheko Hawaii” deitzen zaie. Txikiagoak diren arren, Hawaiiko adineko bisitari batzuei euren irla estatu bihurtu aurreko egoera gogorarazten die, turistentzako hotel erraldoi eta bestelako garapenik ez zegoenean. Cook uharteek ez dute hiririk, baina 15 uhartez osatuta daude. Handienak Rarotonga eta Aitutaki dira.
mt: The Cook Islands are a group of islands in the South Pacific Ocean, and New Zealand in free association with it. The Cook Islands have become an important destination for tourism. The Cook Islands have a population of about 9,000 people. The islands were formed by volcanic activity; the northern group consists of sixteen high islands, while the southern group has eleven atolls. The Cook Islands have a land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). The Cook Islands' 15 islands have a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). Rarotonga, the group's most populous island, has an area of 90.7 square kilometres (35.0 sq mi) and a population of 9,500. The capital group, Penrhyn, lies 500 kilometres (310 mi) to the north of Rarotonga and has a population of 700. The southern group of islands consists of the uninhabited Atiu, Mauke, Mitiaro, and Takutea, and the inhabited Mangaia, Ngau, and Tongareva. The northern group of islands consists of the inhabited Aitutaki, Manihiki, Nassau, Pukapuka, and Rakahanga, and the uninhabited Palmerston. The Cook Islands' 15 islands have a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi). Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Baimenak aurrez erreserbatu behar dira. Sirena-n gaua pasatzeko baimena eduki behar duzu. Kanpatzeaz gain, Sirena da lotarako lekua eta otordu beroak eskaintzen dituen basozainen gune bakarra. La Leona, San Pedrillo eta Los Patos-ek kanpatzeko tokia eskaintzen dute, otordurik gabe. Parkera sartzeko baimenak lortu daitezke zuzenean Puerto Jiménez-ko basozainen gunean, baina ez dute onartzen kreditu txartelik. Parkeko zerbitzuak (MINAE) ez ditu ematen parkera sartzeko baimenak iritsiera-data baino hilabete bat baino lehenago. CafeNet El Sol-ek erreserbak egiteko zerbitzuak eskaintzen ditu 30 USD-tan, edo 10 USD-tan egun baterako txartelei dagokienez. Xehetasunak euren Corcovado orrian aurki ditzakezu.
mt: Reservations are required. You must have a reservation for the night. Sirena is the only place to eat and the only place to have a hot meal. La Leona, San Pedrillo and Los Patos have camping, but no food. You can get permits directly at the Puerto Jiménez ranger station, but they don't accept credit cards. The park service (MINAE) does not give out permits more than a month before your arrival date. CafeNet El Sol offers reservation services for 30 USD, or 10 USD per day for camping permits. Details can be found on their Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Trabesiako eskia: jarduera honi eski ibilaldiak egitea ere deitzen zaio. Erlazionatuta dago, baina ez zerikusirik eski alpinoaren estiloko mendizaletasunarekin, maldetan egiten delako eta eski eta bota sendoagoak behar direlako. Irudikatu eskiz egiteko ibilbideak oinez egitekoen antzera. Baldintza onetan, oinez egiten duzuna baino distantzia handiagoa ibiliko duzu, baina gutxi batzuek lortuko dute mendiko eskian ibiltzen diren abiadurara heltzea motxilarik gabe eta prestatutako bideetan.
mt: Skiing: an activity also known as downhill skiing. Related to, but not related to, alpine skiing, in that it is done on slopes and requires longer skis and poles. Represented as ski runs in the same way as hiking trails. In good conditions, you will go further than a hiker, but few will reach the speed of skiing downhill on prepared runs without poles or preparation.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Shock kulturalak baino lehenago jotzen du itzuleraren shockak (eztei-bidaia fasearen kutsu gutxiago dauka), gehiago irauten du eta larriagoa izan daiteke. Beste kultura batean erraz murgildu diren bidaiariei haien jatorrizko kulturara berriro ohitzea asko kostatzen zaie batzuetan. Atzerrian bizi ondoren etxera itzultzean, beste kultura batera egokitu zara eta etxeko kulturako ohitura batzuk galdu dituzu. Hasieran atzerrira joan zinenean, ziur jendeak pazientzia zeukala eta ulerkorra zela, jakinda beste herrialde batetik datorren pertsonak moldatu beharra duela. Baliteke jendeak ez aurreikustea etxera bueltatzen diren bidaiariek pazientzia eta elkar ulertzea ere behar dituztela.
mt: Cultural shock hits before reverse culture shock (the honeymoon phase of the trip has less of an effect), lasts longer and can be more severe. It can be very difficult for people who have easily adapted to another culture to re-adapt to their original culture. When you return home after living abroad, you have adapted to another culture and have lost some of your original culture's customs. When you first went abroad, you were sure that people would be patient and understanding that people coming from another country would have to adapt. It is possible that people don't realize that people returning from a trip need patience and understanding as well.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Altzeak ez dira arriskutsuak izatez, baina euren burua defendatuko dute arriskurik sumatzen badute. Jendeak altzeak arriskutsu gisa ikusten ez dituenean, gehiegi gertura daitezke eta euren burua arriskuan jartzen dute.
mt: Ants are not inherently dangerous, but they will defend themselves if they feel threatened. People who do not see ants as dangerous can be too close and put themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Altzeak ez dira arriskutsuak izatez, baina euren burua defendatuko dute arriskurik sumatzen badute. Jendeak altzeak arriskutsu gisa ikusten ez dituenean, gehiegi gertura daitezke eta euren burua arriskuan jartzen dute.
mt: Ants are not inherently dangerous, but they will defend themselves if they feel threatened. People who do not see ants as dangerous can be too close and put themselves in danger.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Eguneko beroaren eraginpean, bidaiariek ilusioak izan ditzakete, ura (edo beste zerbait) dagoen irudipena ematen dutenak. Arriskutsuak izan daitezke bidaiariak ilusioa jarraitzen baldin badu eta indar preziatua eta geratzen den ura alferrik galtzen baditu. Basamortu beroenak ere ikaragarri hotzak izan daitezke gauez. Hipotermia arrisku itzela da arropa berorik eduki ezean.
mt: 1. In the heat of the day, travelers may experience mirages, which appear as water (or something else). They can be dangerous if the mirage is followed and the traveler loses precious water and cooling power. 2. Deserts can be surprisingly cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk if no clothing is worn.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Dominikar Errepublika (Gaztelaniaz: República Dominicana) Karibeko herrialdea da, Hispaniola uhartearen ekialdeko erdia hartzen duena, eta, beste erdia, Haitik hartzen du. Harea zuriko hondartzez eta paisaia menditsuez gain, Ameriketako hiri europar zaharrena dago bertan, orain Santo Domingoko parte dena. Taínoak eta karibetarrak bizi ziren hasieran uhartean. Karibetarrek arawakera mintzatzen zuten, eta K.a. 10.000. urte inguruan iritsi ziren. Esploratzaile europarrak iritsi eta urte gutxi batzuetara, Taínoko biztanleria izugarri murriztu zuten konkistatzaile espainiarrek. Fray Bartolomé de las Casasen arabera (Indietako Tratatua), 1492 eta 1498 urteen artean 100.000 taíno inguru erail zituzten konkistatzaile espainiarrek.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a nation on the Caribbean island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. Besides its beaches, it is known for its misnamed oldest European city, now Santo Domingo. The Taíno and Carib people lived there first. The Caribs spoke the Arawakan language, and arrived around 10,000 BC. European explorers arrived and soon greatly reduced the Taíno population with Spanish conquistadors. According to Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Treatise on the Indies), 100,000 Taíno were killed by Spanish conquistadors between 1492 and 1498.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: Aldapan beherako elurretako kirolek, eskia eta snowboard-a barne, kirol ezagunak dira eta elurrez estalitako aldapetan behera irristatzean datza, eskiak edo snowboard-eko taula oinei erantsita duzula. Eskia zale askoko jarduera bat da, bidaiatzea ere barne hartzen duena. Zale horiei “eski bidaiari” deitu ohi zaie, euren oporraldiak leku jakin batean eskiatzearen inguruan antolatzen baitituzte. Eskiatzearen ideia oso zaharra da. Kobetan eskiatzaileen irudiak aurki daitezke, K.a. 5.000. urtekoak! Maldan beherako eskia 17. mendean sortu zen gutxienez, eta 1861an aisialdiko lehen eski elkartea sortu zuten norvegiarrek Australian.
mt: Downhill sports, including skiing and snowboarding, are well known and are sports in which one slides down a snow-covered slope on skis or a snowboard. Skiing is a popular activity, including travel. These enthusiasts are often called "ski tourists", as they organize their vacations around skiing in a particular place. The idea of skiing is very old. Images of skiers can be found in 5,000 BC! Downhill skiing was invented at least in the 17th century, and in 1861 the first ski club was founded by Norwegians in Australia.
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Ekialdeko Afrikako uharteak Indiako ozeanoan daude, Afrikaren ekialdeko kostaldean. Madagascar da handiena, alde handiarekin, eta faunari dagokionez kontinente berezia da. Uharte txiki gehienak nazio independenteak dira edo Frantziarekin erlazionatuta daude, eta luxuzko oporleku gisa dira ezagunak. Arabiarrek ere Islama ekarri zuten lurraldera, eta eremu handia hartu zuten Komoreetan eta Mayotten. Europar eragina eta kolonialismoa XV. mendean hasi zen, Vasco da Gama esploratzaile portugaldarrak Lurmuturraren ibilbidea aurkitu zuenean Europatik Indiara joateko.
mt: The islands of East Africa are in the Indian Ocean, off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and is unique in its fauna, being a continent in its own right. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations or are associated with France, and are known as luxury resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the region, and took a large part of the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Vasco da Gama, the Portuguese explorer, found the sea route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Ekialdeko Afrikako uharteak Indiako ozeanoan daude, Afrikaren ekialdeko kostaldean. Madagascar da handiena, alde handiarekin, eta faunari dagokionez kontinente berezia da. Uharte txiki gehienak nazio independenteak dira edo Frantziarekin erlazionatuta daude, eta luxuzko oporleku gisa dira ezagunak. Arabiarrek ere Islama ekarri zuten lurraldera, eta eremu handia hartu zuten Komoreetan eta Mayotten. Europar eragina eta kolonialismoa XV. mendean hasi zen, Vasco da Gama esploratzaile portugaldarrak Lurmuturraren ibilbidea aurkitu zuenean Europatik Indiara joateko.
mt: The islands of East Africa are in the Indian Ocean, off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and is unique in its fauna, being a continent in its own right. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations or are associated with France, and are known as luxury resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the region, and took a large part of the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, when Vasco da Gama, the Portuguese explorer, found the sea route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Tradizioetako bat Pazko gaua esna pasatzean datza, aire zabalean, egunsentia ikusteko. Azalpen kristau teologikoak daude tradizio horretarako, jakina, baina udaberri eta ugalkortasun erritua ere izan zitekeen kristautasuna baino lehenagoko garaian. Eliza tradizionalagoek Pazko gaubeila egiten dute Pazko asteburuko larunbat gauean, eta gauerdian eliztarrek festa hasi ohi dute Kristoren pizkundea ospatzeko.
mt: One tradition is to stay up all night on Christmas Eve, looking for the sunrise. There are Christian theological explanations for this tradition, of course, but it may also have been an ancient fertility ritual predating Christianity. More traditional churches hold a vigil on Christmas Eve, and Christians often stay up all night to celebrate the coming of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Nazioarteko aireportuen edo mugetako sarreren bidez Ekuadorrera sartu baino lehen gonbidapen bat jasotzeko eskatzen die Ekuadorrek Kubako biztanleei. Gutuna Ekuadorreko Atzerri Arazoetako Ministerioak egiaztatu behar du, eta baldintza batzuk bete behar ditu. Bi herrialdeen arteko migrazio fluxuak antolatzeko diseinatuta daude baldintza horiek. AEBetako erresidentzia-baimena duten kubatar biztanleek ekuadortar kontsuletxe batera joan behar dute baldintza horren salbuespena lortzeko. Pasaporteak baliozkoa izan behar du bidaiaren data eta ondorengo 6 hilabeteetan. Joan-etorriko txartelak behar dira, egonaldiaren iraupena frogatzeko.
mt: Before entering Ecuador through international airports or border crossings, Cubans are required to obtain an invitation from Ecuador. The letter must be verified by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and certain conditions must be met. These conditions are designed to regulate migration flows between the two countries. Cubans with U.S. residency permits must go to an Ecuadorian consulate to obtain an exemption to this condition. Passports must be valid for the date of travel and the following six months. Round-trip tickets are required to prove the duration of stay.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Betaurrekoak merkeagoak izan daitezke atzerrian, batez ere baliabide gutxiko herrialdeetan, eskulana merkeagoa baita. Bizi zaren tokian begiak aztertzea gomendatzen dizugu, batez ere, aseguruak ordaintzen badu, eta preskripzioa zurekin eramatea beste nonbait artxibatzeko. Halako tokietan erabilgarri dauden gama altuko marken armazoiak bi arazo eduki ditzakete: batzuk faltsuak izan daitezke eta egiaz inportatutakoak garestiagoak izan daitezke etxean baino.
mt: Eyeglasses can be cheaper abroad, especially in low-income countries, where the frames are cheaper. We recommend that you have your eyes checked where you live, especially if you have insurance, and bring your prescription with you. Such countries may have high-end brands available that have two problems: some may be fake and some may be more expensive than at home.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Falkland Uharteetako dirua Falklandeko libera (FKP) da, eta bere balioa britainiar liberaren (GBP) parekoa da. Dirua uharteko banku bakarrean soilik alda daiteke, Stanley-n. FIC West dendatik aurrera joanda dago. Britainiar libera edonon onartu ohi dute eta Stanley-n kreditu-txartelak eta Estatu Batuetako dolarrak ere onartzen dituzte. Inguruko uharteetan baliteke kreditu-txartelak ez onartzea, baina Britania Handiko eta Estatu Batuetako dirua bai. Galdetu jabeei aurretiaz ea ordainketa-metodo hori erabil dezakezun. Ia ezinezkoa da Falkland uharteetako dirua uharteetatik kanpo aldatzea; beraz, aldatu dirua uharteetatik irten baino lehen.
mt: The currency of the Falkland Islands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is equal in value to the British pound (GBP). The currency is only changed at the one bank in Stanley, FIC West. British pounds are accepted everywhere and credit cards and US dollars are accepted in Stanley. Credit cards may not be accepted on nearby islands, but British and US currency is. Ask the merchant if they accept that method of payment. It is almost impossible to change Falkland Islands currency outside the islands; therefore, change your money before leaving the islands.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Tenplu gehienetan urteroko jaialdi bat egiten da, azaroa amaieratik maiatza erdialdera arte, tenplu bakoitzaren urteko egutegiaren arabera. Tenpluetako jaialdien zatirik handiena tenpluaren buru den jainkoaren urteurrenaren edo tenpluarekin lotutako beste gertaera garrantzitsu baten zati gisa ospatzen da. Kerala tenpluko jaialdiak oso interesgarriak dira ikusteko; besteak beste, apaindutako elefanteen prozesioak, tenpluko orkestra eta bestelako jaialdiak egoten dira.
mt: Most temples have a festival held once a year, from November to May, according to the temple's annual calendar. Most temple festivals are held in honor of the temple's main deity's birthday or some other important event associated with the temple. Kerala temple festivals are very interesting to watch; among other things, decorated elephant processions, temple orchestra and other festivals are held.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Zalantzarik gabe, business edo lehen mailan bidaiatzeko modurik argiena da diru pila bat ordaintzea (edo, are hobeto, zure enpresak zenbatekoa ordaintzea) pribilegio hori izateko. Hala ere, aukera hori ez da merke ateratzen: normalean, business motako hegaldi bat tarifa ekonomikoa baino lau bider garestiagoa da eta, lehen mailaren kasuan, hamaika bider garestiagoa da! Orokorrean, ez du zentzurik business edo lehen mailako eserlekuetarako deskontuak bilatzea helmuga batetik bestera doazen hegaldi zuzenetan. Hegazkin-konpainiek ondo baino hobeto dakite bidaiari taldexka bat dagoela prezio altuak ordaintzeko prest edonora modu azkar eta erosoan joan ahal izateko, eta pribilegio horren arabera kobratzen dute.
mt: Without a doubt, the cheapest way to travel business or first class is to pay a pile of money (or, better yet, what your company is willing to pay) for the privilege. However, this option is not cheap: business class flights are usually four times more expensive than economy class, and first class flights are usually eleven times more expensive! In general, it doesn't make sense to look for discounts for business or first class seats on direct flights between two destinations. Airlines know that a group of travelers is willing to pay high prices to travel quickly and comfortably anywhere, and they charge accordingly.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways eta Turkish Airlines hegazkin-konpainiek ikaragarri zabaldu dituzte haien zerbitzuak Afrikara, eta Afrikako hiri nagusi askotara joateko konexioak eskaintzen dituzte beste hegazkin-konpainia europarrek baino prezio lehiakorragoen truke. 2014tik aurrera, Turkish Airlines-ek 39 helmugara joateko hegaldiak ditu Afrikako 30 herrialdetan. Bidaiatzeko denbora gehiago baduzu, begiratu zer alde dagoen Afrikara joateko zure tarifa osoaren eta munduan zeharreko bidaiaren artean. Ez ahaztu gastu osagarriak gehitzeaz Afrikatik kanpoko toki guzti horietarako; besteak beste, bisa gehigarriak, irteera zergak eta lurreko garraiobideak.
mt: 2014, Turkish Airlines will fly to 39 destinations in 30 African countries. If you have more time, check what is the difference between your whole tariff to Africa and your trip around the world. Don't forget to add extra costs for all those places outside Africa; for example, extra fees, departure taxes and ground transportation.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Supermerkatuetan janaria erostea izan ohi da elikatzeko modurik merkeena. Ezer kozinatzeko aukerarik ez baduzu, aurrez prestatutako janarira soilik mugatzen dira eskainitako aukerak. Gero eta supermerkatu gehiagotan, aurrez prestatutako elikagaien saila asko zabaldu da. Batzuek mikrouhin-labeak edo janaria berotzeko gailuak izaten dituzte ere. Herrialde edo denda mota batzuetan, supermerkatuan kokatutako jatetxeren bat ere egoten da eta normalean informala eta merkea da.
mt: 1. Supermarkets are the cheapest way to buy food. If you don't have a choice of what to cook, you are limited to the choices offered. More and more supermarkets, the prepared food section has expanded. Some have microwave ovens or heating devices. In some countries or stores, there is a restaurant in the supermarket and it is usually informal and cheap.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Belgikan eta Suitzan mintzatzen diren frantsesaren barietateak desberdinak dira Frantzian mintzatzen den frantsesarekiko, nahiz eta elkarren artean ulertzeko nahiko berdinak izan. Bereziki, Belgikako eta Suitzako zonalde frantses hiztunetako zenbaki-sistemak berezitasun txiki batzuk ditu Frantzian mintzatzen den frantsesarekin alderatuta, eta hitz batzuen ahoskera pixka bat desberdina da. Hala eta guztiz ere, frantsesa mintzatzen duten belgikar eta suitzar guztiek frantses estandarra ikasi zutenez eskolan, ulertu egingo dizute nahiz eta frantses estandarraren zenbaki-sistema erabili.
mt: The French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland is different from the French spoken in France, though they are mutually intelligible.  Especially, the Belgian and Swiss French-speaking regions' number systems have slight differences compared to the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different.  However, all Belgians and Swiss who speak French have learned standard French in school, so you will be understood even if you use the standard French number system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Hegazkin-konpainia gutxi batzuek heriotza-salneurria eskaintzen dute oraindik, zeinak deskontu txiki bat suposatzen duen hileta batera joateko azken uneko bidaia bat erostean. Hauek dira halakoak eskaintzen dituzten hegazkin-konpainiak: Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa AEBetatik edo Kanadatik abiatzen diren hegaldietarako, eta WestJet. Kasu guztietan, hegazkin-konpainiarekin zuzenean eta telefonoz egin behar da erreserba.
mt: Some airlines offer a death discount, which is a small discount on a last minute funeral trip. These are the airlines that offer such a discount: Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights departing from the US or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, reservations must be made directly with the airline and by phone.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Zure herrialdetik kanpo zaudenean, telefono adimendunetan GPS nabigaziorako aplikazioak erabiltzea izan daiteke atzerritik mugitzeko modurik erraz eta erosoena. Dirua aurrez dezakezu, ez duzulako GPS baterako mapa berriak edo GPS gailu independente bat erosi behar edo ibilgailu-alokairu batean gailu bat alokatu behar. Hala ere, telefonoan datu-konexiorik ez baduzu edo estalduratik kanpo badago, zerbitzua mugatuta edo ez erabilgarri egon daiteke.
mt: When you're out of town, GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be one of the easiest and most relaxing ways to get around. You can save money by not having to buy new maps for GPS units or buy an independent GPS unit or rent one in a car rental. However, if you don't have data or are outside of coverage, the service may be limited or unavailable.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Galapagoetako lekuak eta fauna hobeto ikusten dira itsasontziz, Charles Darwinek 1835ean egin zuen bezala. 60 gurutzaontzi baino gehiagok betetzen dituzte Galapagoetako urak; 8 eta 100 bidaiari bitarte ditu bakoitzak. Gehienek aldez aurretik egiten dituzte erreserbak (goi-denboraldian beteta egoten dira eta ontziak). Ziurtatu erreserba egiten laguntzen dizun agentea Galapagos uhartean aditu izatea, eta ontzi desberdinei buruz jakitea. Horri esker, gehien interesatzen edo mugatzen zaituena kontuan hartuko da ontzia hautatzerakoan.
mt: 60+ cruise ships sail the Galapagos waters, each carrying between 8 and 100 passengers. Most make reservations (they are full in high season and the ships are booked). Make sure to book through an agent who is knowledgeable about Galapagos and about different ships. This way, you can be sure that the ship you choose is the one you are most interested in or limited to.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kasinoek ahalegin handia egiten dute gonbidatuek ahalik eta denbora eta diru gehien xahu dezaten. Ez da leiho edo erlojurik egon ohi, eta irteerak ez dira erraz aurkitzen. Janari, edari eta denbora-pasako eskaintza bereziak izan ohi dituzte gonbidatuak umore onez mantentzeko eta bertan geratzeko. Leku batzuetan edari alkoholdunak etxearen kontura eskaintzen dituzte. Hala ere, mozkorkeria eta zentzutasuna ez doaz batera, eta apustulari onenek badakite zein garrantzitsua den mozkortu gabe egotea.
mt: Casinos go to great lengths to keep guests there as long and spend as much money as possible. There are no clocks or windows, and exits are not easy to find. They often have special food, drink, and entertainment offerings to keep guests in a good mood and keep them there. In some places, they offer alcoholic drinks at the house's expense. However, sobriety and sobriety do not go together, and savvy gamblers know how important it is to stay sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Izen guztiak, baita zu esateko Sie hitza ere, letra larriz hasten dira beti, nahiz eta esaldi baten erdian egon. Aditz eta objektu batzuen arteko aldea hautemateko modu garrantzitsua da. Esan daiteke irakurtzea errazten duela, baina idaztea zail samarra da, forma sustantibizatuetan aditza edo adjektiboa erabiltzen ari den jakin behar delako.
mt: All words, including the word "you", begin with a capital letter. It is an important way to distinguish between nouns and adjectives. It has been said to make reading easier, but writing is difficult, because you have to know whether you are using an adjective or an adverb.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: Munduko toki askotan, eskuaz agurtzea keinu adiskidetsua da, “kaixo” adierazteko erabiltzen dena. Malaysian, ordea, landa eremuko malaysiarren artean behintzat, “etor zaitez” esan nahi du, hatz erakuslea gorputzerantz tolestearen antzera, Mendebaldeko herrialde batzuetan erabiltzen den keinua, eta horixe adierazteko soilik erabili behar da. Era bertsuan, Espainian dagoen bidaiari britainiar batek agur esateko keinua, esku-haurra keinua egiten ari denari begira (eta ez agur esaten ari zaion pertsonari), gaizki uler lezake eta bueltatzeko keinua dela uste izan.
mt: In many places around the world, a wave is a friendly gesture, used to say "hello". In Malaysia, however, at least among rural Malays, it means "come here", as in the Western gesture of beckoning, and should only be used to say "come here". Similarly, in Spain, a British traveler waving goodbye to another person could be misunderstood as a beckoning gesture, and thought to be saying "come here".
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Glaziarrak ez dira finkoak, mendian behera higitzen dira. Horren ondorioz, zirrikituak eta pitzadurak sortzen dira, eta baliteke elur-zubiek estaltzea. Gerta liteke elurtegietako hormak eta sabaiak behera etortzea eta zirrikituak ixtea. Glaziarren ertzetan, bloke handiak askatu, erori, eta agian jauzi edo bira egiten dute eta ertzetik aldentzen dira.
mt: Glaciers are not static, they move down the mountain. As a result, crevasses and pits are formed, and it is possible that snow bridges are covered. It is possible that the walls and ceilings of snow caves and tunnels are collapsing and crevasses are being closed. Large blocks are released, falling, and possibly jumping or rolling away from the edge.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma hiri turistikoa da; Kongoko Errepublika Demokratikoko ekialdeko muturrean dago, Ruanda ondoan. 2002an, Nyiragongo sumendiak Goma suntsitu zuen, labak hiriko kaleak estali zituenean, bereziki erdigunea. Goma nahikoa segurua den arren, Gomatik kanpoko bisitaldi guztiak aztertu behar dira Iparraldeko Kivuko probintzian jarraitzen duen borrokaren egoera zein den jakiteko. Halaber, Nyiragongo sumendira igotzeko abiapuntua da hiria, baita Afrikan mendiko gorilak ikusteko ibilbide merkeenena ere. Boda-boda bat (motozikleta-taxia) erabil dezakezu Goma inguruan ibiltzeko. Ohiko prezioa (bertakoa) 500 franko kongoar ingurukoa da bidaia labur baten truke.
mt: Goma is a tourist town; it is in the eastern part of the Democratic Republic of the Congo, near Rwanda. In 2002, the Nyiragongo volcano destroyed Goma, covering its streets with lava, especially the center. Goma is relatively safe, but all visits from outside Goma are checked to determine the situation in the ongoing conflict in the northern Kivu province. It is also the starting point for climbing the Nyiragongo volcano, and the cheapest way to see gorillas in the mountains of Africa. You can use a boda-boda (motorcycle-taxi) to travel around Goma. The usual price (local) is about 500 Congolese francs for a short trip.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: Kanpaldi libreak egiteko baimena eduki behar du Arroila Handiaren bazterraren azpitik muntatutako edozein kanpalekuk. Arroila babesteko, baimenak mugatuta daude, eta hilaren lehenengo egunean jartzen dira eskuragarri, hasierako hilabetea baino lau hilabete lehenago. Hortaz, maiatzean hasten den edozein zeharbide-baimen urtarrilaren 1ean egongo da eskuragarri. Toki ospetsuenak, hala nola Phantom Ranch ondoko Bright Angel kanpalekua, erreserbak egiteko lehen egunean bete ohi dira. Erreserbarik gabeko eskaeretarako baimen kopuru mugatu bat ere badago, eta iritsiera ordenaren arabera ematen dira.
mt: Permits are required for any overnight camp in the Grand Canyon, whether in a developed or undeveloped site. Permits are limited and are available starting on the first day of the month four months prior to the month of the trip. Thus, permits for May trips will be available on February 1. Popular sites such as Phantom Ranch and Bright Angel Campground are usually reserved on the first day of the month. There is also a limited number of permits available for unreserved sites, which are given out on a first-come, first-served basis.
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Hotel batzuek lurrunezko trenen eta gurutzaontzien urrezko aroko ondareak dituzte; hau da, 19. edo 20. mende hasierako II. Mundu Gerra aurrekoak. Jende aberatsa eta ospetsua geratzen zen hotel hauetan, baita otordu eta festa ederrak egiten zituzten ere. Tresna zaharrak, zerbitzu modernoen falta eta zahartasuna nolabait dotoreak dira eta hotelon nortasunaren parte dira. Jabe pribatuak izan ohi dituzte, baina batzuetan gobernuburu edo beste agintariak ere ostatatzen dituzte. Diru askoko bidaiariek munduari itzulia ematea kontuan har dezakete, gau batzuk hotel hauetan igarota.
mt: 19th or early 20th century hotels have the legacy of steam trains and ocean liners; that is, before World War II. The rich and famous stayed in these hotels, and they also held beautiful banquets and parties. The old tools, the lack of modern service and the aging somehow make them elegant and part of the hotel's character. They are usually owned by private individuals, but sometimes they also host heads of state or other officials. Wealthy travelers may consider giving the world a tour, staying in these hotels for a night or two.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: Europarekin lotzen duen itsaso azpiko zuntz optikoari eta banda zabaleko sateliteari esker, Groenlandia ongi konektatuta dago eta biztanleriaren % 93k dauka Internet konexioa. Segur aski hotelak edo anfitrioiak (apopilo-etxe edo etxe pribatu batean baldin bazaude) wifia edo Internetera konektatutako ordenagailu bat izango du, eta kokaleku guztietan dago ziberkafetegi bat edo wifi publikoa daukan tokiren bat. Lehen aipatu bezala, “eskimal” hitza AEBetan onartzen den arren, estatubatuarrak ez diren Artikoko herri askok peioratibotzat hartzen dute, Kanadan bereziki. Groenlandiar natiboei hitz hori entzuten badiezu ere, komeni da kanpotarrek ez erabiltzea. Groenlandiako biztanle natiboek Inuit esaten diete haien buruei Kanadan, eta Kalaalleq (plurala Kalaallit), groenlandiarra esateko, Groenlandian. Delituak eta kanpotarren aurkako jokaera desegokia ez dira ia ezagutzen Groenlandian. Herrietan ere, ez dago “eremu zailik”. Eguraldi hotza da, agian, prestatuta ez datorrenak izango duen arrisku bakarra. Groenlandiara etortzen bazara urtaro hotzetan (geroz eta iparralderago joan, geroz eta hotz handiagoa), oinarritzekoa da nahikoa beroa den arropa ekartzea. Udako egun oso luzeek lo nahikoa ez egitearekin lotutako arazoak eta erlazionatutako osasun arazoak sor ditzakete. Udan, kontuz ibili eltxo nordikoekin. Ez dute gaixotasunik transmititzen, baina narritagarriak izan daitezke.
mt: Groenlandia Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandiako biztanleak Groenlandi
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Europarekin lotzen duen itsaso azpiko zuntz optikoari eta banda zabaleko sateliteari esker, Groenlandia ongi konektatuta dago eta biztanleriaren % 93k dauka Internet konexioa. Segur aski hotelak edo anfitrioiak (apopilo-etxe edo etxe pribatu batean baldin bazaude) wifia edo Internetera konektatutako ordenagailu bat izango du, eta kokaleku guztietan dago ziberkafetegi bat edo wifi publikoa daukan tokiren bat. Lehen aipatu bezala, “eskimal” hitza AEBetan onartzen den arren, estatubatuarrak ez diren Artikoko herri askok peioratibotzat hartzen dute, Kanadan bereziki. Groenlandiar natiboei hitz hori entzuten badiezu ere, komeni da kanpotarrek ez erabiltzea. Groenlandiako biztanle natiboek Inuit esaten diete haien buruei Kanadan, eta Kalaalleq (plurala Kalaallit), groenlandiarra esateko, Groenlandian. Delituak eta kanpotarren aurkako jokaera desegokia ez dira ia ezagutzen Groenlandian. Herrietan ere, ez dago “eremu zailik”. Eguraldi hotza da, agian, prestatuta ez datorrenak izango duen arrisku bakarra. Groenlandiara etortzen bazara urtaro hotzetan (geroz eta iparralderago joan, geroz eta hotz handiagoa), oinarritzekoa da nahikoa beroa den arropa ekartzea. Udako egun oso luzeek lo nahikoa ez egitearekin lotutako arazoak eta erlazionatutako osasun arazoak sor ditzakete. Udan, kontuz ibili eltxo nordikoekin. Ez dute gaixotasunik transmititzen, baina narritagarriak izan daitezke.

src: Jardín de la Unión. 17. mendeko komentu bateko ataria zen; guzti hartatik, ordea, San Diego-ko Tenplua soilik geratzen da. Erdiguneko plaza gisa erabiltzen da orain eta beti dago ospakizunen bat, gau eta egun. Hainbat jatetxe daude lorategiaren ondoan eta arratsalde eta iluntzeetan doako kontzertuak egiten ohi dira erdiko kioskoan. Callejón del Beso (muxuaren kalezuloa). 69 zentimetroz banatutako bi balkoi dira maitasun-mito zahar baten etxe. Hainbat umek istorioa kontatuko dizute txanpon batzuen truke.
mt: 17th century convent gatehouse; all that remains of the complex is the Church of San Diego. It is now used as a town square and is always full of activity. There are several restaurants around the garden and free concerts are often held in the central kiosk at night. Callejón del Beso (alley of the kiss). Two balconies separated by 69 centimeters are the setting for an old love story. Many children will tell you the story for a few coins.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Xendazaletasuna kanpoko jarduera bat da eta inguru naturaletan ibilaldiak egitean datza, maiz mendiko ibilbideetan. Eguneko xendazaletasunaren barruan, milia bat baino gutxiagoko distantziak edo egun batean egin daitekeen distantziak hartzen dira barne. Egun batez bide erraz batean ibiltzeko ez da prestakuntza handirik behar eta egoera on samarrean dagoen edonork goza dezake. Haur txikiak dituzten familiek prestakuntza handiagoa behar dute baina egun bat kanpoan igarotzea posible da haurtxoak eta ume txikiak izanik ere.
mt: Hiking is a recreational activity and can be done in natural environments, often in mountain trails. Within day hiking, distances of less than one mile or distances that can be done in one day are taken inside. One day on an easy trail does not require much preparation and anyone can enjoy in good conditions. Families with small children need more preparation but it is possible to spend one day outdoors even with infants and small children.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: Norvegian oso ohikoak dira fiordo eta haran malkartsuak, bat-batean goi-lautada altu eta nahiko erregular batera iristen direnak. Goi-lautada horiei “vidde” esaten zaie askotan, eta zuhaitzik gabeko espazio ireki eta zabala esan nahi du, mugarik gabeko hedadura. Rogalanden eta Agderren “hei” deitu ohi zaie, eta zuhaitzik gabeko eremu esan nahi du, normalean txilarrez estalita dagoena.
mt: In Norway, fjords and steep valleys are very common, suddenly giving way to high and relatively regular plateaus. These plateaus are often called "vidde", and open and wide area without borders. In Rogaland and Agder, they are called "hei", and open area with grass, usually with rocks.
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Mendi-estazioetako goi-denboraldi turistikoak Indiako udan izaten ohi da. Hala ere, beste mota bateko edertasuna eta xarma aurki dezakegu neguan, mendi-estazioek elur oparo jasotzen eta eskiatzeko eta elur-oholean aritzeko jarduerak eskaintzen dituztelako, besteak beste.
mt: The high season for mountain resorts in India is during the summer. However, we can find another kind of beauty and charm in the winter, when the mountain resorts receive snow and offer skiing and snowshoeing activities, among others.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Egon ziur, kirol-portura iristen zarenean dena nahiko agerikoa izango dela. Itsasontzietan bidaiatzeko beste auto-stop bidaiari batzuekin elkartuko zara eta haiek duten informazioa partekatuko dute zurekin. Funtsean, zure laguntza eskaintzeko kartelak jarriko dituzu, kaian zehar paseatuko zara, beren yateak garbitzen ari direnengana hurbilduko zara, tabernan marinelekin harremanak sortzen saiatuko zara, etab. Saiatu ahalik eta jende gehienarekin hitz egiten. Denborarekin, mundu guztiak ezagutuko zaitu eta norbaiten bila dabilen ontziari buruzko zantzuak emango dizkizute.
mt: 100% sure, when you arrive at the port, everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other travelers who are going to sail on boats and they will share their information with you. Basically, you will put up signs offering your help, you will walk around the docks, you will approach people who are cleaning their yachts, you will try to make contact with sailors in the taverns, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. Over time, you will know everyone and you will give clues about a ship that is looking for something.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Hong Kong uharteak ematen dio izena Hong Kongeko lurraldeari, eta hori da turista askorentzako arretagune nagusia. Hong Kongeko silueta osatzen duten eraikinen desfilea barra-diagrama distiratsu batekin alderatu izan da, Victoria portuko uren presentziarekin bistaratu egiten dena. Hong Kongeko bista onenak lortzeko, atera uhartetik eta joan parean dagoen Kowloon urertzeko hiri-eremura. Hong Kong uharteko hiri-garapenaren gehiena iparraldeko kostaldean berreskuratutako eremuan pilatuta dago. Hori da kolono britainiarrek beraientzat hartu zuten tokia; beraz, lurraldearen iragan kolonialaren zantzuen bila ari bazara, abiapuntu egokia da hau.
mt: Hong Kong is named after the island of Hong Kong, and it is the main tourist attraction for many. The skyline of Hong Kong has been compared to a dazzling bar graph, with the presence of Victoria Harbour's waters. To get the best view of Hong Kong, leave the island and go to the city area of Kowloon across the harbour. Most of the city's development is concentrated in the reclaimed area along the northern coast. This was the area the British colonists took for themselves; so, if you are looking for traces of the island's colonial past, this is a good starting point.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Estribuak zaldizkoaren sostengua dira eta zelaren bi aldetan egoten dira zintzilik. Zaldizkoari egonkortasun handia ematen diete baina segurtasunarekin lotutako arriskuak egon daitezke, zaldizkoa trabatuta gera daitekeelako. Zaldizkoa zalditik erortzen bada baina hanketako bat estriboan trabatuta geratzen bada, zaldiak arrastaka eraman dezake alde eginez gero. Arriskua gutxitzeko, segurtasun neurri batzuk hartu behar dira. Lehenik, zaldizko gehienek takoidun botak daramatzate, zola leun eta zabala dutenak. Bigarrenik, zela batzuek, batez ere ingeles-estilokoek, segurtasunezko barrak dituzte eta, horiei esker, estriboaren uhalak zelatik askatzen dira zaldizkoa erori eta atzerantz bultza eginda.
mt: Straps are the support of the rider and are found on both sides of the saddle. They provide the rider with stability but can be dangerous if the rider is thrown from the saddle. If the saddle is thrown from the horse but the rider's foot is caught in the strap, the horse may drag the rider backwards. To reduce the risk, safety precautions should be taken. First, most saddles have stirrup leathers, which are smooth and wide. Second, some saddles, especially English-style, have safety bars, which allow the stirrup leather to be released from the saddle if the rider is thrown and the horse is moving backwards.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

Zaldizkoa zalditik erortzen bada baina hanketako bat estriboan trabatuta geratzen bada, zaldiak arrastaka eraman dezake alde eginez gero. Arriskua gutxitzeko, segurtasun neurri batzuk hartu behar dira. Lehenik, zaldizko gehienek takoidun botak daramatzate, zola leun eta zabala dutenak. Bigarrenik, zela batzuek, batez ere ingeles-estilokoek, segurtasunezko barrak dituzte eta, horiei esker, estriboaren uhalak zelatik askatzen dira zaldizkoa erori eta atzerantz bultza eginda.
mt: Straps are the support of the rider and are found on both sides of the saddle. They provide the rider with stability but can be dangerous if the rider is thrown from the saddle. If the saddle is thrown from the horse but the rider's foot is caught in the strap, the horse may drag the rider backwards. To reduce the risk, safety precautions should be taken. First, most saddles have stirrup leathers, which are smooth and wide. Second, some saddles, especially English-style, have safety bars, which allow the stirrup leather to be released from the saddle if the rider is thrown and the horse is moving backwards.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Ostatuen trukerako sarea erakunde bat da eta bidaiariak eta bisitan doazen tokikoak konektatzen ditu. Halako sare batean parte hartzeko, lineako inprimaki bat bete behar da; hala ere, sare batzuk egiaztapen osagarria eskaintzen edo eskatzen dute. Ondoren, erabilgarri dauden ostalarien zerrenda bat ematen da inprimatuta edo linean; are gehiago, beste bidaiarien erreferentziak eta iritziak ere izaten dituzte batzuetan. Couchsurfing-a 2004ko urtarrilean sortu zen, ordenagailu-programatzaile Casey Fenton-ek Islandiarako hegaldi merke bat aurkitu baina lotarako tokirik ez zuenean. Bertako unibertsitateko ikasleei mezu elektronikoak bidali zizkien eta doako ostatua eskaintzen zioten mezu ugari jaso zituen.
mt: Couchsurfing is a network that connects travelers and local visitors. To join such a network, a membership card must be filled out; however, some networks require additional verification. After joining, a list of available hosts is printed or displayed online; in some cases, references and reviews of other travelers are also included. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 by Casey Fenton, a computer programmer, when he found a cheap flight to Iceland but had no place to stay. He sent emails to local university students and received many offers of free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Ostatuetan gazteak egon ohi dira, normalean hogei urte ingurukoak, baina zaharragoak ere aurki daitezke. Haurrak dituzten familiak ez dira ohikoak, baina ostatu batzuek onartzen dituzte gela pribatuetan.
mt: 20 year olds are usually found in hostels, but older people can be found as well. Families with children are not common, but some hostels allow private rooms.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Bumerana jaurtitzeko gaitasuna turista askok lortu nahiko luketen abilezia ezaguna da. Eskura itzultzen den bumerana jaurtitzen ikasi nahi baduzu, ziurtatu itzultzeko egokia den bumeran bat duzula. Izan ere, Australian erabilgarri dauden bumeran gehienak ez dira itzultzen. Hasiberrientzat, hobe da bumerana botatzen ez saiatzea haizea badabil.
mt: The ability to throw a Frisbee is a well-known skill that many tourists would like to acquire.  If you want to learn to throw a Frisbee, make sure you have a Frisbee that is suitable for returning.  Most of the Frisbees available in Australia are not returnable.  For beginners, it is better not to try to throw a Frisbee if there is wind.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Indonesian 17.000 irla daude eta Indonesiako gastronomiaren terminoaren barruan eskualde ugaritako sukaldaritza sartzen da. Hala ere, bestelako sailkatzailerik gabe, termino horrek Java uhartearen erdialdeko eta ekialdeko janariari egin ohi dio erreferentzia. Javako gastronomia artxipielago osoan dago erabilgarri gaur egun eta modu apalean ondutako hainbat otordu barne hartzen ditu. Izan ere, Javako biztanleen zapore gustukoenak kakahuetearena, txilearena, azukrearena (batez ere Javako koko-azukrea) eta hainbat espezia aromatikorena dira.
mt: 17,000 recipes are included in Indonesian cuisine, which is part of the gastronomy of various regions in Indonesia. However, without any other classification, this term usually refers to the food of the central and eastern part of Java island. Javanese cuisine is widely used today and includes various meals that have been processed in a simple way. In fact, the tastes of the Javanese people are the taste of peanuts, chili, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Hizkuntza-medikoa ezagutzen ez duten horientzat, infekzioso eta kutsakor hitzek esanahi desberdina dute. Gaixotasun infekziosoak patogenoek sortutakoak dira, hala nola, birusek, bakterioek, onddoek edo bestelako parasitoek. Gaixotasun kutsakorrak dira infektatuta dagoen norbaitengana gerturatuta erraz transmititzen direnak. Gobernu askok eskatzen diete herrialdera datozen bidaiariei edo atzerrira doazen egoiliarrei hainbat gaixotasunen aurkako txertoa jartzea. Eskakizun horiek aldatu egin daitezke bidaiariak bisitatu dituen edo bisitatu nahi dituen herrialdeen aranera.
mt: For those unfamiliar with medical terminology, infectious and contagious diseases have different meanings. Infectious diseases are those caused by pathogens such as viruses, bacteria, fungi or other parasites. Contagious diseases are those that are easily transmitted to someone nearby who is infected. Many governments require incoming travelers or outgoing citizens to receive vaccinations against certain diseases. These requirements may change depending on the countries visited or to be visited.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: VPN (sare pribatu birtuala) pertsonalen hornitzaileak modu bikaina dira zentsura politikoa eta IP geofiltrazio komertziala saihesteko. Web proxy zerbitzariak baino askoz hobeak dira hainbat arrazoirengatik: Interneteko trafiko guztia birbideratzen dute, ez http soilik. Banda zabalera handiagoa eskaini ohi dute eta zerbitzu kalitate hobea. Halaber, enkriptatuta daudenez, zailagoa da haiek zelatatzea.
mt: VPN (virtual private network) providers are a great way to get around political censorship and commercial IP geofiltering. They are better than web proxies for a number of reasons: they route all your internet traffic, not just http. They usually offer wider bandwidth and better service. And because they are encrypted, it is harder to snoop on them.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Deiak Interneten bideratzen direnez, ez duzu zertan erabili bizi zaren edo bisitatu duzun tokiko telefono-enpresa bat. Halaber, ez duzu zertan lortu bizi zaren komunitateko zenbakirik; satelite bidezko Interneterako konexioa lor dezakezu Alaskako Chicken basatian eta Arizona eguzkitsuan zaudela adierazten duen zenbaki bat hautatu. Askotan, zenbaki global bereizi bat erosi behar duzu linea analogikoak erabiltzen dituzten telefonoetako deiak jaso ahal izateko. Zenbakiaren jatorriak eragin egiten dio deitzen zaituen jendeari.
mt: Because of the Internet, you don't have to use the local phone company you used to use. You don't have to get a number for the community you live in; you can get a number that shows you're in Chicken, Alaska, or the Arizona desert, using satellite Internet. You often have to buy a special number to receive calls on analog phones. The origin of the number affects who you call.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.
