src: Nahiko erraza da italiera ahoskatzea, hitz gehienak idazten diren modu berean ahoskatzen dira eta. Batez ere c eta g hizkiekin ibili behar da adi, atzean doan bokalaren arabera ahoskera aldatzen baitzaie. Halaber, ziurtatu r eta rr ez dituzula berdin ahoskatzen: caro maitea da, baina carro, gurdia.
mt: It is not too difficult to pronounce Italian, as most words are pronounced as they are spelled.  In particular, you need to be careful with c and g, as the pronunciation changes depending on the vowel that follows.  Also, make sure you don't confuse r and rr: caro (dear) is pronounced differently from carro (car).
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: İzmir Turkiako hirugarren hiri handiena da, 3,7 milioi biztanle ingururekin, bigarren porturik handiena Istanbulen atzetik, eta oso garraio-gune aproposa. Garai batean hiri hau antzinako Esmirna zen, baina orain merkataritza-eremu moderno, garatu eta jendetsua da, badia erraldoi baten inguruan kokatuta eta mendiz inguratuta dagoena. Bulebar zabalek, beirazko aurrealdeak dituzten eraikinek eta merkataritza-guneek lauza gorri tradizionalak dituzte teilatuetan, XVIII. mendeko azoka eta meskita eta eliza zaharrak, nahiz eta hiriak Mediterraneoko Europaren kutsua eduki Turkia tradizionalarena baino.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey, with a population of around 3.7 million, the second busiest port after Istanbul, and a very appropriate transport hub. At one time this city was ancient Smyrna, but now it is a modern, developed and populated commercial area, surrounded by a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. Wide boulevards have glass-fronted buildings and commercial areas with red traditional tiles on the roofs, XVIII century bazaar and mosque and old church, although the city has the Mediterranean European flavor of Turkey's traditional.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Gereziondoen loraldia ikustea, hanami deritzona, VIII. mendean hasi zen kultura japoniarrean egiten. Kontzeptuak Txinan zeukan jatorria, non aranondoen loreak ziren gogokoenak. Japonian, gereziondoen loreen lehenengo festak enperadoreak antolatzen zituen berarentzat eta gorte inperialaren inguruko aristokraziako beste kideentzat.
mt: Hanami, the custom of viewing the blossoms, began in Japan in the eighth century. The concept had its origins in China, where the orchid was the most popular flower. In Japan, the first flower-viewing parties were organized by emperors for themselves and other members of the imperial court.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Jerusalem Israelgo hiriburua eta hiririk handiena da, nahiz eta beste herrialde askok eta Nazio Batuen Erakundeak ez duten Israelgo hiriburu gisa onartzen. Judeako mendietako hiri zaharrak milaka urtetako historia zirraragarria dauka. Hiri sakratua da hiru erlijio monoteistetan (judaismoa, kristautasuna eta islama), eta erdigune espiritual, erlijioso eta kulturalaren funtzioa dauka. Hiriaren, eta, bereziki, hiri zaharreko toki askoren garrantzi erlijiosoaren ondorioz, Israelgo helmuga turistiko nagusienetakoa da Jerusalem. Jerusalemek leku historiko, arkeologiko eta kultural asko ditu, baita saltoki-gune, kafetegi eta jatetxe bizi eta jendetsuak ere.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel. Although other countries and the United Nations do not recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel. The city has a long and rich history as a center of the Jewish religion, and is considered holy to the three major Abrahamic religions—Judaism, Christianity and Islam. Jerusalem is a major tourist destination in the Middle East, particularly for Christian pilgrims from around the world. Jerusalem has many historic, archaeological and cultural sites, as well as lively markets, cafes and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Kruger Parke Nazionala (KNP) Hegoafrikako ipar-ekialdean kokatuta dago, Mozambikeko muga hartzen du ekialdean, Zimbabwekoa iparraldean, eta hegoaldeko muga Crocodile ibaia da. Parkeak 19.500 km²-ko azalera du eta 14 ekozonaldetan banatuta dago, eta bakoitzean askotariko fauna dago. Hegoafrikako alderdi erakargarri nagusienetako bat da eta Hegoafrikako Parke Nazionalen (SANParks) ikurtzat hartzen da. Hegoafrikako Parke Nazional guztietan bezala, eguneko kuotak daude parkean sartzeko eta kontserbaziorako. Agian norbaiti ongi datorkio Wild Card txartel bat erostea, Hegoafrikako parkeetarako edo Hegoafrikako Parke Nazional guztietarako sarbidea ematen duena.
mt: The Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in the north-eastern part of South Africa, bordering with Mozambique to the east, Zimbabwe to the north and the Crocodile River to the south. The park has an area of 19,500 km² and is divided into 14 ecozones, each with a variety of fauna. It is one of the most popular tourist destinations in South Africa and is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). Like all South African National Parks, daily entrance fees are charged to enter the park and for conservation. Perhaps someone would like to buy a Wild Card, which gives access to all South African National Parks.
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.

src: Machu Picchuren iparraldean dago dorre itxurako mendi maldatsu hau, eta hondarren argazkietako atzealde izan ohi da. Behetik ikaragarria dirudi, eta maldatsua eta igotzeko zaila da, baina sasoi onean dagoen edonor da gora igotzeko gai 45 minutu ingurutan. Harriak daude ipinita ia bide guztian zehar, koska gisa, eta maldatsuenak diren tarteetan altzairuzko kableak daude, baranda gisa erabiltzeko. Hori esan ondoren, jakinarazten dizugu hitzik gabe geratuko zarela. Halaber, kontuz ibili tarte maldatsuetan, batez ere hezetasuna badago, arriskutsua izan baitaiteke. Pasa beharreko koba txiki bat dago puntatik gertu, nahiko baxua eta estua.
mt: This is a picture of the mountain Machu Picchu in Peru. It is a steep mountain, and it is hard to climb. But everyone can climb it in 45 minutes. There are rocks in the path, like a path. And there are metal cables in the steepest parts, to use as a handrail. After that, you will be speechless. Also, be careful in the steep parts, especially if it is wet, because it can be dangerous. There is a small cave near the top, which is quite low and narrow.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Mallorcako sukaldaritzak, Mediterraneoko antzeko eremuetakoaren antzera, ogia, barazkiak eta haragia (txerrikia bereziki) ditu oinarri, eta oliba-olioa erabiltzen da plater guztietan. Ohiko afari sinple bat, udan batik bat, Pa amb oli da: ogia oliba-olioarekin, tomatearekin eta eskura dauden beste osagarriekin, hala nola gazta, atuna, etab.
mt: Mallorcan cuisine, like that of other Mediterranean regions, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), and olive oil is used in all dishes. A typical simple meal, especially in summer, is Pa amb oli: bread with olive oil, tomato and other available garnishes such as cheese, ham, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: Hangi otordua lurrean egiten da, zulo bero batean. Zuloa sutan egondako harri beroekin edo berotasun geotermikoarekin berotzen da, zeinak lurreko eremuak naturalki berotzen baitituen. Hangia erabili ohi da erretako jakiak dituen afari tradizionalak egiteko. Rotorua-ko hainbat tokitan hangi geotermikoa eskaintzen dute eta beste batzuk proba daitezke Christchurch, Wellington edo beste tokietan.
mt: A hangi is cooked in a pit in the ground. The pit is heated with hot rocks or geothermal heat, which naturally heats the ground in some areas. A hangi is often used to cook traditional feasts with burnt food. Geothermal hangi is offered in some areas of Rotorua and others can be tried in Christchurch, Wellington or other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Monasterioak bisitatzeko, belaunetik beherako gonak eta sorbaldak estalita eraman behar dituzte emakumeek. Monasterio gehienek zapiak ematen dizkiete prest etorri ez diren emakumeentzat, baina zeurea eramaten baduzu, batez ere kolore biziak baditu, sarrerako monjeak edo mojak irribarre egingo dizu. Era berean, belaunetik beherako galtzak eraman behar dituzte gizonek. Hori ere sarrerako hornigaietatik har daiteke, baina arropa hori ez dutenez garbitzen pertsona batek erabili ondoren, baliteke eroso ez sentitzea gona horiek jantzita. Neurri bakarra gizonentzat!
mt: Women must wear skirts or dresses that cover their knees and shoulders when visiting monasteries. Most monasteries provide scarves for women who have not prepared themselves, but if you bring your own, especially if it is brightly colored, the monks or nuns at the entrance will be impressed. Men must also wear skirts or dresses. This can also be obtained from the entrance supplies, but since you do not wash the clothes after a person has used them, it may be uncomfortable to wear these clothes. One last thing for men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Artikoko edo Antartikako eremuak neguan bisitatzen badituzu, gau polarra biziko duzu, eguzkia zeruertzetik gora goratzen ez denean, alegia. Aukera ona da aurora borealak ikusteko, zerua ilun egongo baita ia egun osoan. Zonalde horiek oso populazio eskasa dutenez eta argi-kutsadura arazoa izaten ez denez, izarrez gozatzeko parada ere izango duzu.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic regions in winter, you will experience polar night, when the sun does not rise above the horizon. It is a good opportunity to see the aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark almost all day. With little population and no light pollution, you will also have a star party.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Estaldurarik ez duten urruneko lekuetan, satelite bidezko telefono bat izango da zure aukera bakarra. Satelite bidezko telefonoak ez dira sakelako telefonoen ordezko aukera ohikoa, aire zabalean egon behar baita deiak egiteko, satelitearen ikuseremu argian. Zerbitzu hori itsasontziek eta aisialdirako ontziek erabiltzen ohi dute, baita urruneko datuen eta ahotsen beharra duten espedizioek ere. Tokiko telefono zerbitzuaren hornitzaileak informazio gehiago eman ahalko dizu zerbitzu horri konektatzeko.
mt: In remote areas without cell towers, your only option will be a satellite phone. Satellite phones are not a common replacement for cell phones, as they must be in line of sight with the satellite's signal beam. This service is often used by ships and recreational boats, as well as expeditions that need remote data and voice communications. Your local phone service provider can give you more information on connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Moldaviako hiriburua Chişinău da. Errumaniera da bertako hizkuntza, baina errusiera asko erabiltzen da. Etnien arteko gatazka pairatu duen etnia anitzeko errepublika da Moldavia. Gatazka horren ondorioz, Transnistria errepublika autoaldarrikatua sortu zen 1994an Moldaviako ekialdean. Gobernu eta dibisa propioa ditu, baina NBEko herrialde kideek ez dituzte haiek berresten. Moldaviako bi eremuen arteko lotura ekonomikoak berrezarri egin dira nahiz eta negoziazio politikoek porrot egin. Kristautasun ortodoxoa da Moldaviako erlijio nagusia.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. Romanian is the main language, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a republic with a large number of ethnic groups, which has suffered ethnic conflict. As a result of this conflict, the Transnistria autonomous republic was formed in eastern Moldova in 1994. It has its own government and currency, but the countries of the United Nations do not recognize it. Economic links between the two parts of Moldova have been restored, although political negotiations have failed. Orthodoxy is the main religion in Moldova.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Montevideo Ekuatorearen hegoaldean dagoenez, uda da Ipar Hemisferioan negua denean, eta alderantziz. Montevideo subtropikoan dago, eta udako hilabeteetan, ohikoa da 30ºC baino gehiagoko tenperaturak izatea. Negua oso freskoa izan daiteke; ez da ohikoa izoztea, baina haizeak eta hezetasunak hotz sentipen handiagoa ematen dute termometroak dioena baino. Ez dago urtaro “euritsu” edo “lehor” jakinik: euri kantitate antzekoa egiten du urte osoan zehar.
mt: Because Montevideo is on the southern hemisphere, summer is in the northern hemisphere winter, and vice versa. Montevideo is subtropical, and in the summer months, it is not unusual for temperatures to be above 30 °C. Winter can be quite cold; it is not common for it to snow, but wind and humidity make it feel colder than the thermometer says. There is no “wet season” or “dry season”: rainfall is about the same throughout the year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: Nahi gabeko horma-irudiak edo zirriborroak graffiti gisa ezagutzen dira. Nahiz eta fenomeno moderno izatetik urrun egon, gehienek espraiak erabiliz jabetza publikoa eta pribatua hondatzen duten gazteekin erlazionatzen dute. Hala ere, gaur egun graffiti artista errespetatuak, graffitiarekin lotutako ekitaldiak eta “legezko” hormak daude. Testuinguru horretan, graffitiak artelanak dira etiketa irakurtezinak baino.
mt: Unwanted wall images or sketches are known as graffiti. Although the phenomenon is far from modern, most associate it with young people who vandalize public and private property with spray paint. However, today there are respected graffiti artists, graffiti-related events, and “legal” walls. In this context, graffiti are works of art, not indecipherable tags.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Jaialdi batzuen kasuan, musika-jaialdietako parte-hartzaile gehienek bertan kanpatzea erabakitzen dute, eta esperientziaren ezinbesteko zati bat dela uste dute gehienek. Jardueretatik gertu egon nahi baduzu, goiz joan beharko duzu, musika dagoen eremutik gertu kanpatzeko leku bat aurkitzeko. Gogoratu eszenatoki nagusietan musika amaitu arren, jaialdiko beste toki batzuetan musika jotzen jarrai dezaketela berandu arte. Haurrak dituzten familiek kanpatzeko erabil ditzaketen eremuak dituzte jaialdi batzuek.
mt: At some festivals, most attendees choose to camp on site, and most consider it an essential part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action, you'll need to arrive early to find a spot near the music. Remember that the main stages may stop playing at night, but other areas may continue playing late into the night. Some festivals have areas for families to camp.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Kontuan hartuta herrietako batzuk zein isolatuta dauden, ezin izango duzu gaugiro handirik aurkitu Albuquerque edo Santa Fe-ra joaten ez bazara. Hala ere, goian zerrendatutako kasino gehienek edariak zerbitzatzen dituzte eta horietako batzuk markek eskainitako entretenimendua eskaintzen dute (batez ere Albuquerque eta Santa Fe inguruko markak). Kontuan izan: herri txikietako tabernak ez dira beti egoteko tokirik egokiak kanpotarrentzat. Lehenik, Mexiko Berriaren iparraldeak mozkortuta gidatzearekin lotutako arazo handiak ditu eta mozkortuta dauden gidarien kontzentrazioa herri txikietako tabernetakoaren antzekoa da.
mt: Remember that if you're not going to Albuquerque or Santa Fe, you won't find much nightlife in the smaller towns. However, most of the casinos serve drinks and some of them offer entertainment (especially the casinos around Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Keep in mind that the bars in small towns are not always the best places for out-of-towners. First, the northern part of New Mexico has a lot of drunk driving problems and the concentration of drunk drivers is similar to that of small town bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Tokiko garagardo nagusia “Number One” da. Ez da garagardo konplexua, baina atsegina eta freskagarria da. Bertako beste garagardoak “Manta” du izena. Frantziako ardo ugari daude probatzeko, baina Zeelanda Berriko eta Australiako ardoek hobeto bidaiatzen dute. Bertako iturriko ura edangarria da, baina botilako ura edonon aurki daiteke gehiegi fidatzen ez bazara. Australiarrentzat, “flat white” izeneko kafea arrotza da. Kafe hutsari “espresso” deitzen diote, cappuccino-ak esnegaina dauka (aparrik gabe) eta tea esnerik gabe zerbitzatzen da. Txokolate beroa Belgikako irizpideen arabera egiten dute. Zukuak garestiak dira baina bikainak.
mt: 1. The local beer is called “Number One”. It is not a complex beer, but it is refreshing and pleasant. The other local beers are called “Manta”. There are many French wines to try, but the wines from New Zealand and Australia travel better. The local water is drinkable, but bottled water is available everywhere if you are not too trusting. For Australians, a “flat white” is the local coffee. Coffee without milk is called “espresso”, cappuccinos have no foam (without whip) and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate is made to Belgian standards. Jams are expensive but excellent.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Guaraniak izan ziren Paraguai ekialdeko talde indigena garrantzitsuena. Ehiztari erdi nomada gisa bizi ziren eta iraupen-nekazaritza praktikatzen zuten. Chaco-ko eskualdea ere bazen beste tribu indigena batzuen etxea, adibidez Guaycurú eta Payaguá tribuena. Horiek ehizari, uztari eta arrantzari esker bizi ziren. 16. mendeko Paraguai, aurrez “Indietako probintzia erraldoia” deitua, Espainiako konkistatzaileen eta bertako indigena taldeen arteko nahasketaren ondorio izan zen. Espainiarrek kolonizazio aroa hasi eta hiru mendez iraun zuen. 1537an Asunción sortu zenetik, Paraguaik bere nortasun eta identitate indigenaren zati handi bat mantentzea lortu du.
mt: Guarani were the most important indigenous group in eastern Paraguay. They were semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers and practiced subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was also home to other indigenous tribes, such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá. They lived by hunting, gathering, and fishing. Paraguay, previously called "the great province of the Indies", was the result of the confusion between the Spanish conquerors and the indigenous groups. The Spanish colonization lasted for three centuries, from the founding of Asunción in 1537. Paraguay has managed to maintain a large part of its indigenous identity and nationality.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: Paristarrek egozentriko, zakar eta harro ospea dute. Askotan inolako zehaztasunik ez duen estereotipo bat izan arren, Parisen ongi moldatzeko modurik onena ahalik eta portaera onena edukitzea da, “bien élevé” jendearen antzera (ongi hezitakoak). Batetik bestera joatea askoz errazagoa izango da horrela. Paristarren kanpoalde zurruna azkar desagertuko da oinarrizko adeitasuna erakusten baduzu.
mt: Parisians are self-centered, arrogant and conceited. Despite often being portrayed as a stereotype without much detail, the best way to get along in Paris is to act like the "well-bred" people, "bien élevé". It will be much easier to get along that way. The Parisian's rough exterior will quickly disappear if you show basic politeness.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRai-ek bi klase ditu Lurmutur Hiriaren barruko eta inguruko trenetan: MetroPlus (lehenengo klasea ere deitua) eta Metro (hirugarren klasea ere deitua). MetroPlus erosoagoa da eta bidaiari gutxiago ditu, baina apur bat garestiagoa da. Hala ere, Europako metroetako txartel arruntak baino merkeagoa da. Tren guztietan daude MetroPlus eta Metro eserlekuak; MetroPlus eserlekuak Lurmutur Hiritik gertuen dagoen trenaren amaieran daude.
mt: MetroRai has two classes on trains within and around the city of Dubai: MetroPlus (also known as First Class) and Metro (also known as Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and has fewer passengers, but is slightly more expensive. However, it is cheaper than the standard ticket of most European metros. There are MetroPlus and Metro seats on all trains; MetroPlus seats are at the end of the train closest to the city of Dubai.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Bidaiariek euren jaioterrian ezagutzen ez dituzten animalien izurriteak aurki ditzakete. Izurriteok janaria hondatu, narritadura eragin edo kasu okerragoetan erreakzio alergiko bat eragin dezakete, baita pozoia zabaldu edo infekzioak transmititu ere. Gaixotasun infekziosoak edo indarkeriaz jendea zauritu edo hil dezaketen animalia arriskutsuak ez dira izurri gisa hartzen.
mt: Travelers can encounter animal diseases that are not endemic to their home country. Infected animals can contaminate food, cause illness, or in rare cases, trigger allergic reactions. They can also spread toxins or transmit infections that can cause illness or death in humans. Animals that are dangerous to people are not considered pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Denda txiki oro dago telefonoetarako aurreordainketa-txartel aukera nahasgarriz beteta, telefono-kabinetan edo telefono arruntekin erabil daitezkeenak. Txartel gehienak edonora deitzeko egokiak diren arren, haietako batzuk espezializatuta daude herrialde multzo jakin batera deiak egiteko prezio onak eskaintzean. Zerbitzu horiek atzitzeko, telefono gehienetatik doako deiak egiteko aukera ematen duen telefono-zenbaki bat erabili behar da.
mt: A small shop is going around offering pre-paid phone card options, which can be used with phone booths or with regular phones. Most of the cards are good for calling anywhere, but some are specialized to give good rates for calling certain countries. To use these services, a phone number is needed that allows free calls.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Plitvice Aintziretako Parke Nazionala basoz beteta dago, bereziki pagoz eta izeiz, eta landaredi alpinoaren eta mediterranearraren nahasketa da nagusi. Landare-komunitate anitza eta nabaria dauka, mikroklima sortari, lurzoru desberdinei eta altitude-maila ugariei esker. Zonalde horretan animalia- eta hegazti-espezie sorta zabala ere bizi da. Ezohiko fauna aurki daiteke bertan, hala nola Europako hartz arrea, otsoa, arranoa, hontza, ipar-katamotza eta basoilarra, baita espezie ohikoagoak ere.
mt: Plitvice Lakes National Park is covered with forests, mainly beech and fir, and is a mixture of alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a rich and varied plant community, thanks to the microclimate, the different soils and the various altitudes. A wide range of animal and bird species live there. Unusual fauna can be found there, such as the brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, capercaillie and lynx, as well as more common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Hedabideek gezurra esan ohi dute horren helburuei dagokienez, “pirateria ekiditeko” dela aldarrikatuz. Izan ere, eskualdeko araudiek ez dute inolako eraginik kopia ilegalengan; bitez bit kopiatutako disko batek originalak bezain ongi funtzionatuko du edozein gailutan. Enpresa horiek beren merkatuetan kontrol handiagoa edukitzea da benetako helburua; dirua etengabe mugitzean dago koska.
mt: Media often lie about their purpose, claiming to be "anti-piracy".  In fact, local laws have no effect on illegal copies; a copied disk will work just as well as the original on any machine.  The real purpose is to gain more control in their markets; money is always the key.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Sorterrira iristen zarenean immigrazio-kontrolik egon ez arren edo tramite hutsa izan arren, aduanak gogaikarriak izan daitezke. Ziurtatu badakizula zer eraman dezakezun eta zer ez, eta deklara ezazu muga legalak gainditzen duen ezer.
mt: Customs can be searched upon arrival even if you are not subject to immigration control or have a blank form. Make sure you know what you can bring and what you can't, and declare anything that exceeds legal limits.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Cochamó bailara: Txile helmuga nagusia da eskalada egiteko eta Hego Amerikako Yosemite gisa ezagutzen dira; halaber, granitozko horma handi eta harkaitz ugari dituzte. Gailurretatik ikuspegiak izugarriak dira. Munduko eskalatzaile ugari bide berriak irekitzen ari dira aukera amaigabeko horma hauetan.
mt: Cochamó valley: Chile is the main destination for climbing and is known as the Yosemite of South America; it also has large granite walls and many cliffs. The views from the summits are amazing. Many climbers are opening new routes in this opportunity endless wall.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Munduan zehar hegan bidaiatu nahi baduzu Hego Hemisferioan zehar, hegaldien eta helmugen aukera mugatua da bide transozeanikoen gabeziagatik. Hegazkin-konpainien aliantza bakar batek ere ez ditu hiru ozeanoak gurutzatzen Hego Hemisferioan (eta SkyTeam-ek ez du pasaguneetako bakar bat ere egiten). Hala ere, Star Alliance-k eskakizun hauek betetzen ditu, Hego Pazifikoko ekialdea izan ezik; LATAM Oneworld-en hegaldiak dira Txileko Santiagotik Tahitirako ibilbideak egiten dituenak. Hegaldi hori ez da aukera bakarra Hego Pazifikoa eta Hego Amerikako mendebaldeko kostaldea saltatu nahi badituzu (ikusi jarraian dagoen informazioa).
mt: If you want to fly around the Southern Hemisphere, your options are limited by the lack of transoceanic routes. No single airline alliance covers all three oceans in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam doesn't have a single hub in the Southern Hemisphere either). However, Star Alliance does cover these routes, except for the South Pacific; LATAM's Oneworld flights are the ones that go from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti. This is not your only option if you want to fly from the South Pacific and the west coast of South America (see the information below).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

Hegaldi hori ez da aukera bakarra Hego Pazifikoa eta Hego Amerikako mendebaldeko kostaldea saltatu nahi badituzu (ikusi jarraian dagoen informazioa).

No single airline alliance covers all three oceans in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam doesn't have a single hub in the Southern Hemisphere either). However, Star Alliance does cover these routes, except for the South Pacific; LATAM's Oneworld flights are the ones that go from Santiago, Chile to Tahiti. This is not your only option if you want to fly from the South Pacific and the west coast of South America (see the information below).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Nazioartean, korrikan egiteko bisitaldiak antolatzen dituzten 200 erakunde inguru daude. Gehienek modu independentean egiten dute lan. Global Running Tours-en ondorengo Go Running Tours-ek korrikan egiteko bisitaldiak antolatzen dituzten lau kontinenteetako eragile ugari konektatzen ditu. Bartzelonako Running Tours Barcelona eta Kopenhageko Running Copenhagen sortu ondoren, Pragako Running Tours Prague eta beste asko batu zitzaizkien.
mt: 200 or so organizations worldwide organize running tours. Most of them work independently. Go Running Tours connects many of the providers of running tours on four continents. Running Tours Barcelona and Running Copenhagen were joined by Running Tours Prague and many others after that.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: Afrikako safariak dira turistentzako atrakzio nagusia eta bisitari askorentzako momentu ahaztezin. Safari terminoak, hizkera arruntean, zehazki Afrikako sabanan bizi den fauna ikusteko bidaiari egiten dio erreferentzia. Animalia batzuk, adibidez, elefanteak eta jirafak, autoetara gerturatzen dira eta ekipamendu estandarra erabiliz ikuspegi ona lor daiteke. Lehoiak, gepardoak eta panterak lotsatiak dira batzuetan eta hobeto ikusiko dituzu binokularrekin. Oinezko safarietan (“zuhaixketako ibilaldiak”, “safari ibiltari” edo “ibilaldi” ere deituak) ibili egiten da, ordu edo egon batzuez.
mt: African safaris are the main attraction for tourists and a memorable moment for many visitors. Safari in the common language refers to a journey to see the wildlife living in the African savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, come close to the car and a good view can be obtained using standard equipment. Lions, cheetahs and panthers are shy sometimes and you will see better with binoculars. Walking safaris (“hiking trails”, “safari walkers” or “hiking” are also called) is done, for hours or days.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Bakarrik edo lagun batekin soilik bazaude, gogoan izan talde handien bisitaldiak merkeagoak direla; hortaz, saiatu jende gehiago ezagutzen eta bildu lau eta sei pertsona bitarteko talde bat, prezio hobea lortzeko. Hala ere, ez kezkatu gehiegi horretaz, turistak hara eta hona eramaten baitituzte kotxeak betetzeko. Badirudi jendeak gehiago ordaintzeko trikimailu bat dela, beste ezeren gainetik.
mt: If you are traveling alone or with a companion, remember that larger groups get better rates; try to meet people and form a group of four to six people, for a better price. However, don't worry too much about this, as taxis will take you here and there to fill up their cars. It seems like people are paying more for a trick, above all else.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: San Frantziskoko ekonomia lotuta egon arren mundu mailan turismoa erakartzen duen tokia izatearekin, ekonomia dibertsifikatuta dago. Zerbitzu profesionalak, gobernua, finantzak, merkataritza eta turismoa dira lan-sektore nagusiak. Musikan, filmetan, literaturan eta herri-kulturan askotan agertu denez, hiria eta haren toki ezagunak famatu bihurtu dira mundu osoan. San Frantziskok turistentzako azpiegitura handia garatu du, hainbat hotel, jatetxe eta primerako batzarretarako zerbitzuekin. San Frantzisko ere nazioko toki onenetakoa da bestelako sukaldaritza asiarra jateko: korearra, tailandiarra, indiarra eta japoniarra.
mt: Despite being tied to the economy of San Francisco, the city is a tourist destination worldwide. The economy is diversified. Professional services, government, finance, trade and tourism are the main job sectors. The city and its famous places have been known worldwide in music, movies, literature and folk culture. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure, with many hotels, restaurants and meeting places. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the country to eat Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian and Japanese.
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Erreserba aurrez eginda, bidaiaria lasaiago egongo da bertara heldu eta lotarako tokia duela jakinda. Bidaia-agenteek eskaintzak eduki ohi dituzte hotel jakinekin, baina beren zerbitzuak erabil ditzakezu beste mota bateko ostatuak aurkitzeko; adibidez, kanpatzeko eremuak. Bidaia-agenteek gosaria, aireportutik edo aireporturako garraioa edo hegaldia eta hotela konbinatzen dituzten eskaintzak eskaini ohi dituzte. Erreserba gorde ere egin diezazukete, eskaintzari buruz hausnartzeko edo bertara bidaiatzeko dokumentazioa (adibidez, bisa) prestatzeko denbora behar baduzu. Aldaketak edo eskaerak bidaia-agentearen bidez egin behar dira, ez hotelarekin zuzenean harremanetan jarrita.
mt: 1. Make a reservation in advance, and you will be more relaxed when you arrive at the hotel knowing that you have a room waiting for you. Travel agents often have arrangements with specific hotels, but you can use their services to find other types of lodgings; for example, camping grounds. Travel agents often offer packages that combine meals, airport or airport-to-airport transportation, or flights and hotels. You can also reserve in advance, if you need time to think about the offer or to prepare documentation (for example, a visa) to travel there. Changes or requests must be made through the travel agent, not directly with the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Testuen zuzeneko itzulpen-aplikazioak: testu zati osoak hizkuntza batetik bestera automatikoki itzultzeko gai diren aplikazioak. Kategoria horretako zenbait aplikaziok mundu errealean atzerriko hizkuntzetan idatzita dauden seinaleak edo antzeko objektuak itzul ditzakete erabiltzaileak telefono adimenduna objektu horietara bideratzen duenean. Itzulpen-motorrak izugarri hobetu dira, eta nahikoa zuzenak diren itzulpenak egiten dituzte askotan (gainera, zentzugabekeria gutxiago dituzte), baina beharrezkoa da haiek egiaztatzea, posible baita zentzu erabat okerra ematea. Kategoria horretako aplikazio nagusienen artean Google Translate dago, lineaz kanpoko itzulpenak egiteko aukera ematen duena nahi den hizkuntzaren datuak deskargatu ondoren.
mt: 1. Real-time translation applications: Applications that can automatically translate entire texts from one language to another. Some applications in this category can translate foreign language signs or similar objects for users when they point their smartphone at such objects. Translation engines have improved greatly, and often produce translations that are quite accurate (and have fewer errors), but it is necessary to verify them, as it is possible to produce translations that are completely wrong. The most prominent applications in this category are Google Translate, which provides the option to translate texts in the desired language after downloading the data for that language.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Elur-jausiak ez dira ohiz kanpokoak; aldapa malkartsuek eutsi dezaketen elur kantitatea mugatua da, eta gehiegizko bolumena elur-jausi gisa erortzen da. Elurra itsaskorra delako sortzen da arazoa, eragile bat behar duelako erortzeko, eta jausten den elurrak elur gehiago jaustea eragin dezake. Batzuetan, jatorrizko eragilea eguzkia da elurra berotzen duenean, beste batzuetan, elur-jausi gehiago, beste gertakari natural batzuk edo, askotan, gizakiok dira eragileak.
mt: Slips are not unusual; the amount of snow that can be held by a slope is limited, and excess volume falls as a slip. The problem is that the snow is slippery, requiring a trigger to fall, and the falling snow can trigger more snow to fall. Sometimes the original trigger is the sun heating the snow, other times, more slips, other natural events, or, often, human triggers.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Curryak usain-belar eta espeziak ditu oinarri eta haragiarekin edo barazkiekin konbinatzen da. Currya “lehorra” edo “hezea” izan daiteke, likido kantitatearen arabera. Indiako Iparralde eta Pakistango barnealdean, jogurta oso erabilia da currya egiteko. Indiako Hegoaldean eta azpikontinenteko kostako beste eskualde batzuetan, koko-esnea erabiltzen dute.
mt: Curry is based on spices and herbs, and is usually combined with meat or vegetables.  Curry can be "dry" or "wet", depending on the amount of liquid.  Yogurt is very commonly used in the North of India and the interior of Pakistan.  In the South of India and other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Hego poloa zeharkatzen duen errepidea 1.600 km-ko bidea da, Ross itsasoko McMurdo estaziotik polora doana. Elur metatua da, beteta eta banderekin markatuta dauden pitzadurekin. Traktore espezializatuekin baino ezin da bidaiatu, erregaia eta hornigaiak daramatzaten arrastatze-lerekin. Oso arinak ez direnez, bideak brastakoan biratu behar du Mendi Transartartikoen inguruan goi-lautadara iristeko.
mt: 1600 km long, the road crosses the South Pole, from McMurdo Station on Ross Sea to the Pole. It is covered with snow, full of holes marked with flags. It can only be traveled with specialized tractors, carrying fuel and supplies. Because they are not very fast, the road has to be turned around in the Transantarctic Mountains to reach the high plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Hegoaldeko Afrikara autoz iristea eskualdearen edertasuna ikusteko modu zoragarria da, baita turisten ohiko ibilbideetan ez dauden tokietara joateko ere. Aurretik ongi antolatuz gero, auto arrunt batekin egin daiteke, baina 4x4 bat da gomendagarriena, eta toki batzuetara bataila altuko 4x4 autoekin soilik irits daiteke. Plana egitean, kontuan izan Hegoaldeko Afrika egonkorra den arren, hori ez dela inguruko herrialde guztien kasua. Bisa eskakizunak eta kostuak nazio batetik bestera aldatu egiten dira, eta jatorrizko herrialdeak eragina dauka horietan. Herrialde bakoitzak, gainera, autoan eraman beharreko larrialdietarako gauzen araudi propioa dauka.
mt: South Africa is a wonderful place to visit, and a great way to see the country is by car. It is possible to do it in a regular car, but a 4x4 is recommended, and some places can only be reached by high-clearance 4x4s. In general, South Africa is a stable country, but this is not true for all the countries in the region. Requirements and costs vary from country to country, and the original country has an impact on these. Each country also has its own rules for what to take in an emergency.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Hegoaldeko Afrikara autoz iristea eskualdearen edertasuna ikusteko modu zoragarria da, baita turisten ohiko ibilbideetan ez dauden tokietara joateko ere. Aurretik ongi antolatuz gero, auto arrunt batekin egin daiteke, baina 4x4 bat da gomendagarriena, eta toki batzuetara bataila altuko 4x4 autoekin soilik irits daiteke. Plana egitean, kontuan izan Hegoaldeko Afrika egonkorra den arren, hori ez dela inguruko herrialde guztien kasua. Bisa eskakizunak eta kostuak nazio batetik bestera aldatu egiten dira, eta jatorrizko herrialdeak eragina dauka horietan. Herrialde bakoitzak, gainera, autoan eraman beharreko larrialdietarako gauzen araudi propioa dauka.
mt: South Africa is a wonderful place to visit, and a great way to see the country is by car. It is possible to do it in a regular car, but a 4x4 is recommended, and some places can only be reached by high-clearance 4x4s. In general, South Africa is a stable country, but this is not true for all the countries in the region. Requirements and costs vary from country to country, and the original country has an impact on these. Each country also has its own rules for what to take in an emergency.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Besteen gauzak eramatea: ez galdu maletak bistatik, batez ere nazioarteko mugak igarotzean. Drogak garraiatzeko erabil zaitzakete zeuk jakin gabe eta horrek sekulako arazoetan sar zaitzake. Hori kontuan hartu ilaran itxarotean, droga usaintzen duten txakurrak edonoiz erabili ahal baitituzte abisatu gabe. Herrialde batzuetan oso zigor gogorrak dituzte, baita inoiz egindako lehen delitua bada ere. 10 urteko kartzela-zigorra edo heriotza-zigorra ere aplika daiteke. Zaindu gabeko poltsak dira lapurren helburu eta lehergailu-mehatxuak jarraitzen dituzten agintaritzen arreta ere erakar dezakete.
mt: 1. Don't lose your bags out of sight, especially when crossing international borders. They can be used to smuggle drugs without your knowledge and can get you into serious trouble. 2. Dogs sniffing for drugs can be used at any time without warning. 3. In some countries, even a first offense can result in a 10-year prison sentence or the death penalty. 4. Unattended bags are the target of thieves and can also attract the attention of authorities who are looking for bombs.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Bete etxea goizean kafe gozoz eta kamamila-te lasaigarriz gauean. Oporrak etxean igarotzean, zeure burua zaintzeko eta zerbait berezia prestatzeko minutu batzuk gehiago hartzeko denbora duzu. Abenturarako gogoz bazaude, egin zukua edo irabiakiak. agian errutinara bueltatzen zarenean gosaltzeko egin dezakezun edari sinpleren bat sortuko duzu. Edanaren inguruko askotariko kulturak dituen hiri batean bizi bazara, bisitatu joaten ez zaren auzoetako tabernaren bat.
mt: 1. Wake up in the morning with a cup of coffee and a nightcap of chamomile tea. When you have time at home, take a few extra minutes to clear your mind and prepare something special. If you're feeling adventurous, try making a simple drink to enjoy at night. If you live in a city with a variety of cultures, visit a bar in a neighborhood you don't usually go to.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Haldarsvík herriak hurbileko Eysturoy uhartearen ikuspegiak eskaintzen ditu, eta ohiz kanpoko eliza oktogonal bat dauka. Hilerrian, usoen marmolezko eskultura bereziak daude hilotz batzuen gainean. Merezi du ordu erdiko buelta bat ematea hiri interesgarri honetan.
mt: Haldarsvík village offers views of nearby Eysturoy island, and has an octagonal church. The graveyard has unusual marble sculptures on some of the graves. A half-hour detour is worth it to visit this interesting town.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Turista edo langile moduan herrialde jakin batzuetara epe laburrerako joateko bisarik behar ez den arren, nazioarteko ikasle gisa joateak egonaldi luzeagoa eskatzen du aldizkako turista gisa joateak baino. Oro har, atzerriko herrialde batean denboraldi luzea egoteko, bisa bat lortu beharko duzu aurretik. Ikasleentzako bisek bestelako baldintzak eta eskatzeko prozedurak dituzte turista arrunten edo laneko bisen eskaerekin alderatuta. Herrialde gehienetan, ikasteko hautatu duzun erakundearen eskaintza-gutun bat beharko duzu, baita gutxienez ikasketen lehenengo urtean izango dituzun diru-laguntzen frogak ere. Baldintza zehatzak zein diren jakiteko, jarri harremanetan ikasteko hautatu duzun erakundearekin eta herrialdeko immigrazio-sailarekin.
mt: Even if you don't need a visa to visit a particular country for a short time as a tourist or worker, studying there as an international student will require a longer stay. In most cases, you will need to obtain a visa before you can stay for a long time. Student visas have different requirements and application procedures than tourist or work visas. In most countries, you will need to provide an offer letter from the institution you have chosen, as well as proof of funding for your first year of study. To find out the exact requirements, contact the institution you have chosen to study at and the immigration department of the country you are visiting.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Udan batez ere, eltxoekin erne ibili beharko duzu oihan tropikalean txangoa egin nahi baduzu. Oihan subtropikalean autoz baldin bazoaz ere, ibilgailuan sartzeko ateak irekita dauden segundo gutxiak nahiko dira eltxoak zurekin batera sartzeko.
mt: In the tropics, you will need to ride elephants to go on a jungle trek. Even in the subtropics, the seconds you have the gates open to your car are enough to get the elephants in with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarbansak munduan dagoen itsasaldeko mangleen zerrenda handiena dira, 80 km (50 mi) zabalera hartzen dute kostaldetik Bangladesheko eta Indiako barrualdera. UNESCOk gizadiaren ondare izendatu zituen Sundarbansak. Indiako lurraldea hartzen duen basoa Sundarbans Parke Nazionala deitzen da. Basoak ez daude mangle sastrakadi zingiraz osatuta soilik; garai batean Gangesetako lautada estaltzen zuten oihan izugarrien azken hondarrak ere badaude. Sundarbansek 3.850 km²-ko azalera hartzen dute, zeinaren heren bat inguru urez/lokaztiz estalita dagoen. 1966tik, Sundarbansak faunaren santutegi izan dira, eta kalkulatzen da 400 Bengalako tigre eta 30.000 txital inguru daudela bertan.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, spanning 80 km (50 mi) along the coast of Bangladesh and India. Sundarbans was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Indian part of the forest is called Sundarbans National Park. The forest is not only made up of mangrove swamps; it also contains the remnants of once great tropical forests. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km², of which about one third is covered by water. Since 1966, Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are 400 Bengal tigers and 30,000 deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Munduan 5.000 hizkuntza baino gehiago daude eta horietako hogeik 50 milioi hiztun edo gehiago dituzte. Hitz idatziak ere errazago ulertu ohi dira esandakoak baino. Hori gertatzen da helbideekin, batzuetan zailak baitira ahoskatzen. Herrialde askok ingelesez ongi hitz egin dezakete, eta gehiagotan ingelesez apur bat jakitea ere espero daiteke, jende gaztearen artean batez ere. Imajinatu Manchesterko, Bostongo, Jamaikako eta Sydneyko jendea Torontoko jatetxe batean afaltzen ari zarela. Bakoitza bere jaioterriko istorioak kontatzen ari da, bakoitza bere azentuan eta tokiko hizkeran.
mt: 5,000 languages are spoken in the world and 50 million or more people speak each of them. Written words are also easier to understand than spoken ones. This is true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce. Many countries can speak English well, and in some cases it is expected that people can speak English a little, especially among the young. Imagine people from Manchester, Boston, Jamaica, and Sydney having dinner in a restaurant in Toronto. Each is telling stories from their hometown, each in their accent and local dialect.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Autobusak barrutien arteko autobus geltokitik (ibaiaren bestaldean) ateratzen dira egunean zehar, nahiz eta gehienak, ekialdera eta Jakar/Bumthangera doazenak bereziki, 6:30 eta 7:30 artean ateratzen diren. Barrutien arteko autobusak askotan bete egiten direnez, komeni da txartela egun batzuk lehenago erostea. Barruti gehienetan itsasaldeko autobus japoniarren zerbitzua dago, zeinak erosoak eta sendoak diren. Taxi partekatuak garraio azkarrak eta erosoak dira inguruko tokietara joateko, hala nola Parora (Nu 150) eta Punakhara (Nu 200).
mt: 6:30 and 7:30 are the most common departure times from the bus station (on the other side of the river) for buses to the east and Jakar/Bumthang in particular. As buses are often full, it is advisable to buy a ticket a few days in advance. There is a Japanese coastal bus service in most districts, which are comfortable and reliable. Shared taxis are fast and comfortable for trips around the area, such as to Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Heltzeko zail samarra denez, lurralde exotiko eta urrutikoei buruz hitz egiteko metafora gisa erabiltzen da “Timbuktu”. Gaur egun, hiri pobrea da, baina bere famak turistak erakartzen ditu, eta aireportua dauka. 1990ean, arriskuan dauden gizadiaren ondareen zerrendan gehitu zen, basamortuko arearen mehatxuarengatik. Henry Louis Gatesen PBS programaren Afrikar lurralde zoragarriak saio berezian geldialdi nagusienetakoa izan zen. Alde nabaria dago hiriaren eta herrialdeko beste hirien artean, kutsu arabiarra baitu afrikarraren ordez.
mt: Because it is so hard to reach, it is used as a metaphor to talk about exotic and faraway places. Today, it is a poor town, but its fame attracts tourists, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of endangered sites of humanity, because of the threat of the Sahara desert. Henry Louis Gates' PBS program "African American Journey" had a stop in the city. There is a marked difference between the city and other cities in the country, because it has an Arabic influence instead of an African one.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Heltzeko zail samarra denez, lurralde exotiko eta urrutikoei buruz hitz egiteko metafora gisa erabiltzen da “Timbuktu”. Gaur egun, hiri pobrea da, baina bere famak turistak erakartzen ditu, eta aireportua dauka. 1990ean, arriskuan dauden gizadiaren ondareen zerrendan gehitu zen, basamortuko arearen mehatxuarengatik. Henry Louis Gatesen PBS programaren Afrikar lurralde zoragarriak saio berezian geldialdi nagusienetakoa izan zen. Alde nabaria dago hiriaren eta herrialdeko beste hirien artean, kutsu arabiarra baitu afrikarraren ordez.
mt: Because it is so hard to reach, it is used as a metaphor to talk about exotic and faraway places. Today, it is a poor town, but its fame attracts tourists, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of endangered sites of humanity, because of the threat of the Sahara desert. Henry Louis Gates' PBS program "African American Journey" had a stop in the city. There is a marked difference between the city and other cities in the country, because it has an Arabic influence instead of an African one.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Paralinpiar jokoak 2021eko abuztuaren 24 eta irailaren 5 bitarte ospatuko dira. Ekitaldi batzuk Japongo beste toki batzuetan egingo dira. Tokio izango da udako bi Olinpiada antolatu dituen Asiako hiri bakarra. 1964an antolatu zituen jokoak. 2020rako hegaldiak eta ostatua erreserbatu baduzu atzerapenari buruz berri eman aurretik, egoera zail batean egon zaitezke. Bertan behera uzteko gidalerroak aldatu egin daitezke, baina martxora arte, koronabirusak eragindako ezeztapenak ez dira 2020ko uztailera arte luzatuko, Olinpiadak ospatuko diren datara arte, hain zuzen. Espero da ekitaldirako txartelek 2,500 ¥ eta 130.000 ¥ bitarte balio izatea, eta ohiko txartelek 7.000 ¥ inguru.
mt: 2021 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5. Some events will be held in other places in Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to host two summer Olympics. It hosted the games in 1964. If you have booked flights and accommodation before the postponement was announced, you may be in a difficult situation. The route may be changed, but until July 2020, the cancellations caused by the coronavirus will not be extended until the date of the Olympics, when they will be held. It is expected that the tickets will be worth between 2,500 ¥ and 130,000 ¥, and the usual tickets will be around 7,000 ¥.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Tornado bat oso presio gutxiko aire-zutabe birakari bat da, inguruko airea barrurantz eta gorantz xurgatzen duena. Haize bortitzak sortzen dituzte (sarri 100-200 milia ordukoak) eta objektu pisutsuak airean altxatzeko gaitasuna dute, tornadoa mugitzearekin batera eramaten dituztenak. Ekaitz hodeietatik jaisten diren tunel gisa hasten dira, eta lurra ukitzean bilakatzen dira “tornado”.
mt: A tornado is a violently rotating column of air that is in contact with both the surface of the Earth and a cumulonimbus cloud or, in rare cases, the base of a cumulus cloud. Tornadoes come in many sizes but typically eat up to 1.6 km (1 mile) in diameter, and generally travel a few kilometers (a few miles) before losing energy, and dissipating. The most extreme tornadoes can attain speeds of more than 480 km/h (300 mph), be up to 3.2 km (2 miles) in diameter, and stay on the ground for more than 100 km (62 miles). Tornadoes generally occur in conjunction with thunderstorms, and are often associated with other weather systems such as dry lines, low level jets, and mesohighs.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Bisitatuko duzun herrialdea bidaiatzeko segurua ez dela adierazten badute, horrek eragina izan dezake bidaiarientzako osasun-aseguruan edo bidaiak bertan behera uztearen aseguruan. Gobernuen gomendioak begiratzea ere gomendatzen dugu, baina euren gomendioak bertako biztanleei zuzenduta daude. Adibide gisa, posible da Ekialde Ertainean dauden Estatubatuarrek, Europarrek edo Arabiarrek egoera desberdina pairatzea. Zirkulazio-abisuak herrialde bakoitzeko egoera politikoaren laburpena besterik ez dira. Ematen diren ikuspegiak azalekoak, orokorrak eta sinpleegiak izaten dira beste toki batzuetan aurki daitekeen informazio xehatuagoarekin alderatuta.
mt: If they advise against visiting your destination, it may affect your travel insurance or trip cancellation insurance. We also recommend reviewing their advice, but it is usually targeted at local residents. For example, Americans, Europeans, or Arabs in the Middle East may have different experiences. Traffic advisories are just brief summaries of the political situation in each country. The views are superficial, general, and simplistic compared to more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Bidaia-agentziak lanean aritu dira 19. mendetik. Bidaia-agentziak aukera ona dira, bidaiariak naturarekin, kulturarekin, hizkuntzarekin edo baliabide gutxiko herrialdeekin lotuta izan dezakeen esperientziatik harago joaten direlako. Bidaia-agentzia gehienek ohiko erreserbak hartzen dituzte, baina badaude bidaia, aurrekontu edo helmuga berezietan espezializatutako agentziak ere. Hobea izan daiteke zeurearen antzeko bidaiak antolatzen dituen agentziaren bat erabiltzea. Eman begiratua agentziaren eskaintzei euren webgunean edo erakusleihoetan.
mt: 19th century travel agencies. Travel agencies are a good option because they can take you beyond the experience of being connected to nature, culture, language or low-resource countries. Most travel agencies take regular reservations, but there are also specialized agencies for travel, budget or destination. It can be better to use an agency that organizes similar trips to yours. Give a look to the offers of the agency in their website or showrooms.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Kontuan hartzeko gauza asko daude norabait bidaiatu aurretik eta bidaian bertan. Bidaiatzerakoan, ez espero gauzak “etxean bezalakoak” izatea. Jokamoldeak, legeak, janaria, trafikoa, ostatuak, irizpideak, hizkuntza eta abar desberdinak izango dira zeure bizitokiarekin alderatuta. Hori kontuan hartzeko zerbait da, desilusioa edo baita bertako gauzak egiteko modua ez gustatzea ekiditeko.
mt: There are many things to consider before and during a trip. When traveling, don't expect things to be "like home". Customs, laws, food, traffic, hotels, norms, language, and so on will be different from your home. This is something to consider, to avoid disappointment or even to make the most of the local things.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."
