src: Garapen bidean dagoen herrialde bat –edo munduko leku berri batean dagoen herrialde bat– lehen aldiz bisitatzerakoan, ez gutxietsi shock kulturala. Bidaiari egonkor eta trebe bat baino gehiagori egin dio gainezka garapen bidean dagoen herrialderen batera bidaiatzearen berritasunak, ezin direlako kulturara azkar egokitu. Batez ere egunetan, mendebaldeko estilo eta kalitateko hoteletan, otorduetan eta zerbitzuetan gastatzea gomendatzen dizugu, egokitzen lagun zaitzaten. Ez egin lo lurrean ipinitako koltxoietan bertako fauna ezagutzen ez baduzu. Kanpoan kanpatzeko asmoa baduzu, eraman kanpineko etzaleku edo hamaka bat, suge, eskorpioi eta halakoengandik urrun egoteko.
mt: When visiting a developing country for the first time, don't underestimate culture shock.  The seasoned traveler will be shocked by the novelty of visiting a developing country, unable to quickly adapt to the culture.  We recommend that you spend your days in Western style and quality hotels, restaurants and services, which will help you to adapt.  If you are not familiar with the local fauna, do not sleep on the ground in local huts.  If you plan to camp, bring a tent, to keep away from snakes, scorpions and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Egin gidalerroen kopiak eta eraman itzazu zeurekin aseguratzailearekin harremanetan jartzeko informazioarekin batera. Aseguratzailearen helbide elektronikoa eta nazioarteko telefono-zenbakiak erakutsi behar dituzte argibideak edo baimenak lortzeko eta eskaerak egiteko. Eraman beste kopia bat maletan eta eduki beste bat linean (bidali eranskina posta elektronikoz zeure buruari edo gorde ezazu “hodeian”). Ordenagailu eramangarri edo tableta batekin bidaiatzen baduzu, gorde kopia bat bertako memorian edo diskoan (Internetik gabe atzigarria izan behar du). Halaber, eman gidalerroen edo kontaktuaren kopiak bidelagunei eta etxetik lagundu nahi dizuten ingurukoei edo lagunei.
mt: 1. Make copies of your travel documents and take them with you along with information on how to contact your insurer. Include the insurer’s electronic address and international phone numbers to obtain and make claims. Make another copy to carry in your pocket and another to keep in your wallet (send a copy via email to yourself or save it in the “cloud”). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, save a copy on the device’s memory or disk (it should be offline). Also, give copies of your travel documents or contact information to your companions and those who will be helping you from home or nearby.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Hainbat film-formatu erabili dira urteetan zehar. Ohikoena 35 mm-koa da (36 x 24 mm negatiboa). Erraz samar ordez daiteke zintarik gabe geratzen bazara, eta uneko DSLRarekin alderagarria den erresoluzioa eskaintzen du. Formatu ertaineko bideokamera batzuek 6 x 6 cm-ko formatua erabiltzen dute, zehatzago esanda, 56 x 56 mm-ko negatiboa. Horrek 35 mm-ko batek baino lau aldiz erresoluzio gehiago ematen du (3136 mm2, 864 formatuarekin alderatuta).
mt: 35 mm is the most common film format. It is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSLR, and it is easy to see why, as it is the same size as the sensor in a modern DSL
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. src: Bidaia-blogen webgune batean trebetasunak lantzea da bidaia-idazle lanetan hasteko modurik errazena. Gunearen formatu- eta edizio-prozesuetan aise moldatzen zarenean, aukera izango duzu zeure webgunea sortzeko.
mt: One of the easiest ways to get started writing travel articles is to hone your skills on a travel blog. When you're comfortable with the site's formatting and editing processes, you'll have the opportunity to create your own web site.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Etxean, tokiko germenen etengabeko esposizioagatik, oso litekeena da horiei immune izatea. Baina munduko beste zenbait tokitan, fauna bakteriologikoa berria da eta aukera gehiago dituzu arazoak izateko. Halaber, klima beroagoetan, bakterioak azkarrago hazten dira eta denbora luzeagoz bizirauten dute gorputzetik kanpo. Hortik datoz Delhi Belly-ren zartailuak, Faraoiaren madarikazioa, Montezuma-ren mendekua eta euren hainbat lagun. Klima hotzagoetan izaten diren arnasketa-arazoen antzera, hesteetako arazoak nahiko ohikoak dira klima beroetan. Gehienetan oso desatseginak izaten dira, baina ez dira oso arriskutsuak.
mt: At home, with constant exposure to local germs, it is quite possible to become immune to them. But in other parts of the world, the bacterial fauna is new and you have more chances to have problems. Also, in warmer climates, bacteria grow faster and live longer outside the body. This is where Delhi Belly gets its name, the Pharaoh's curse, Montezuma's revenge and their many friends. Like respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems are quite common in warmer climates. They are usually quite unpleasant, but not very dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: Europa nahiko kontinente txikia da, baina herrialde independente ugari ditu. Ohiko egoeran, hainbat herrialdetara bidaiatzeko bisa eskatu eta segurtasun-kontrolak hainbatetan zeharkatu beharko lirateke. Aitzitik, Schengen guneak herrialde baten antzera funtzionatzen du horri dagokionez. Eremu horren barruan zauden bitartean, mugak igaro ditzakezu pasaportea egiaztatzen duten kontroletatik igaro behar izan gabe. Halaber, Schengen bisa bat izanez gero, ez duzu bisarik eskatu beharko Schengen eremuko kide diren herrialde bakoitzera sartzeko eta, horrela, denbora eta dirua aurreztuko duzu eta dokumentuak bete behar izatea ekidingo dituzu.
mt: Europe is a small continent, but it has many independent countries.  In the usual case, you would need to get a visa and go through security checks at each country.  However, the Schengen area works like a single country in this regard.  While you are in the Schengen area, you can pass through the border without having your passport checked by the border guards.  Also, if you have a Schengen visa, you do not need to get a visa to enter any of the Schengen member countries, thus saving you time and money and avoiding the hassle of filling out paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Tutankamonen hilobia (KV62). Baliteke KV62-a haraneko hilobirik famatuena izatea, Howard Carterrek 1922an errege gaztearen hilobia ia osorik aurkitu zueneko eszena. Beste errege-hilobiekin alderatuta, ordea, Tutankamonenak ia ez du bisitarik merezi, askoz txikiagoa delako eta apaingarri gutxi dituelako. Momia zerraldotik ateratzen saiatu zirenean egindako kalteen frogak ikusi nahi dituen edonor nahigabetu egingo da, burua eta sorbaldak soilik ikusten zaizkio eta. Hilobiko ondasun zoragarriak ez daude bertan, Kairoko Egiptoar Museora eraman baitzituzten. Denbora gutxi duten bisitariek hobe dute denbora beste nonbait pasatu.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous royal tomb in the Valley of the Kings, discovered almost intact by Howard Carter in 1922. However, compared to other royal tombs, Tutankhamun's is relatively small and lacks decoration. Visitors will be disappointed by the damage done to the mummy during attempts to remove it from its sarcophagus, which only shows the head and shoulders. The tomb's magnificent contents are not on display, having been moved to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be better off spending it elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Bowen Island eguneko edo asteburuko txangoak egiteko toki ezaguna da eta kayak-a edo ibilaldiak egiteko aukera ez ezik, dendak, jatetxeak eta aukera gehiago ere eskaintzen ditu. Komunitate jator hau Howe Sound-en dago, Vancouverren kanpoaldean, eta erraz joan daiteke bertara Vancouver erdialdeko Granville Island-etik ateratzen diren uretako taxien bidez. Kanpoko jarduerak atsegin dituztenentzat, ezinbestekoa da Sea to Sky korridorera joatea. Whistler (Vancouvertik ordu eta erdira) garestia da, baina ezaguna 2010eko neguko olinpiadak direla eta. Neguan, gozatu Ipar Amerikako eski onenaz, eta udan, probatu mendiko bizikletan ibiltzen.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular day or weekend trip destination for kayaking, hiking, shopping, dining, and more. This quaint community is located in Howe Sound, just outside of Vancouver, and can be easily reached by water taxi from Granville Island in the heart of downtown Vancouver. For those looking for outdoor activities, a trip up the Sea to Sky corridor is a must. Whistler (about an hour and a half north of Vancouver) is expensive, but is well known for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of North America's best skiing, and in the summer, try mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls Zimbabweren mendebaldean dagoen herria da, Livingstoneko eta Zambiako mugetan, eta Botswanatik hurbil. Herria ur-jauzien ondo-ondoan dago, eta horiek dira toki interesgarri nagusiena, baina turistentzat helmuga ezaguna den honek abentura nahi dutenentzako eta leku interesgarriak bisitatu nahi dituztenentzako aukera pila eskaintzen ditu, denbora luzeko egonaldietarako. Urtaro euritsuan (azarotik martxora), uraren emaria handiagoa izango da eta ur-jauziak ikusgarriagoak izango dira. Ziur busti egingo zarela zubia pasatzen baduzu edo ur-jauzien ondoan dauden bide bihurgunetsuetan ibiltzen bazara. Bestetik, hain justu ur emaria oso handia delako, ur-jauzien beren ikuspegia oztopatu egingo dizu ur kantitate handiak!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in the west of Zimbabwe, on the Zambezi River at the western end of the Victoria Falls. The town is named after the Victoria Falls, which are the main tourist attraction. The town is also known as "The Smoke that Thunders" and is locally referred to as "Mosi-oa-Tunya" (the "Smoke that Thunders"). The Victoria Falls are the largest waterfall in the world, and are located on the Zambezi River, which is the fourth largest river in Africa. The falls are located on the border between Zambia and Zimbabwe, and are a major tourist attraction. The falls are also known as "The Smoke that Thunders" and are locally referred to as "Mosi-oa-Tunya" (the "Smoke that Thunders"). ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Ohiko argazkigintzarako arauak bideo-grabaketetan ere aplika daitezke; are gehiago, garrantzitsuagoak izaten dira arauok kasu hauetan. Zerbaiti ezin bazaio argazkirik egin, ezta bururatu ere horren bideo bat grabatzea. Drone bat erabiltzen baduzu, arretaz aztertu behar duzu zer graba dezakezun eta zer baimen edo lizentzia gehigarri behar dituzun. Drone bat aireportu batetik hurbil edo jendetzaren gainean erabiltzea ideia txarra da ia beti, nahiz eta zure bizitokian legez kanpokoa ez izan.
mt: The same rules that apply to still photography can also apply to video; in fact, they are even more important in video. If you can't take a picture, you probably shouldn't be filming it either. If you are using a drone, make sure you know what you can and can't film and what additional permissions or licenses you may need. Flying a drone over an airport or over a crowd is a bad idea almost always, even if it is legal in your jurisdiction.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Bisa bat lortzeko prozesuan, erregistratu ere egin behar da. Herrialde batzuetan, zeure presentzia eta ostatuaren helbidea erregistratu behar dituzu tokiko agintaritzan. Baliteke tokiko poliziarekin inprimaki bat bete edo immigrazio-bulegora joan behar izatea. Halako legeak dituzten herrialdeetan, tokiko hotelek egingo dute erregistroa (ziurtatu hori egiteko eskatzen duzula). Bestelako kasuetan, turistentzako ostatuetan geratzen ez diren turistek soilik erregistratu behar dute. Hala ere, horrek legea zailtzen duenez, informa zaitez lehenago.
mt: To get a visa, you must register. In some countries, you must register your presence and the address of your stay with local authorities. You may be required to fill out a form with local police or go to the immigration office. In countries with such laws, hotels will do the registration (ask them to do so). In other cases, only tourists staying in tourist hotels must register. However, this makes the law more difficult to enforce, so inform beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Bidaiatu bitartean boluntario lanetan aritzea izugarri aproposa da zeure aletxoa jartzeko, baina honen oinarria ez datza soilik ekarpenetan. Atzerriko herrialde batean bizitzea eta boluntariotza egitea apartekoak dira beste kultura bat, jende berria eta zeure burua ezagutzeko, perspektiba hartzeko eta gauza berrietan trebatzeko. Halaber, denbora gehiago eman nahi baduzu bertan, metodo aproposa da dirua neurriz gastatzeko; izan ere, boluntariotza-programa askok logela eta janaria eskaintzen dituzte eta gutxi batzuek soldata txiki bat.
mt: It is very appropriate to volunteer while you are traveling, but its foundation is not just donations. Living in a foreign country and volunteering is apart from other cultures, new people and yourself, to gain perspective and to learn new things. Also, if you want to spend more time there, it is a good way to spend money appropriately; many volunteer programs offer housing and food, and some offer a small salary.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Walt Disney World-era bidaiatzea erromesaldi garrantzitsua da familia amerikar askorentzat. “Ohiko” bisitak barne hartzen du Orlandoko Nazioarteko Aireportura joatea, autobusez Disney parkeko hotel batera joatea, astebete inguru ematea Disney eremutik atera gabe eta etxera bueltatzea. Aldaera amaigabeak daude, baina hori da jende gehienak esan nahi duena “Disney World-era joatea” esaten duenean. Interneten eBay edo Craigslist bezalako webguneen bidez saltzen diren txartelak erabat erabili ez diren eta parke batetik bestera joateko hainbat egunetarako txartelak dira. Oso jarduera ohikoa izan arren, Disney-k debekatu egiten du: txartelak ezin dira eskualdatu.
mt: A trip to Walt Disney World is a major pilgrimage for many American families. “Ordinary” visits include flying to Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a Disney park hotel, spending a week or so without leaving the Disney area, and returning home. Variations are endless, but that is what most people mean when they say “going to Disney World.” Tickets sold on the Internet via eBay or Craigslist are unused and are for admission to one park or another for multiple days. While a common practice, Disney prohibits it: tickets cannot be transferred.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Guda eremutzat hartzen diren herrialdeak bisitatu nahi dituen orok trebakuntza profesionala jasotzea komeni da. “Aurkako inguruneen inguruko ikastaroa” bilatzen baduzu Interneten, seguruenik tokiko enpresaren baten helbidea agertuko zaizu. Ikastaroetan hemen adierazitako aferak landu ohi dira xehetasun handiagoz, eta esperientzia praktikoa ere eskaintzen dute normalean. Ikastaroek 2-5 egun bitarte irauten dute eta rol-jolasak, lehen sorospeneko jarduera ugari eta batzuetan armen inguruko trebakuntza egiten dira. Naturan bizirauteari buruzko liburu eta aldizkariak ohikoak dira, baina guda eremuez aritzen diren argitalpenak oso gutxi.
mt: It is advisable to take professional training before visiting countries at war.  If you search for "training in hostile environments" on the Internet, you will probably find the address of a local company.  Training courses cover the topics listed here in more detail, and often include practical experience.  Training courses last from 2 to 5 days and include role-playing, many first aid exercises, and sometimes weapons training.  Books and magazines on survival in the wild are common, but publications on war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Ura arazteko modu asko daude, batzuk besteak baino eraginkorragoak arrisku jakinei dagokienean. Toki batzuetan, nahikoa da ura minutu batez egostearekin; beste toki batzuetan, minutu batzuk behar dira. Iragazki batzuk eraginkorragoak dira besteak baino eta, kezkatuta bazaude, enpresa handiren baten ur-botila itxi bat erostea gomendatzen dizugu.
mt: There are many ways to purify water, some more effective than others in dealing with known risks. In some places, it is enough to boil the water for a minute; in other places, it takes minutes. Some filters are more effective than others, and if you are concerned, we recommend that you buy a water bottle from a large company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Erresaka-korronteak olatuen itzulerako korrontea dira. Hondartzan, maiz uharri edo antzerakoren batean, hausten diren olatuek sortzen dituzte. Ur azpiko topologia dela eta, itzulerako korrontea hondoago dauden sekzioetan pilatzen da eta bertan ur sakonerako korronte azkar bat sortzen da. Heriotza gehienak korrontearen aurka igeri egiten saiatzeak sortutako nekearen ondorio dira; izan ere, ezinezkoa da bertatik igerian ateratzea. Korrontetik atera bezain laster, ez zaizu ohikoa baino zailago egingo urertzera igeri egitea. Saiatu zerbaiti eusten korronteak berriro harrapatuko ez zaituen nonbait edo, zeure abileziaren arabera edo norbaitek ikusi bazaitu, itxaron laguntza jaso arte.
mt: Rips are the return flow of waves. In the beach, they are formed by the breaking of waves on a reef or a similar structure. Due to the underwater topography, the return flow is concentrated in the deeper sections and a fast underwater current is formed. Most deaths are due to the exhaustion of trying to swim against the current; it is impossible to escape from the current once in it. Once out of the current, it is not unusual to find it harder to swim back to shore. Try to hold on to something so the current does not take you back or, if someone has seen you, wait for help.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Bide nabigagarriak gai aproposa izan daitezke oporrak antolatzeko. Adibidez, Loira Haraneko gazteluak bisitatzea, Rhin harana edo itsas-bidaia bat egitea Danubioko hiri interesgarriak ikusteko edo Erie ubidean txalupan ibiltzea. Halaber, oinez eta bizikletaz ibiltzeko ibilbide nagusiak zehazten dituzte.
mt: A useful feature of navigation apps is to plan trips. For example, visiting the castles of the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley or a boat trip to see interesting cities along the Danube or canoeing on the Erie Canal. They also list the main walking and cycling routes.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Iparraldean, eskualdeak muga egiten du Sahelarekin, eta hegoaldean eta mendebaldean, Ozeano Atlantikoarekin. Emakumeak: emakumezko bidaiari guztiei gomendatzen zaie ezkonduta daudela esatea, benetako egoera zibila gorabehera. Eraztun bat eramatea ere lagungarria da (baina oso garestia ez dirudien bat). Emakumeek jakin behar dute agian jazarpentzat hartzen dituzten jarrerak desberdintasun kulturalak direla, eta ohikoa dela norbaitek jarraitzea, besotik heltzea, etab. Izan gogorra gizonei uko egitean, eta ez izan irmo eusteko beldurrik (desberdintasun kulturalak izan edo ez, ez da egokia!).
mt: In the north, the region borders the Sahel, and in the south and west, the Atlantic Ocean. Women: Women are advised to say they are married, even if the actual marital status is different. A ring is also helpful (but not too expensive). Women should be aware that the behaviors they take for harassment may be cultural differences, and that it is common for someone to follow you, touch you, etc. It is not appropriate to be rude to men, and not to be afraid to stand firm (whether cultural differences or not, it is not appropriate!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Fauna da elementu zailena argazkilarientzat eta zortea, pazientzia, esperientzia eta ekipamenduaren arteko konbinazio ona behar da horretarako. Animalien argazkilaritza ziurtzat jo ohi da, baina argazkilaritza orokorraren gisan, argazki batek milaka hitzen balioa du. Animalien argazkilaritzan telefoto-lente luzeak behar dira, baina txori multzo batek edo izaki oso txikiek beste lente bat beharko dute. Animalia exotiko asko zailak dira aurkitzen eta parke batzuetan helburu komertzialetarako argazkiak ateratzeari buruzko arauak dituzte. Animalia basatiak lotsatiak edo erasokorrak izan daitezke. Ingurunea hotza, beroa edo kontrakoa izan daiteke.
mt: Wildlife is the most difficult subject for photographers and luck, patience, experience and equipment are all needed to capture it. Wildlife photography is often considered to be a niche, but a single image can be worth thousands of words. Long telephoto lenses are needed to capture a flock of birds or a very small animal, but many exotic animals are difficult to find and some parks have rules about taking images for commercial purposes. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. The environment can be hot, cold or in between.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Latitude altuetan edo mendietan zehar gidatzeko asmoa duenak kontuan hartu behar du elurra, izotza edo tenperatura oso baxuak egin ditzakeela. Izoztuta edo elurtuta dauden errepideetan, frikzio oso gutxi dago eta ezin da gidatu asfaltoaren gainean bezala. Bisutsa dagoenean, trabatuta geratzeko adina elur egin dezake. Baliteke ikusgarritasun gutxiago egotea elurra edo ibilgailuko leihoetako kondentsazioa edo izotza dela eta. Bestalde, izozteak eta elurteak ohikoak dira herrialde askotan eta trafikoa normalean ez da eteten urte osoan.
mt: When driving in the mountains or at high altitudes, one should be aware that snow, ice or very low temperatures can occur. On roads covered with snow or ice, there is very little friction and it is not possible to drive as on asphalt. In fog, it is possible to get stuck in a layer of snow. It is possible to have less visibility due to snow, condensation on the car windows or ice. On the other hand, snow and ice are common in many countries and traffic is not usually stopped throughout the year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Diplomazialaria ez bazara, errenta aurkeztu beharko duzu bizi zaren eta lan egiten duzun herrialdean. Errentaren egitura desberdina da herrialdearen arabera, eta zerga-tasak eta -tarteak asko aldatzen dira herrialde batetik bestera. Herrialde federal batzuetan, hala nola Estatu Batuetan eta Kanadan, errenta maila federalaren eta tokiko mailaren arabera ezartzen denez, tasak eta tarteak eskualdez eskualde alda daitezke.
mt: If you are not a diplomat, you will have to pay tax on your income in the country where you live and work. The structure of the tax varies from country to country, and the rates and brackets vary widely from country to country. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, the tax rate is based on both the federal and local tax rates, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Nazioarteko azoka (normalean, Nazioarteko erakusketa edo Expo gisa ezagutzen zaio honi) artean eta zientzian oinarritutako nazioarteko jaialdi handia da. Parte hartzen duten herrialdeek artearekin eta hezkuntzarekin erlazionatutako erakusketak egiten dituzte pabilioi nazionaletan, munduko arazoak edo euren herrialdeko kultura edo historia erakusteko. Barazkigintzan oinarritutako nazioarteko erakusketak ekitaldi espezializatuak dira, eta bertan, loreekin egindako diseinuak, lorategi botanikoak eta landareekin egindako beste edozer erakusten dira. Teorian, urtero ospa daitezke (baldin eta herrialde desberdinetan egiten badira), baina praktikan ez da hala gertatzen. Ekitaldi hauek hiru eta sei hilabete bitarte irauten dute eta 50 hektarea baino gehiagoko eremuetan ospatzen dira.
mt: An international exhibition (often referred to as an international exposition or Expo) is a large, international event showcasing various countries' arts, industries and achievements. Participating countries present exhibits, pavilions and displays in national pavilions, often on themes such as world issues or a country's culture or history. Horticultural expositions are special events, and in them, floral designs, botanical gardens and other horticultural displays are shown. In theory, they are held every year (if they are held in different countries), but in practice they are not. These events last three to six months and are held on sites of more than 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Nazioarteko azoka (normalean, Nazioarteko erakusketa edo Expo gisa ezagutzen zaio honi) artean eta zientzian oinarritutako nazioarteko jaialdi handia da. Parte hartzen duten herrialdeek artearekin eta hezkuntzarekin erlazionatutako erakusketak egiten dituzte pabilioi nazionaletan, munduko arazoak edo euren herrialdeko kultura edo historia erakusteko. Barazkigintzan oinarritutako nazioarteko erakusketak ekitaldi espezializatuak dira, eta bertan, loreekin egindako diseinuak, lorategi botanikoak eta landareekin egindako beste edozer erakusten dira. Teorian, urtero ospa daitezke (baldin eta herrialde desberdinetan egiten badira), baina praktikan ez da hala gertatzen. Ekitaldi hauek hiru eta sei hilabete bitarte irauten dute eta 50 hektarea baino gehiagoko eremuetan ospatzen dira.
mt: An international exhibition (often referred to as an international exposition or Expo) is a large, international event showcasing various countries' arts, industries and achievements. Participating countries present exhibits, pavilions and displays in national pavilions, often on themes such as world issues or a country's culture or history. Horticultural expositions are special events, and in them, floral designs, botanical gardens and other horticultural displays are shown. In theory, they are held every year (if they are held in different countries), but in practice they are not. These events last three to six months and are held on sites of more than 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Nahiz eta parkeko animalia gehienak gizakiak ikustera ohituta egon, fauna basatia da eta ezin da elikatu edo molestatu. Parkeko agintaritzak dioenari jarraikiz, gelditu hartz eta otsoengandik gutxienez 100 yarda edo metrotara eta beste animali basatiengandik 25 yarda edo metrotara. Otzan itxura izan dezaketen arren, bisonte, altze, hartz eta antzerako animalia handi guztiek egin dezakete eraso. Urtero, hainbat bisitari zauritzen dira beharrezko distantzia ez mantentzeagatik. Animaliok handiak, basatiak eta arriskutsuak direnez, eman iezaiezu espazioa. Halaber, kontuan hartu usainek hartzak eta bestelako animalia basatiak erakartzen dituztela. Beraz, ekidin janari usaintsuak eraman edo prestatzea eta mantendu kanpamendua garbi.
mt: While most park animals are used to human visitors, the wildlife is wild and cannot be fed or bothered. Following the park's instructions, stay at least 100 yards (91 m) away from bears and wolves and 25 yards (23 m) away from all other wildlife. Although they may look cuddly, large animals such as bison, elk, and wolves can be dangerous. Every year, several visitors are injured for not giving enough space. Because animals are large, wild, and unpredictable, give them space. Also, remember that scents can attract bears and other wildlife. Therefore, avoid bringing or preparing food with strong odors, and keep your campsite clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
